\

\
a\uc0\u347 vakapunarvasuk\u257 n\u257 \u7747  prav\u257 sa uttara: pratisa\u7747 hare ||1||\
\
adar\uc0\u347 an\u257 ya cchandastathaiv\u257 pratikara\u7751 am |\
\
ari\uc0\u7779 \u7789 a: p\u257 pik\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 irud\u257 y\u299  pa\u7747 cakarmaka: ||2||\
\
buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu \
\
samayena \uc0\u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: prativasanti kalahak\u257 rak\u257  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257  \
\
vigrahak\uc0\u257 rak\u257  viv\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257 rak\u257  \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 : | te sa\u7747 ghe abh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 amadhikara\u7751 \u257 nyutp\u257 dayanti \
\
yena sa\uc0\u7747 gha: kalahaj\u257 to viharati | bha\u7751 \u7693 anaj\u257 to vig\u7771 h\u299 to viv\u257 dam\u257 panna: | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | kuruta y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 n\u257 \u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  kalahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  vig\u7771 h\u299 t\u257 n\u257 \u7747  viv\u257 dam\u257 pann\u257 n\u257 m\u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  \

tarjan\uc0\u299 ya\u7747  karmeti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\

pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: k\u257 ra\u7751 aistarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tamadharmakarma ca tadavinayakarma ca sa\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena \
\
s\uc0\u257 tis\u257 ra: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | acodayitv\u257  kurvanti | asm\u257 rayitv\u257  avastukamapratij\'f1ay\u257  \
\
asa\uc0\u7747 mukh\u299 bh\u363 tasya kurvanti | pa\u7747 cabhistu k\u257 ra\u7751 aistarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 ta\u7747  dharmakarma ca tadvinayakarma \
\
ca sa\uc0\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena na s\u257 tis\u257 ra: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | codayitv\u257  kurvanti | sm\u257 rayitv\u257  \
\
savastuka\uc0\u7747  pratij\'f1ay\u257  sa\u7747 mukh\u299  [bh\u363 tasya] kurvanti |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca puna: karttavyam | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 n samanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sa\u7747 nipatite ekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ime p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: kalahak\u257 rak\u257  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257 \
\
vigrahak\uc0\u257 rak\u257  viv\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257  \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 : | ta ete abh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 a\u7747  sa\u7747 ghe adhikara\u7751 \u257 nyutp\u257 da-\
\
yanti yena sa\uc0\u7747 gha: kalahaj\u257 to viharati bha\u7751 \u7693 anaj\u257 to vig\u7771 h\u299 to viv\u257 dam\u257 panna: | sa \
\
cetsa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  kalaha- \
\

karma kury\uc0\u257 diti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | tata: karma karttavyam | \

@002\

yena sa\uc0\u7747 gha: kalahaj\u257 to viharati | bha\u7751 \u7693 anaj\u257 to viharati vig\u7771 h\u299 to viv\u257 dam\u257 panna: | tatsa\u7747 gha:\
\
p\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  kalahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  vigrahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  viv\u257 dak\u257 ra-\
\
k\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  tarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma karoti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  p\u363 rvavad y\u257 vattarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma kartum| te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m ||\
\
iya\uc0\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  karttavy\u257  | k\u7771 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena \
p\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  p\u363 rvavady\u257 vattarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 t\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 tt\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 me-\
\
vametadv\uc0\u257 ray\u257 mi |\
\
tarjan\uc0\u299 yakarmak\u7771 tasy\u257 ha\u7747  bhik\u7779 or\u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n praj\'f1apay\u257 mi | tarjan\u299 ya-\
\
karmak\uc0\u7771 tena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  na pravr\u257 jayitavyam | nopasa\u7747 p\u257 dayitavyam | na ni\u347 rayo \
\
deya: | na \uc0\u347 rama\u7751 odde\u347 a upasth\u257 payitavya: | na bhik\u7779 u\u7751 yavavaditavy\u257  | na bhik\u7779 u\u7751 yavav\u257 daka: \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 mantavya: | n\u257 pi p\u363 rvasa\u7747 matena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 yavavaditavy\u257  | na bhik\u7779 u\u347 codayitavya: sm\u257 rayitavya: \
\
\uc0\u347 \u299 lavipatty\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipatty\u257  \u257 c\u257 ravipatty\u257  \u257 j\u299 vavipatty\u257  sth\u257 payitavya: | na po\u7779 adho na \
\
prav\uc0\u257 ra\u7751 \u257  na j\'f1aptikarma na j\'f1apticaturtha\u7747  karma | tarjan\u299 yak\u7771 to bhik\u7779 uryath\u257 praj\'f1apt\u257 n\u257 samud\u257 c\u257 ri- \
\
k\uc0\u257 n dharm\u257 nna sam\u257 d\u257 ya varttate s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati |\
\
[ta] eva\uc0\u7747  tarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257  utkacaprakac\u257 : sa\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayanti | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  \
\
pravartayanti | sam\uc0\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ayanti | anta:s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sthitv\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 cante |\
\
kalahak\uc0\u257 rakatv\u257 cca prativiram\u257 ma iti kathayanti | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | os\u257 reta y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n bhik\u7779 \u363 n kalaha [k\u257 ra]\
\
k\uc0\u257 \u7747 starjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257 niti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: | \
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gatastarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 to nos\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: |\
\
notkacaprakaca: sa\uc0\u7747 dhe roma p\u257 tayati | na ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  pravartayati | na sam\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ayati |\
\
n\uc0\u257 nta:s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sthitv\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 cate | tasm\u257 cca kalahak\u257 rakatv\u257 cca na prativiram\u257 m\u299 ti \
\
[kathayati] | ebhi: pa\uc0\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gata: p\u363 rvavat | aparairapi pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 \
\
gatastarjan\uc0\u299 yakarmak\u7771 to nos\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | r\u257 jakulapratisara\u7751 o bhavati |\
\
yuktakulapratisara\uc0\u7751 a: | t\u299 rthikapratisara\u7751 a: | pudgalapratisara\u7751 a: | na sa\u7747 ghapratisara\u7751 a: | ebhi: \
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gata: p\u363 rvavat | aparairapi pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gatastarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 to \
\
nos\uc0\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: \u257 g\u257 rikadhvaja\u7747  dh\u257 rayati | t\u299 rthikadhvaja\u7747  dh\u257 rayati |\
\
t\uc0\u299 rthy\u257 nsevate paryup\u257 ste | anadhy\u257 c\u257 ram\u257 carate | bhik\u7779 u\u347 ik\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7747  [na] \u347 ik\u7779 ate | ebhi:\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gata: p\u363 rvavat | aparairapi pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gatastarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 to\
\
@003\
\
nos\uc0\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | bhik\u7779 \u363 n\u257 kro\u347 ati | ro\u7779 ayati | paribh\u257 \u7779 ate |\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya ca al\u257 bh\u257 ya apad\u257 ya cetayati | ebhi: pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: p\u363 rvavat |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhistu dharmai: samanv\u257 gatastarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta os\u257 rayitavya: katamai: pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: |\
\
utkacaprakaca: sa\uc0\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayati | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  pravartayati | sam\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ayati | anta:-\
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sthitv\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 cate | kalahak\u257 rakatv\u257 cca prativiram\u257 m\u299 ti vadati | ebhi: \
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gatastarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta os\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | na r\u257 jakulaprati-\
\
sara\uc0\u7751 o bhavati | na yuktakulapratisara\u7751 a: | na t\u299 rthikapratisara\u7751 a: | [na ?] sa\u7747 ghapratisara\u7751 a: | na \
\
pudgalapratisara\uc0\u7751 a: | ebhi: pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gata: p\u363 rvavat | aparairapi pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: \
\
samanv\uc0\u257 gatastarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta os\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | n\u257 g\u257 rikadhvaja\u7747  dh\u257 rayati |\
\
na t\uc0\u299 rthikadhvaja\u7747  dh\u257 rayati | na t\u299 rthy\u257 n sevate na bhajate na paryup\u257 ste | na adhy\u257 c\u257 ram\u257 carate |\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u347 ik\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7747  \u347 ik\u7779 ate | ebhi: pa\'f1cabhirdharmai: p\u363 rvavat | aparairapi pa\'f1cabhirdharmai: samanv\u257 gatasta-\
\
rjan\uc0\u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta os\u257 rayitavya: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | bhik\u7779 \u363 n n\u257 kro\u347 ati | na ro\u7779 ayati |\
\
na paribh\uc0\u257 \u7779 ate | sa\u7747 ghasya (ca) l\u257 bh\u257 ya [pad\u257 ya] cetayate | [ebhi:] pa\u7747 cabhirdharmai: p\u363 rvavat |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca punaros\u257 rayitavya: | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikaya \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 d samanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sa\u7747 nipatitate p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitakairbhik\u7779 ubhiryath\u257 v\u7771 ddhikay\u257 \
\
sam\uc0\u299 c\u299 \u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  v\u7771 ddh\u257 nte utku\u7789 ukena sthitv\u257  a\u7747 jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | vaya\u7747  p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: kalahak\u257 rak\u257  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257  \
\
vigrahak\uc0\u257 rak\u257  viv\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257  \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 : | te vayamabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 a\u7747  sa\u7747 ghe adhikara\u7751 \u257 nyutp\u257 da-\
\
y\uc0\u257 ma: | yena sa\u7747 gha: kalahaj\u257 to viharati bha\u7751 \u7693 anaj\u257 to vig\u7771 h\u299 to viv\u257 dam\u257 panna: | te\u7779 \u257 masm\u257 ka\u7747  \
\
p\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  kalahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  vigrahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  viv\u257 dak\u257 ra-\
\
k\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 ghena tarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tam | te vaya\u7747  tarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257  utkacaprakac\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tay\u257 ma: | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  pravartay\u257 ma: | sam\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ay\u257 ma: | anta:s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747 \
\
sthitv\uc0\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 c\u257 mahe | kalahak\u257 rakatv\u257 cca prativiram\u257 ma: | osarayatvasm\u257 ka\u7747  bhadanta:\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gha: | p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 n bhik\u7779 \u363 n kalahak\u257 rak\u257 n viv\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257 n \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 \u7747 starjan\u299 ya-\
\
karmak\uc0\u7771 t\u257 nanukampay\u257 nukamp\u257 mup\u257 d\u257 ya | eva\u7747  dvirapi trirapi | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tv\u257  karma karttavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ime p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: kalahak\u257 rak\u257  y\u257 vad\u257 dhikara-\
\
\uc0\u7751 ik\u257 : | ete abh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 a\u7747  sa\u7747 ghe adhikara\u7751 \u257 nyutp\u257 dayanti, yena sa\u7747 gha: kalahaj\u257 to viharati \

@004\
\
bha\uc0\u7751 \u7693 anaj\u257 to vig\u7771 h\u299 to viv\u257 dm\u257 panna: | tade\u7779 \u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 ghe [na] kalahak\u257 raka iti tarjan\u299 yakarma \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tam | ta ete tarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257  utkacaprakac\u257 : sa\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayanti | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  pravarta-\
\
yanti | sam\uc0\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ayanti | anta:s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sthitv\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 cante | kalahak\u257 raka-\
\
tv\uc0\u257 cca prativiram\u257 ma iti vadanti | sa cetsa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha:\
\
p\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 nbhik\u7779 \u363 n os\u257 rayanti | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  pravartayanti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | tata:karma karttavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ime p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: kalahak\u257 rak\u257  y\u257 vad\u257 dhi-\
\
kara\uc0\u7751 ik\u257 : | ta ete abhik\u7779 \u7751 a\u7747  sa\u7747 ghe adhikara\u7751 \u257 nyutp\u257 dayanti yena sa\u7747 gha: kalahaj\u257 to viharati\
\
bha\uc0\u7751 \u7693 anaj\u257 to vig\u7771 h\u299 to viv\u257 dam\u257 panna: | tadete\u7779 \u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 ghena kalahak\u257 rak\u257  iti tarjan\u299 yakarma \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tam | ta ete tarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257  utkacaprakac\u257 : sa\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayanti | ni: sara\u7751 \u257 \u7747  pravarta-\
\
yanti | sam\uc0\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ayanti | anta:s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sthitv\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 cante | kalahak\u257 raka-\
\
tv\uc0\u257 cca prativiram\u257 ma iti vadanti | tatsa\u7747 gha: p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 n bhik\u7779 \u363 nkalahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7747 sta-\
\
rjan\uc0\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257 nos\u257 rayanti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257 nbhik\u7779 \u363 nkalahak\u257 rak\u257 \u7747 -\
\
starjan\uc0\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257 nos\u257 rayitu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | os\u257 rit\u257 : sa\u7747 ghena \
\
p\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitak\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: kalahak\u257 rak\u257 starjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 t\u257 : | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 -\
\
tt\uc0\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametadv\u257 ray\u257 mi |\

buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu\
\
samayena \uc0\u347 reyako bhik\u7779 urabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattiko\'92bh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 a sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 padyate | tasya bhik\u7779 ava:\
\
pariv\uc0\u257 sa\u7747  dadanto m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pyam\u257 varhanta\u347 ca bahuk\u7771 ty\u257  bahukara\u7751 \u299 y\u257  ri\'f1ca\u7747 tyudde\u347 a\u7747  p\u257 \u7789 ha\u7747  \
\
sv\uc0\u257 dhy\u257 ya\u7747  yoga\u7747  manasik\u257 ramadhy\u257 tma\u7747  ceta:k\u7779 amatham | etat prakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata\
\
\uc0\u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | kuruta y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: \u347 reyakasya bhik\u7779 orabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattikasya [ni]\
\
marha\uc0\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma iti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: k\u257 ra\u7751 airnigarha\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tamadharmakarma tadavinayakarma ca sa\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena s\u257 tis\u257 ra: |\
\
katamai: pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: | acodayitv\u257  kurvanti | asm\u257 rayitv\u257  avastukamapratij\'f1ay\u257  asa\u7747 mukh\u299 bh\u363 tasya \
\
kurvanti | pa\uc0\u7747 cabhistu k\u257 ra\u7751 airnigarha\u7751 \u299 ya karma k\u7771 ta\u7747  dharmakarma ca tadvinayakarma ca sa\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena \
\
[na] s\uc0\u257 tis\u257 ra: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | codayitva # kurvanti | sm\u257 rayitv\u257  savastuka\u7747  pratij\'f1ay\u257  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 mukh\u299 bh\u363 tasya |\
\

\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | aya\u7747  \u347 reyako bhik\u7779 urabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattika: abh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 a\u7747  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 -\

m\uc0\u257 pattim\u257 padyate | tadasya bhik\u7779 ava: pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dadanto m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pyam\u257 varhanta\u347 ca\

bahuk\uc0\u7771 ty\u257  bhavanti bahukara\u7751 \u299 y\u257  ri\'f1ca\u7747 tyudde\u347 a\u7747  p\u257 \u7789 ha\u7747  sv\u257 dhy\u257 ya\u7747  yoga\u7747  manasik\u257 ramadhy\u257 tma\u7747  ceta:-\

\
yu\uc0\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante \u347 reyakasya bhik\u7779 orabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattikasya nigarha\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kartu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na \

\uc0\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 tena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  na pravr\u257 jayitavyam | nopasa\u7747 p\u257 dayitavyam | na ni\u347 rayo deya: |\

[na] \uc0\u347 rama\u7751 odde\u347 a upasth\u257 payitavya: | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vattarjan\u299 yakarmak\u7771 tasya vaktavyam | nigarha-\
\
\uc0\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 to bhik\u7779 uryath\u257  praj\'f1apt\u257 n\u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 nna sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartate s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati |\

\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | aya\u7747  \u347 reyako bhik\u7779 urabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattika: p\u363 rvavady\u257 vadadhy\u257 tma\u7747  ceta:- \

\uc0\u347 amatham | tasya sa\u7747 ghen\u257 bh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattika iti nigarha\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 tamos\u257 rayediti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: |\

p\uc0\u363 rvavady\u257 vat abh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattikatv\u257 cca prativiram\u257 m\u299 ti vadati | sa cetsa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 ame-\

\
dhy\uc0\u257 tma\u7747  ceta:\u347 amatham | tadasya sa\u7747 ghen\u257 bh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattika iti nigarha\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tam | so\'92ya\u7747  \
\
\uc0\u347 reyako bhik\u7779 urabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattiko nigarha\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta utkacaprakaca: sa\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayati | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  \

pravartayati | sam\uc0\u299 c\u299 mupadar\u347 ayati | anta:s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sthitv\u257  os\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 \u7747  y\u257 cate | abh\u299 -\
\
k\uc0\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattikatv\u257 cca prativiram\u257 m\u299 ti vadati | tatsa\u7747 gha: \u347 reyaka\u7747  bhik\u7779 umabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattika\u7747  nigarha\u7751 \u299 ya- \
\
karmak\uc0\u7771 tamos\u257 rayati | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante \u347 reyaka\u7747  bhik\u7779 umabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattika\u7747  nigarha\u7751 \u299 yak\u7771 ta-\
mos\uc0\u257 rayitu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257 \
t\uc0\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  kartavy\u257  | os\u257 rita: sa\u7747 ghena \u347 reyako bhik\u7779 urabh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 \u257 pattiko nigarha\u7751 \u299 ya-\
\
karmak\uc0\u7771 ta: | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 tt\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametadv\u257 ray\u257 mi |\

t\uc0\u257 vim\u257 nyeva\u7747 r\u363 p\u257 \u7751 ya\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 ak\u257 ni karm\u257 \u7751 i kuruta: k\u257 rayata: | tadyath\u257  m\u257 t\u7771 gr\u257 me\u7751 a  s\u257 rdha\u7747  \

sa\uc0\u7747 jalpata: sa\u7747 kr\u299 \u7693 ata: sa\u7747 kil\u299 kil\u257 yete | audatya\u7747  drava\u7747  k\u257 yit\u257 ntya\u7747  kuruta: | apyed\u257 n\u299 me-\

pu\uc0\u7779 p\u257 \u7751 yuccinuta: ucc\u257 yayata: | m\u257 l\u257  grathn\u299 ta: grathn\u257 payata: | avata\u7747 sak\u257 n badhn\u299 ta:\

abhy\uc0\u257 gat\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  pratisara\u7751 a\u7747  sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: | y\u257 vadapare\u7751 a samayen\u257 yu\u7779 mata uttarasy\u257 nyatamasmin \

pa\uc0\u7747 ca\u347 atapariv\u257 ro janapadac\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  caran mrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7747 \u7693 amanupr\u257 pta: | a\u347 rau\u7779 \u299 ccitro g\u7771 hapatiryath\u257  \

k\uc0\u257 nte ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: | ek\u257 ntani\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a\u7747  citra\u7747  g\u7771 hapatim\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nupaseno dharmyay\u257  kathay\u257  sa\u7747 dar\u347 ayati \

@010\

g\uc0\u7771 hapatest\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 \u7747 bh\u257 vena | atha citro g\u7771 hapatir\u257 yu\u7779 mata upasenasya t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 \u7747 bh\u257 ven\u257 dhiv\u257 san\u257 \u7747 \

viditv\uc0\u257  \u347 ucipra\u7751 \u299 ta\u7747  kh\u257 dan\u299 yabhojan\u299 ya\u7747  samud\u257 n\u299 ya kalyamevotth\u257 y\u257 san\u257 ni praj\'f1apayati |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 \u7747 \u347 cottarastasm\u257 tkarva\u7789 ak\u257 d\u257 gato y\u257 vatpa\u347 yati na \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  n\u257 py\u257 h\u257 ra-\
\
mup\uc0\u257 nv\u257 h\u7771 tam | sa \u257 r\u257 mikam\u257 mantrayate | bhavanta: kimalpotsuk\u257 sti\u7779 \u7789 hatha | n\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti:\
\
kriyate | n\uc0\u257 py\u257 h\u257 ra up\u257 nv\u257 hriyate | ki\u7747   bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 ghena bhaktaccheda: kara\u7751 \u299 ya iti | te \
\
kathayanti | citre\uc0\u7751 a g\u7771 hapatin\u257  bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 gho\'92ntarg\u7771 he bhaktenopanimantrita: | ki\u7747  mam\u257 gamyam |\
\
na tvay\uc0\u257  m\u257  gamyam | api tu \u257 rya upaseno bal\u257 nt\u299 putra: pa\u7747 ca\u347 atapariv\u257 ro janapadac\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  \
\
carannih\uc0\u257 nupr\u257 pta: | sa \u347 rutv\u257  sa\u7747 j\u257 t\u257 mar\u7779 a: kathayati | aha\u7747  tasya sarvatra p\u363 rva\u7747 gama: |\
\
kathamasau m\uc0\u257 \u7747  praty\u257 khy\u257 y\u257 yu\u7779 mantamupasena\u7747  bal\u257 nt\u299 putra\u7747  bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 ghamupanimantrayati | gacch\u257 mi \
\
t\uc0\u257 vatpa\u347 y\u257 m\u299 ti | sa yena citro g\u7771 hapatistenopasa\u7747 kr\u257 nto y\u257 vatpa\u347 yati citra\u7747  g\u7771 hapatim\u257 sana- \
\
praj\'f1apti\uc0\u7747  kriyam\u257 \u7751 am | sa bh\u363 yasy\u257  m\u257 tray\u257  paryavasthita: | citre\u7751 a g\u7771 hapatin\u257 bhihita: |\
\
\uc0\u257 rya \u347 obhan\u257 \u7747  \u257 sanapraj\'f1apti: | \u347 obhana\u347 c\u257 h\u257 ra iti | citro g\u7771 hapatistilap\u363 p\u257 lik\u257 va\u7751 i-\
\
g\uc0\u257 s\u299 t | uttara: kathayati | g\u7771 hapate \u347 obhan\u257  \u257 h\u257 rapraj\'f1apti: \u347 obhana\u347 c\u257 h\u257 ra: | ki\u7747  tu \
\
tilap\uc0\u363 p\u257 lik\u257  n\u257 sti | sa kathayati | bhadantottara vij\'f1\u257 tam | yena hy\u363 pam\u257 \u7747  t\u257 vacch\u7771 \u7751 u ||\
\
upamay\uc0\u257  ca punarihaike vij\'f1apuru\u7779 \u257  bh\u257 \u7779 itasy\u257 rtham\u257 j\u257 nanti | bh\u363 tap\u363 rva\u7747  bhadantottara sa\u7747 bahul\u257  \
\
j\uc0\u257 mb\u363 dv\u299 pak\u257 : va\u7751 ija: s\u257 mudra\u7747  y\u257 nap\u257 tra\u7747   pratip\u257 dya k\u257 ka\u7747  kukku\u7789 \u299 \u7747  c\u257 d\u257 ya mah\u257 samudramavat\u299 r\u7751 \u257  \
\
dhanah\uc0\u257 rak\u257 : | y\u257 vadasau kukku\u7789 \u299  kukku\u7789 amalabham\u257 n\u257  k\u257 kena s\u257 rdha\u7747  sa\u7747 v\u257 sa\u7747  gat\u257  | tayo: sa\u7747 v\u257 -\
\
s\uc0\u257 ttasy\u257 : \u347 \u257 vako j\u257 ta: | sa k\u257 kakukku\u7789 \u299 ka\u7747  v\u257 \u347 ate | na k\u257 ko na kukku\u7789 a: | evameva \
\
tva\uc0\u7747  mok\u7779 \u257 rth\u299  pravrajito mok\u7779 am\u257 rgamalabham\u257 no tadv\u257  yadv\u257  pralapasi iti | evamukte  \u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 -\

nuttara: t\uc0\u257 \u7693 hakaku\u7747 cik\u257 \u7747  ca tasya purast\u257 duts\u7771 jya sa\u7747 prasthita: | tenokta: | bhadantottara kutra \

gacchasi | \uc0\u347 r\u257 vast\u299 m | svacitta\u7747  pratilabhasva | ihaiva ti\u7779 \u7789 ha | m\u257  gaccha | sth\u257 na-\
\
metadvidyate yattvay\uc0\u257  punar\u257 gaty\u257 hameva k\u7779 amayitavya iti | tasya vacanamavacan\u299 k\u7771 tya sam\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
p\uc0\u257 trac\u299 vara\u7747  yena \u347 r\u257 vast\u299  tena c\u257 rik\u257 \u7747   prakr\u257 nto\'92nup\u363 rve\u7751 a c\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  caran \u347 r\u257 vast\u299 manupr\u257 pta: |\

sa bhik\uc0\u7779 ubhird\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a ukta\u347 ca | sv\u257 gata\u7747  sv\u257 gatam\u257 yu\u7779 mannuttara | pr\u299 t\u257  vaya\u7747  tvaddar\u347 anena | no \
\
tv\uc0\u257 gamanena | ki\u7747  k\u257 ra\u7751 am | tvam\u257 gamya citro g\u7771 hapatirmrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 \u257 y\u257 \u7747  buddhadharmasa\u7747 ghe\u7779 u k\u257 r\u257 n\
\
karoti | \uc0\u257 gantuk\u257 n\u257 \u7747  ca gamik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  ca mrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 a\u7747  pratisara\u7751 am | astyettadevam | may\u257  \

bhagavata \uc0\u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | kuruta y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: uttarasya bhik\u7779 org\u7771 hapateravaspha\u7747 \u7693 a-\

bh\uc0\u363 tasya kurvanti |\

eva\uc0\u7747  ca puna: kartavyam | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  \

\

\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | anenottare\u7751 a bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  mrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 \u257 y\u257 \u7747  citro g\u7771 hapatiravaspha\u7747 \u7693 ita: |\

tatsa\uc0\u7747 gha uttarasya bhik\u7779 org\u7771 hapateravaspha\u7747 \u7693 akasya pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma karoti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  \
\
k\uc0\u7779 amante uttarasya bhik\u7779 org\u7771 hapateravaspha\u7747 \u7693 akasya pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kartu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na \

k\uc0\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257 \u7747  karmav\u257 can\u257  kartavy\u257 |\

k\uc0\u7771 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghenottarasya bhik\u7779 org\u7771 hapateravaspha\u7747 \u7693 akasya pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena \

\

sa eva\uc0\u7747  pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta utkacaprakaca: sa\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayati | ni:sara\u7751 a\u7747  \

@012\

\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | anenottare\u7751 a bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  mrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 \u257 y\u257 \u7747  citro g\u7771 hapatirava- \

spha\uc0\u7747 \u7693 ita: | tadasya  sa\u7747 ghena g\u7771 hapatiravaspha\u7747 \u7693 aka iti k\u7771 tv\u257  pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 yakarma k\u7771 tam |\
\
so\'92yamuttaro bhik\uc0\u7779 u: pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta utkacaprakaca: p\u363 rvavady\u257 vad g\u7771 hapatyavaspha\u7747 \u7693 akatv\u257 cca \
\
prativiram\uc0\u257 m\u299 ti vadati | sa cetsa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: uttara\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7747  pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 tamos\u257 rayediti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | tato vaktavyo gaccha | ta\u7747  \
\
g\uc0\u7771 hapati\u7747  k\u7779 amaya | os\u257 rito bhavi\u7779 yas\u299 ti | sa bhik\u7779 urevamabhihito yena mrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 astena \
\
c\uc0\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  prakr\u257 nto\'92nup\u363 rve\u7751 a c\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  caran mrak\u7779 a\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 amanupr\u257 pta: | tato m\u257 rga\u347 rama\u7747  prativinodya \
\
yena citro g\uc0\u7771 hapatistenopasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | upasa\u7747 kramya dak\u7779 i\u7751 a\u7747  b\u257 humabhipras\u257 rya kathayati |\
\
k\uc0\u7779 amasva mama g\u7771 hapate | k\u7779 \u257 nta\u7747  bhadantottara yadyevamihaiva prativasa | gacch\u257 mi t\u257 vadyena \
\
mam\uc0\u257 par\u257 ddha\u7747  tasya nigraha\u7747  karomi | ki\u7747  may\u257 par\u257 ddham | na tava | yena mam\u257 par\u257 ddham |\

ath\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nuttaro ga\u7749 g\u257 t\u299 ra\u7747  gatv\u257  tribhist\u257 lav\u7771 nta: ku\u7789 ik\u257 \u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  var\u7779 opagata: |\

tena \uc0\u347 ava\u347 \u299 r\u7779 opama\u7747  p\u257 tra\u7747  dh\u257 ritam | tasya n\u257 tid\u363 re m\u257 rga: | tena satata\u7747  gop\u257 \u7749 gan\u257  gacchanti |\

sa t\uc0\u257 s\u257 \u7747  p\u257 tra\u7747  pras\u257 rayati | tasmindadhi v\u257  k\u7779 \u299 ra\u7747  v\u257  uda\u347 vidv\u257 nuprayacchanti | tatparibhujya \
\
dhy\uc0\u257 nasam\u257 dhisam\u257 pattisukh\u257 ni abhin\u257 mayati | y\u257 vadapare\u7751 a samayena dve gop\u257 \u7749 gane gacchato \
\
m\uc0\u257 t\u257  duhit\u257  ca | duhit\u257  m\u257 tu: kathayati | amba e\u7779 a \u257 ryo m\u363 ka iti | s\u257  kathayati |\

putri nai\uc0\u7779 a m\u363 ka: | n\u363 namanena kasyacidv\u257 c\u257 par\u257 ddham | tasy\u257  e\u7779 a  nigraha\u7747  karot\u299 ti | amba\
\
kimetadeva\uc0\u7747  bhavi\u7779 yati | putri \u347 vo\'92ha\u7747  tava pratyak\u7779 \u299 kari\u7779 y\u257 m\u299 ti | y\u257 vadaparasmin divase \
\
mathitagha\uc0\u7789 a\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 tv\u257  duhit\u7771 samet\u257  ta\u7747  prade\u347 am\u257 gat\u257  | \u257 yu\u7779 matottare\u7751 a p\u257 tra\u7747  pras\u257 ritam | \

na sa\uc0\u7747 ti\u7779 \u7789 hate | \u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nuttara: kathayati | ala\u7747  bhagini | kimanena nirarthakena kenacicchori-\

tena | santyanye asmadvidh\uc0\u257 : pratigr\u257 hak\u257  iti | s\u257  kathayati | putrid na tva\u7747  may\u257  p\u363 rvamukt\u257  |\

n\uc0\u257 ya\u7747  m\u363 ka: | n\u363 namanena kasyacidv\u257 c\u257 par\u257 ddham | tasy\u257  e\u7779 a nigraha\u7747  karot\u299 ti | avocastva-\

mamba iti | tatr\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257  uttare\u7751 a dv\u257 bhy\u257 mantarvar\u7779 \u257 bhy\u257 mek\u257  v\u257 gbh\u257 \u7779 it\u257  | t\u7771 t\u299 ye\'92ntarvar\u7779 a\

vidhva\uc0\u7747 sanadharmatay\u257  par\u257 h\u7771 tya tama:ska\u7747 dha: prad\u257 lita: | arhan sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vatp\u363 jyo\

vimuktacitto hi arhannim\uc0\u257  g\u257 th\u257  abh\u257 \u7779 ata ||5||\

buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n kau\u347 \u257 mby\u257 \u7747  viharati gho\u7779 il\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu samayen\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 \u7747 \u347 chanda \
\
\uc0\u257 pattim\u257 panno na pa\u347 yati | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha |\
\
kuruta y\uc0\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava\u347 chandasya bhik\u7779 or\u257 patteradar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma iti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92-\
\
pyeva\uc0\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: k\u257 ra\u7751 air\u257 patteradar\u347 an\u257 dutk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tamadharmakarma ca tada [vinaya] karma\
\
ca sa\uc0\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena s\u257 tis\u257 ra: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: |\u257 codayitv\u257  kurvanti p\u363 rvavady\u257 vadekena \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma karttavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | aya\u7747  chando bhik\u7779 ur\u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na pratikaroti |\
\
sa cetsa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha\u347 chandasya bhik\u7779 or\u257 patteradar\u347 an\u257 yo-\
\
tk\uc0\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kury\u257 diti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | aya\u7747  chando bhik\u7779 ur\u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na pratikaroti |\
\
tatsa\uc0\u7747 gha\u347 chandasya bhik\u7779 or\u257 patteradar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma karoti | yath\u257  c\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  [k\u7779 amante] \
\
chandasya bhik\uc0\u7779 or\u257 patteradar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kartu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m |\
\
iya\uc0\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vadyath\u257  p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n\u257 metadeva nid\u257 nam |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 \u7747 \u347 chanda \u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na pratikaroti | sa sabrahmac\u257 ribhirarthak\u257 mai:\
\
p\uc0\u363 rvavadyath\u257  vibha\u7749 ge | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | kuruta y\u363 ya\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava\u347 chandasya bhik\u7779 or\u257 patterapratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma iti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: k\u257 ra\u7751 air\u257 patterapratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tamadharmakarma ca tadavinayakarma [ca]\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena s\u257 tis\u257 ra: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | acosayitv\u257  kurvanti | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vadekena \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | aya\u7747  chando bhik\u7779 ur\u257 pattim\u257 panno  yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na pratikaroti |\
\
sa cetsa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha\u347 chandasya bhik\u7779 or\u257 patterapratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 epa-\
\
\uc0\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kury\u257 diti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | karma kartavyam| \
\
@014\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | aya\u7747  chando bhik\u7779 ur\u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na pratikaroti |\
\
tatsa\uc0\u7747 gha\u347 chandasya bhik\u7779 or\u257 patterapratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma karoti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante-\
\
cchandasya bhik\uc0\u7779 or\u257 patterapratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kartu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m |\
\
iya\uc0\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vatp\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n\u257 m |\
\
buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu \
\
samayen\uc0\u257 ri\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 oridameva\u7747 r\u363 pa\u7747  p\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpannam | tath\u257 ha\u7747  bhagavato dharma\u7747  de\u347 ita-\
\
m\uc0\u257 j\u257 n\u257 mi yath\u257  ye \u257 ntar\u257 yik\u257  dharm\u257  ukt\u257  bhagavat\u257  te ca pratisevyam\u257 n\u257  n\u257 lamantar\u257 y\u257 ya \
\
iti | etatprakara\uc0\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | kuruta y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: \
\
ari\uc0\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 orapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma iti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92-\
\
pyeva\uc0\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: k\u257 ra\u7751 airapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tamadharmakarma ca \
\
tadavinayakarma ca sa\uc0\u7747 gha\u347 ca tena s\u257 tis\u257 ra: | katamai: pa\u7747 cabhi: | acodayitv\u257  kurvanti | \
\
p\uc0\u363 rvavady\u257 vadekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asy\u257 ri\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 oridameva\u7747 rupa\u7747  p\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpannam |\
\
tath\uc0\u257 ha\u7747  bhagavato dharma\u7747  de\u347 itam\u257 j\u257 n\u257 mi yath\u257  ye \u257 ntar\u257 yik\u257  dharm\u257  ukt\u257  bhagavat\u257  \
\
p\uc0\u363 rvavady\u257 vat sa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 ty\u257 sa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: ari\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 orapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e \
\
p\uc0\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kury\u257 diti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asy\u257 ri\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 oridameva\u7747 r\u363 pa\u7747  p\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpannam |\
\
tath\uc0\u257 ha\u7747  bhagavato dharma de\u347 itam\u257 j\u257 n\u257 mi p\u363 rvavady\u257 vat sa\u7747 gha: ari\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 orapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e \
\
p\uc0\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma karoti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante ari\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 oraprati-\
\
nis\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma kartu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747 \
\
pratham\uc0\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  p\u363 rvavady\u257 vat p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitik\u257 n\u257 m |\
\
sa e\uc0\u7779 a: apratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta utkacaprakaca: sa\u7747 ghe roma\
\
p\uc0\u257 tayati | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vad d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igata\u7747  pratinis\u7771 j\u257 m\u299 ti vadati | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata\
\
\uc0\u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | os\u257 rayata y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: ari\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747   bhik\u7779 umapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 tamiti | y ov\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: k\u257 ra\u7751 ai: pratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta os\u257 rayitavya: | \
\
katamai: pa\uc0\u7747 cabhi: | utkacaprakaca: sa\u7747 ghe roma p\u257 tayati  | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vadekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  \
\
@015\
\
k\uc0\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asy\u257 ri\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 oridameva\u7747 r\u363 pa\u7747  p\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpannam |\
\
tath\uc0\u257 ha\u7747  bhagavato dharma\u7747  de\u347 itam\u257 j\u257 n\u257 mi yath\u257  ye \u257 ntar\u257 yik\u257  dharm\u257  ukt\u257  \
\
bhagavat\uc0\u257  te pratisevyam\u257 n\u257  n\u257 lamantar\u257 y\u257 ya iti | tadasya sa\u7747 ghena pratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma k\u7771 tam | so\'92yamari\u7779 \u7789 o bhik\u7779 urapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa-\
\
\uc0\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 ta utkacaprakaca: p\u363 rvavady\u257 vad d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igata\u7747  ca pratinis\u7771 j\u257 m\u299 ti vadati | sac et-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: ari\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 umapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate \
\
utk\uc0\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 tamos\u257 rayediti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asy\u257 ri\u7779 \u7789 asya bhik\u7779 oridameva\u7747 r\u363 pa\u7747  p\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpannam |\
\
p\uc0\u363 rvavady\u257 vat sa\u7747 gha: ari\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 umapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utpek\u7779 a\u7751 \u299 yakarmak\u7771 tamos\u257 rayati |\
\
ye\uc0\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante ari\u7779 \u7789 amapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utpek\u7779 a\u7751 \u299 yakarma k\u7771 ta mos\u257 rayitu\u7747  \
\
te t\uc0\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257 \
\
karmav\uc0\u257 can\u257  | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vat t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametadv\u257 ray\u257 mi |\
\
buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu\
\
samayen\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nud\u257 y\u299  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sa-\
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 m |sa etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 rocayati | aham\u257 yu\u7779 manta\u7747  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | ki\u7747  may\u257  kara\u7751 \u299 yam | ityetatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | dadata y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
pariv\uc0\u257 samiti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca punard\u257 tavya: | ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya \
\
p\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 nsamanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sa\u7747 nipatite ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  v\u7771 ddh\u257 nte \
\
utku\uc0\u7789 ukena sthitv\u257  a\'f1jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya pariv\u257 so y\u257 citavya: | eva\u7747  ca punary\u257 citavya: |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ahamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya \
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | so\'92hamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
y\uc0\u257 ce | dad\u257 tu me bhadanta: sa\u7747 gho mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte:sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 samanukampay\u257 nukamp\u257 mup\u257 d\u257 ya |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\

@016\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | so\'92yamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
y\uc0\u257 cate | sa cetsa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
pariv\uc0\u257 sa\u7747  dady\u257 diti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukra-\
\
vis\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | so\'92yamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamuthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  y\u257 cate |\
\
tasa\uc0\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 i samutthit\u257 y\u257 \
\
ardham\uc0\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dad\u257 ti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante ud\u257 yino\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticcha-\
\
nn\uc0\u257 y\u257  ardha\u7747 m\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  d\u257 tu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 - \
\
can\uc0\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  kartavy\u257  | data: sa\u7747 ghe [na] ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
pariv\uc0\u257 sa: | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena [yasm\u257 t] t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametaddh\u257 ray\u257 mi |\
\
sa p\uc0\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  prati-\
\
cchann\uc0\u257 m | sa etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 rocayati | [ahamasmi] \u257 yu\u7779 manta ud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u:\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | tena may\u257  \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa-\
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 soy\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : ardham\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
[pariv\uc0\u257 sa:] | so\'92ha\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747 \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 m | ki\u7747  may\u257  kara\u7751 \u299 yamiti  | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | dadata y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patterantar\u257 patte:\
\
p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 patti [prati] r\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 samiti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca punard\u257 tavya: | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 nsamanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sa\u7747 nipatite ud\u257 yin\u257   bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257  v\u7771 ddh\u257 nte utku\u7789 ukena \
\
sthitv\uc0\u257  a\u7747 jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam |\
\
@017\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ahamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | [tena may\u257 ] ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardha-\
\
m\uc0\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte:\

sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ha\u7747  \

so\'92hamud\uc0\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patterantar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 :\
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747  [y\u257 ce] | dad\u257 tu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gho mamod\u257 yino\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : \u257 patterantar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 la-\
\
pariv\uc0\u257 samanukampay\u257 nukamp\u257 mup\u257 d\u257 ya | eva\u7747  dvirapi trirapi | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747 \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam | \
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\

\
\uc0\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 i samutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  \

pariv\uc0\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghen\u257 syod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: \

@018\

y\uc0\u257 cate | tatsa\u7747 gha ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747  dad\u257 ti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  [\u257 patte] rantar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747  d\u257 tu\u7747  \
\
te t\uc0\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  \
\
karmav\uc0\u257 can\u257  vaktavy\u257  | datta: sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patterantar\u257 patte: \

\
metaddh\uc0\u257 ray\u257 mi |\

sa m\uc0\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  \

ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardha-\

\
rasy\uc0\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257 : ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: |\

\
nn\uc0\u257 m | tena may\u257  ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 :\

praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | data: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ha\u7747 \

m\uc0\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattim [antar\u257 pattiprati]r\u363 p\u257 \u7747  \

praticchann\uc0\u257 m | ki\u7747  may\u257  kara\u7751 \u299 yamiti | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747   bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti |\

\
pattipratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 amiti | yo v\u257  punaranyo\'92pyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\

eva\uc0\u7747  ca punard\u257 tavya: | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 nsamanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sannipatite ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  v\u7771 ddh\u257 nte utku\u7789 ukena \

sthitv\uc0\u257  a\'f1jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam |\

\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ahamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\

@019\

sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\
antar\uc0\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ha\u7747  m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika\
\
eva sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | so\'92hamasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  y\u257 ce |\
\
dad\uc0\u257 tu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gho mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattiprati- \
\
r\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 amanukampay\u257 nukamp\u257 mup\u257 d\u257 ya | eva\u7747  dvirapi trirapi | tata: \
\
pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma\u7747  kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so\
\
y\uc0\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghen\u257 syod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika \
\
eva sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 patti [pratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747 ] praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 [sy\u257 :] sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 :\

sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghenod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\
antar\uc0\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 patti[prati]r\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika \
\
eva sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | so\'92yamasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  y\u257 cate |\
\
sa cet sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  dady\u257 diti |\
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\'f1cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so \
\
y\uc0\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghen\u257 syod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukra- \
\
vis\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika eva \
\
@020\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patterantar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 la- \
\
pariv\uc0\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghen\u257 syod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte:\
\
p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sa\u7747 gh\u257 va-\
\
\uc0\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 patti[mantar\u257 ] pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | so\'92yamasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va-\
\
\uc0\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  y\u257 cate |\
\
tatsa\uc0\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 -m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  dad\u257 ti | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  d\u257 tu\u7747  te \
\
t\uc0\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  \
\
kartavy\uc0\u257  | datta: sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 patti- \
\
pratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a: | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 tt\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametaddh\u257 ray\u257 mi |\
\
so\'92pare\uc0\u7751 a samayena sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa- \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: antar\u257 patte: paryu\u7779 itam\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: pratyantar\u257 patterm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a-\
\
paryu\uc0\u7779 ito bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 rocayati | ahamasmy\u257 yu\u7779 manta ud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: \
\

\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardha-\

sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 i samutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ha\u7747 \
\
p\uc0\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 mapattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m |\
\
tena may\uc0\u257  ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 :\

praticchann\uc0\u257 m | tena may\u257  ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 patti-\

pratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 o y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino \

so\'92hamasy\uc0\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 saprati-\
\
cchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: | antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  \

@021\
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita: | pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita: | ki\u7747  may\u257  \
\
kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yam | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha| dadata y\u363 ya\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  \
\
ardham\uc0\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 saparyu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sasy\u257 ntar\u257 patterm\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasya pratyantar\u257 -\
\
patterm\uc0\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itasya \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pyamiti | yo v\u257  punaranyopyeva\u7747 j\u257 t\u299 ya: |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca punard\u257 tavya: | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747   k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 nsamanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sa\u7747 nipatite ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  v\u7771 ddh\u257 nte utku\u7789 ukena \
\
sthitv\uc0\u257  a\u7747 jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam | \
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ahamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\

sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \

\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: |\

so\'92ha\uc0\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 m | tena may\u257  ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 patti-\
\
pratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: |\
\
so\'92ha\uc0\u7747  m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 patti-\
\
pratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | tena may\u257  ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patte-\
\
rantar\uc0\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 o y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghena \
\
mamod\uc0\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 \
\
m\uc0\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a: |\
\
so\'92hamud\uc0\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  \
\
ardham\uc0\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: antar\u257 patterm\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita: pratyantar\u257 patterm\u363 l\u257 -\
\
pakar\uc0\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita: sa\u7747 gh\u257 t \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  y\u257 ce | dad\u257 tu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gho mamod\u257 yino\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 -\
\
y\uc0\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sasya antar\u257 patterm\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasya pratyantar\u257 patterm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itasya \
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pyamanukampay\u257 nukamp\u257 mup\u257 d\u257 ya | eva\u7747  dvirapi trirapi | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  \
\
j\'f1apti\uc0\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma karttavyam |\

@022\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so\
\
y\uc0\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghenod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika\
\
eva san sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 \
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | data: sa\u7747 ghen\u257 syod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte:\
\
p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  [m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747 ] m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva san \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 patti [mantar\u257 patti] pratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 neno-\
\
d\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 : \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 o y\u257 cita: | datta: sa\u7747 ghen\u257 syod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 :\
\
pratyantar\uc0\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a: |\
\
so\'92yamud\uc0\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 i samutthit\u257 y\u257  \
\
ardham\uc0\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 \
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita: pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita:\
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  y\u257 cate | sa cetsa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yino \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : \
\
paryu\uc0\u7779 itapariv\u257 sasy\u257 ntar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasya \
\

\
dady\uc0\u257 diti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam |\
\

\
pariv\uc0\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghenod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \
