ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 :, sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257 \
\
ardham\uc0\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sen\u257 ntar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  \
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itena pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itena \
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  y\u257 citam | datta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena mamod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte:\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sasy\u257 ntar\u257 patte: \
\
p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasya pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 -\
\
y\uc0\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itasya \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pyam  | so\'92hamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 :\
\
paryu\uc0\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita:\
\
pratyantar\uc0\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita: \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  c\u299 r\u7751 am\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 d\u257 barha\u7751 a\u7747  y\u257 ce | \u257 varhatu m\u257 \u7747  bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yina\u7747  bhik\u7779 umasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : pariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itamantar\u257 -\
\
patte: p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita\u7747  pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattiprati-\
\
r\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita\u7747  \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  c\u299 r\u7751 am\u257 n\u257 pyamanukampay\u257 nukamp\u257 mup\u257 d\u257 -\
\
yeti | eva\uc0\u7747  dvirapi trirapi | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya \
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so \
\
@026\
\
y\uc0\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika \
\
eva san sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 \
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \
\
antar\uc0\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika\
\
eva san sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 o y\u257 cita: |\
\
datto\'92sya sa\uc0\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattiprati-\
\
r\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a: | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sena \
\
antar\uc0\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itena pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 -\
\
pattipratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itena sa\u7747 gh\u257 t \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  y\u257 citam |\
\
dattamasya sa\uc0\u7747 ghenod\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamu-\
\
tthit\uc0\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sasy\u257 ntar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 :\
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasya pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu-\
\
\uc0\u7779 itasya \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  c\u299 r\u7751 am\u257 n\u257 pyam | so\'92yamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257 \u7747  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 patti-\
\
pratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747 paryu\u7779 ita: pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita: \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  caritam\u257 n\u257 pyam sa\u7747 gh\u257 d\u257 varha\u7751 a\u7747  y\u257 cate | sa \
\
cetsa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yina\u7747  bhik\u7779 umasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 :\
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 samanta-\
\
r\uc0\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita\u7747  pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 patti-\
\
pratir\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita\u7747  \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  caritam\u257 n\u257 pyam\u257 varhediti | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 davas\u257 dayitavya: | na s\u257 dh\u363 d\u257 yi [n] k\u7771 tam | na su\u7779 \u7789 hu k\u7771 tam |\
\
kathamid\uc0\u257 n\u299 \u7747  tva\u7747  tasya bhagavatastath\u257 gatasy\u257 rhata: samyaksa\u7747 buddhasyaiva\u7747  [dharme] r\u257 gavir\u257 g\u257 ya \
\
cetovimukta: | praj\'f1\uc0\u257 vimukte dharma de\u347 yam\u257 ne dve\u7779 avir\u257 g\u257 ya mohavir\u257 g\u257 ya cetovimukta: |\
\
praj\'f1\uc0\u257 vimukte dharme de\u347 yam\u257 ne idameva\u7747 r\u363 pamapr\u257 s\u257 dikamak\u257 r\u7779 \u299 : | vara\u7747  khalu te \
\
@027\
\
mohapuru\uc0\u7779 a \u257 \u347 \u299 vi\u7779 o ghoravi\u7779 a: k\u7771 \u7779 \u7751 asarpast\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 avi\u7779 a: ubh\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  p\u257 \u7751 ibhy\u257 \u7747  pratig\u7771 h\u299 to\'92\
\
bhavi\uc0\u7779 yat na tvevamidameva\u7747 r\u363 pamapr\u257 s\u257 dika\u7747  k\u7771 tam |\
\
dv\uc0\u257 vimau dharmolk\u257 \u7747  nirv\u257 payato dharm\u257 loka\u7747  dharm\u257 bh\u257 \u7747  dharmaprabh\u257 sa\u7747  dharmaprad\u299 pa\u7747  dharmapradyotam |\
\
katamau dvau  | ya\uc0\u347 c\u257 pattim\u257 padyate | ya\u347 c\u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na pratikaroti | dv\u257 vagham\u363 la\u7747  \
\
na khanate: pratisroto [na] vy\uc0\u257 yacchato na sarit\u257 \u7747  lat\u257 \u7747  \u347 o\u7779 ayato na m\u257 ra\u7747  yodhayato\
\
na m\uc0\u257 radhvaja\u7747  p\u257 tayato na dharmadhvajamucchr\u257 payato na tath\u257 gatasya dharmya\u7747  dharmacakra\u7747  prava[rtaya]ta:\
\
[na] tamanupravartayata: | katamau dvau | ya\uc0\u347 c\u257 pattim\u257 padyate | ya\u347 c\u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  na \
\
pratikaroti | \
\
anay\uc0\u257  tvamud\u257 yinn\u257 patty\u257  ade\u347 itay\u257  apratide\u347 itay\u257  abhavyo\'92nityasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 \
\
anitye du:khasa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  du:khe an\u257 tmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \u257 h\u257 re apratir\u363 pasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 : sarvaloke anabhira-\
\
tisa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \u257 d\u299 navasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 : prah\u257 \u7751 asa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vir\u257 gasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  nirodhasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  mara\u7751 asa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 \
\
vin\uc0\u299 lakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vip\u363 yakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vy\u257 dhm\u257 takasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vipa\u7789 umukasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vikh\u257 ditakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \
\
vilohitakasa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  asthisa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vik\u7779 iptakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 : \u347 \u363 nyat\u257 pratyavek\u7779 a\u7751 asa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 : | abhavya:\
\
prathamasya dhy\uc0\u257 nasya  dvit\u299 yasya t\u7771 t\u299 yasya dhy\u257 nasya caturthasya maitry\u257 : karu\u7751 \u257 y\u257  mudit\u257 y\u257 \
\
upek\uc0\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 k\u257 \u347 \u257 nanty\u257 yatanasya vij\'f1\u257 n\u257 nanty\u257 yatanasya \u257 ki\u7747 cany\u257 yatanasya naivasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 n\u257 -\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 yatanasya srota\u257 pattiphalasya sak\u7771 d\u257 g\u257 miphalasya an\u257 g\u257 miphalasya r\u803 \u772 ddhivi\u7779 ayasya \
\
divyasya \uc0\u347 rotrasya ceta: pary\u257 yasya p\u363 rvaniv\u257 sasya cyutyupap\u257 dasy\u257 sravak\u7779 ayasya | anay\u257  te \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yinn\u257 patty\u257  ade\u347 itay\u257  apratide\u347 itay\u257  dvayorgatyoranyatar\u257 nyatar\u257  gati: pratik\u257 \u7747 k\u7779 i-\
\
tavy\uc0\u257  | narak\u257  v\u257  tirya\'f1co v\u257  | ukta\u7747  bhagavat\u257  | dve praticchannakarm\u257 ntasya gat\u299  | narak\u257  \
\
v\uc0\u257  tirya\'f1co v\u257  | ye me bh\u257 \u7779 ita\u7747  na \u347 raddh\u257 syanti te praticch\u257 dayitavya\u7747  ma\u7747 syante |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ayamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena ud\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 dardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 so\
\
y\uc0\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya\
\
\uc0\u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sa\u7747  pariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika\
\
eva san sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena \

ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  \
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 so y\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  antar\u257 - \

@028\
\
patte: p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa: | so\'92ya\u7747  m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva \
\
san sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | ten\u257 nena \
\
ud\uc0\u257 yin\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 nm\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 o y\u257 cita: | datto\'92sya sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 : \
\
pratyantar\uc0\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a: | ten\u257 tena ud\u257 yin\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 sy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 saprati- \
\
cchann\uc0\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sena antar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa-\
\
paryu\uc0\u7779 itena pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itena sa\u7747 gh\u257 t \
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  y\u257 citam | dattamasya sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 yino bhik\u7779 orasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sasy\u257 ntar\u257 patte:\
\
p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasy\u257 ntar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 :\
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 itasya pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  \
\
m\uc0\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 itasya \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747   m\u257 n\u257 pyam | so\'92yamud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte:\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: antar\u257 patte:\
\
p\uc0\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita: pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattiprati-\
\
r\uc0\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita: \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tram caritam\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  sa\u7747 gh\u257 d\u257 varha\u7751 a\u7747  y\u257 cate |\
\
tatsa\uc0\u7747 gha: ud\u257 yina\u7747  bhik\u7779 umasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 i-\
\
samutthit\uc0\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 : paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 samantar\u257 patte: p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 :\
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 y\u257  m\u363 lapariv\u257 saparyu\u7779 ita\u7747  pratyantar\u257 patterantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 y\u257 : praticchann\u257 y\u257  \
\
m\uc0\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 aparyu\u7779 ita\u7747  \u7779 a\u7693 r\u257 tra\u7747  caritam\u257 n\u257 pyam\u257 varhati | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747   k\u7779 amante ud\u257 yina\u7747  bhik\u7779 u-\
\
masy\uc0\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 y\u257  ardham\u257 sapraticchann\u257 y\u257 :\
\

\
m\uc0\u257 n\u257 pyam\u257 varhitu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | [eva\u7747 ]\
\
dvit\uc0\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  kartavy\u257  | \u257 varhita: sa\u7747 ghena ud\u257 y\u299  bhik\u7779 urasy\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 y\u257 \
\

tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 duts\u257 hayitavya: | s\u257 dh\u363 d\u257 yin k\u7771 tam | su\u7779 \u7789 hu k\u7771 tam | dvau pa\u7751 \u7693 itau dvau\

vyaktau dvau satpuru\uc0\u7779 au | ya\u347 c\u257 patti\u7747  n\u257 padyate ya\u347 c\u257 pattim\u257 panno yath\u257 dharma\u7747  pratikaroti | dvau \

dharmolk\uc0\u257 \u7747  prajv\u257 layato dharm\u257 loka\u7747  dharm\u257 bh\u257 \u7747  dharmaprabh\u257 \u7747  dharm\u257 vabh\u257 sa\u7747  dharmaprad\u299 pa\u7747  dharmapradyotam |\

anay\uc0\u257   tvamud\u257 yinn\u257 patty\u257  de\u347 itay\u257  bhavyo\'92nityasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  anitye du:khasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \

du:khe an\uc0\u257 tmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \u257 h\u257 re apratik\u363 lasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 : sarvaloke anabhiratisa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \u257 d\u299 -\
\
navasa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  prah\u257 \u7751 asa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vir\u257 gasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  nirodhasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  mara\u7751 asa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257   a\u347 ubhasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 \

vin\uc0\u299 lakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vip\u363 yakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vipa\u7789 umukasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vy\u257 dhm\u257 takasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  vikh\u257 ditakasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257  \
\

buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu\

samayena ud\uc0\u257 y\u299  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sa\u7747 cintya \u347 ukravis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 isamutthit\u257 mardham\u257 saprati-\

uddi\uc0\u347 yam\u257 ne evam\u257 ha 'id\u257 n\u299 maham\u257 yu\u7779 manto j\u257 ne yath\u257 [ya\u7747 ] dharma: s\u363 tragata: s\u363 trapary\u257 panna\'92\

iti | ta\uc0\u7747  cedbhik\u7779 avo j\u257 n\u299 ran sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: p\u363 rvo\'92yam\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n dve tr\u299 \u7751 i v\u257  po\u7779 adhakarm\u257 \u7751 i\

\
ath\uc0\u257 para: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: | sa tvardham\u257 sa\u7747  pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 a uddi\u347 ya-\
\

\
ta\uc0\u7747  cedbhik\u7779 avo na j\u257 n\u299 ran sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: p\u363 rvo\'92yam\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n dve tr\u299 \u7751 i v\u257  po\u7779 adhakarm\u257 \u7751 i ka: \

\
yath\uc0\u257 dharma\u7747  k\u257 rayitavya: | yath\u257  j\u257 n\u257 tyeva\u7747  smarati |\
\
ath\uc0\u257 para: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: | sa t\u257 \u7747  m\u257 sa\u7747  na j\u257 n\u257 ti |\
\

\
pariv\uc0\u257 so data: | sa p\u257 riv\u257 sika: sann\u257 gat\u257 gat\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 rocayati | ahamasmy\u257 yu\u7779 manta: \

\
yath\uc0\u257  j\u257 n\u257 tyeva\u7747  smarati |\

@032\

\
karm\uc0\u257 yo\u7749 k\u7779 iptaken\u257 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 vevamapratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 iptaken\u257 \u7779 \u7789 au |\

p\uc0\u257 riv\u257 sika: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panno vibhr\u257 nta: | sa \u257 gatya punarupa-\

sa\uc0\u7747 panna: | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | aparyu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa\u7747 \
\
[parivasa]tu | paryu\uc0\u7779 itapariv\u257 so bhavi\u7779 yat\u299 ti |\
\
yath\uc0\u257  vibhr\u257 nta eva\u7747  \u347 rama\u7751 odde\u347 akatva\u7747  pratij\u257 n\u257 ti | unmattakatva\u7747  [vi]k\u7779 iptacittakatva\u7747  \
\
vedan\uc0\u257 bhinnakatvamadar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 iptakatvamapratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 iptakatvam  |\
\
paryu\uc0\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panno vibhr\u257 nta: | sa \u257 gatya punarupa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 panna: | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa ev\u257 sau\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: pudgala: | dadat\u257 sya m\u257 n\u257 pyamiti |\
\
yath\uc0\u257  vibhr\u257 nta: [eva\u7747  \u347 rama\u7751 odde\u347 a]katva\u7747  pratij\u257 n\u257 ti | p\u363 rvavadeva pey\u257 lo y\u257 vada- \
\
pratinis\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 iptakatvam |\
\
m\uc0\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rika: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panno vibhr\u257 nta: | sa \u257 gatya punarupa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 panna: | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | acarita\u7747  caratu |\

adar\uc0\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 iptaka: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: apraticchann\u257 m |[sa]\

m\uc0\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  datta\u7747  dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa m\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rika eva san \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | tasya sa\u7747 ghena\
\
m\uc0\u363 lam\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  datta\u7747  dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | [sa] m\u363 lam\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rika eva\
\
san sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747   praticchann\u257 m | tasya sa\u7747 ghena \
\
m\uc0\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 am\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  datta\u7747  dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | \u257 vr\u299 \u7693 hastvadharme\u7751 a | ayamucyate \
\
ekade\uc0\u347 ak\u257 laka: pudgala: a\u347 uddha: avyutthitastasy\u257  [\u257 ]patterna parimucyate |\
\
ath\uc0\u257 para: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: [a]praticchann\u257 m | tasya sa\u7747 ghena \
\
m\uc0\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  datta\u7747  dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa m\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rika eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 -\
\
m\uc0\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | tasya sa\u7747 ghena m\u363 lam\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  \
\
datta\uc0\u7747  dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa m\u363 l\u257 m\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rika eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 patti-\
\
m\uc0\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimantar\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | tasya sa\u7747 ghena m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 am\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  \
\
datta\uc0\u7747  dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | \u257 vr\u299 \u7693 ho\'92pi dharme\u7751 a | ayamucyate apagatak\u257 laka: \
\
pudgala: \uc0\u347 uddho vyutthitastasy\u257  [\u257 ]patte: parimucyate |\
\
dvau pudgalau sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 pannau de\u347 ayi\u7779 y\u257 vo de\u347 ayi\u7779 y\u257 va iti | tatraiko\
\
de\uc0\u347 ayati dvit\u299 yo na de\u347 ayati | tatra yo\'92sau na de\u347 ayati ta\u7747  sa\u7747 bahul\u257  vinay\u257 tis\u257 ri\u7751 \u299 - \
\
rdu\uc0\u7779 \u7789 hul\u257  \u257 patt\u299 rde\u347 ayitv\u257  pa\u347 c\u257 tpariv\u257 so deya: m\u363 lapariv\u257 so m\u257 n\u257 pyam  | \u257 varhitavya\u347 ca |\
\
@040\
\
dvau pudgalau sa\uc0\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 pannau | t\u257 vasminnev\u257 se pudgalasy\u257 ntike \
\
de\uc0\u347 ayi\u7779 y\u257 vo de\u347 ayi\u7779 y\u257 va iti | tatraiko de\u347 ayati dvit\u299 yo na de\u347 ayati | tatra yo\'92sau \
\
na de\uc0\u347 ayati ta\u7747  sa\u7747 bahul\u257  vinay\u257 tis\u257 ri\u7751 \u299 rdu\u7779 \u7789 hul\u257  \u257 pattirde\u347 ayitv\u257  pa\u347 c\u257 tpariv\u257 so deya:\
\
m\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 so m\u257 n\u257 pyam | \u257 varhitavya\u347 ca | yath\u257  pudgalasy\u257 ntike eva\u7747  dv\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 bahul\u257 n\u257 \u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya | yath\u257 sminn\u257 v\u257 se evamanyasminn\u257 v\u257 se |\
\
ath\uc0\u257 para: pudgala: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: praticchann\u257 m | tasya sa\u7747 ghena pariv\u257 so\
\
datta: adharme\uc0\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kopyena sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa p\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sannany\u257 patti\u7747  \
\
j\uc0\u257 n\u257 ti y\u257 nena sa\u7747 ghamadhye n\u257 rocit\u257  | sa t\u257 m\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 ti | t\u257 mapy\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 ti\
\
y\uc0\u257 nena sa\u7747 ghamadhye n\u257 rocit\u257  | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 m\u257 rocayati | ahamasmy\u257 yu\u7779 manta: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 -\
\

\
sth\uc0\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | so\'92ha\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika eva sannany\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 mi y\u257  me sa\u7747 ghamadhye n\u257 rocit\u257  |\
\
so\'92ha\uc0\u7747  t\u257 m\u257 patti\u7747  na j\u257 n\u257 mi yasy\u257  mama sa\u7747 ghena pariv\u257 so datta: adharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kopyena \
\
sth\uc0\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | s\u257 dhu me \u257 yu\u7779 mantastasy\u257 : p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257  \u257 patterapi pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dadatu dharme\u7751 a \
\
karma\uc0\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | asy\u257 \u347 ca pa\u347 cimik\u257 y\u257 : | tasy\u257 ste bhik\u7779 ava: p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257  \
\
\uc0\u257 patte: pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dadati dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | tasy\u257 stu pa\u347 cimik\u257 y\u257 :\
\
pariv\uc0\u257 sa\u7747  dadati adharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kopyena sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa pariv\u257 sika eva san \

\
sth\uc0\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | so\'92ha\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  \

\
datta: adharme\uc0\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kopyena sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | s\u257 dhu me \u257 yu\u7779 mantastasy\u257 : p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257 \

\
pariv\uc0\u257 samiti | tasy\u257 ste bhik\u7779 ava: p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dadati dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 -\

\

@041\

ahamasy\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 manta: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m |\

\
pattim\uc0\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | sat \u257 mantar\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 ti |\
\
t\uc0\u257 mapy\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 ti yasy\u257  asya sa\u7747 ghena pariv\u257 so datta: adharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kopyena \

\
so\'92ha\uc0\u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sika\u7747  eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: antar\u257 patti\u7747  p\u363 rv\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  \
\
praticchann\uc0\u257 m  | so\'92ha\u7747  t\u257 mantar\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 mi | t\u257 mapy\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 mi yasy\u257  mama \

p\uc0\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dadatu dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257 kopyen\u257 sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | tasy\u257 \u347 c\u257 ntar\u257 pa-\
\
tterm\uc0\u363 lapariv\u257 samiti | tasya te bhik\u7779 avastasy\u257 : p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257  \u257 patte: pariv\u257 sa\u7747  dadati dharme\u7751 a \

\
sth\uc0\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika eva san sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: pratyantar\u257 pattimanta-\

r\uc0\u257 pattipratir\u363 p\u257 \u7747  praticchann\u257 m | sa t\u257 \u7747  pratyantar\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 ti | t\u257 mapyantar\u257 patti\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 ti \
\
yasy\uc0\u257  asya sa\u7747 ghena m\u363 lapariv\u257 so datta: adharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kopyena sth\u257 pan\u257 rhe\u7751 a | sa \
\

@043\

na gacchedapi, abhik\uc0\u7779 ukam\u257 v\u257 samadhode\u347 a\'f1ca sarval\u257 bhikam ||1||\
\
buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | asati vair\u257 gye \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 padyante | te vipratis\u257 raj\u257 t\u257 : sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayanti | kathamid\u257 n\u299 \u7747  vaya\u7747  \
\
s\uc0\u257 pattik\u257 : santa: sakauk\u7771 ty\u257 : savilol\u257 : sakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 : kha\u7751 \u7693 ak\u257 ri\u7751 a: \u347 avalak\u257 ri\u7751 a:\
\
kalma\uc0\u7779 ak\u257 ri\u7751 a: \u257 pattim\u363 l\u257 davyutthit\u257 : prak\u7771 tisthak\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 mantik\u257 dabhiv\u257 danavandana-\
\
pratyutth\uc0\u257 n\u257 \u7747 jalis\u257 m\u299 c\u299 karma\u7747  sv\u299 kari\u7779 y\u257 ma: | \u347 r\u257 ddh\u257 n\u257 \u7747  ca br\u257 hma\u7751 ag\u7771 hapat\u299 n\u257 \u7747  sak\u257 \u347 \u257 dagr\u257 -\
\
sanamagrodakamagrapi\uc0\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 ta\u7747  paribhok\u7779 y\u257 ma: | alpak\u257 likasya ca sukhasy\u257 rth\u257 ya bahuk\u257 lika\u7747  \
\
du:kham\uc0\u257 vi\u347 \u257 mo narakatiryakpretebhya: paribhramanta: | yattu vaya\u7747  \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 \u7747  praty\u257 khy\u257 ya h\u257 n\u257 y\u257 -\
\
vart\uc0\u257 maha iti te \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 \u7747  praty\u257 khy\u257 ya h\u257 n\u257 y\u257 vartante | pravrajy\u257 bhila\u7779 ita\u7747  ca jana\u7747  vipralambhayanti |\
\
bhavanto du\uc0\u347 cara\u7747  brahmacaryamala\u7747  pravrajyayeti | te\u7779 \u257 mapravrajit\u257 [n\u257 ]mapravr\u257 ja[ya]t\u257 \u7747  c\u257 lp\u299 -\
\
bh\uc0\u363 t\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: | k\u7779 ayam\u257 panna\u347 chidr\u299 bh\u363 tastanubh\u363 to bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 gha: | j\u257 nak\u257 : p\u7771 cchak\u257  buddha\u7747  \
\
bhagavanta\uc0\u7747  p\u7771 cchanti | buddho bhagav\u257 n\u257 yu\u7779 mantam\u257 nandam | ka: \u257 nanda hetu: ka: pratyaya: \
\
yenetarhyalp\uc0\u299 bh\u363 t\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: | k\u7779 ayam\u257 panna\u347 chidr\u299 bh\u363 tastanubh\u363 to bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 gha iti | sa etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  \
\
bhagavate vistare\uc0\u7751 \u257 rocayati |\
\
atha bhagavata etadabhavat | yattavaha\uc0\u7747  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 pann\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  hastoddh\u257 ra-\
\
manupradady\uc0\u257 manugrahamaneneti viditv\u257  [bhik\u7779 u]sa\u7747 gha\u7747  sa\u7747 nip\u257 tya purast\u257 dbhik\u7779 usa\u7747 ghasya praj\'f1apta\
\
ev\uc0\u257 sane ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: | ni\u7779 adya bhagav\u257 nbhik\u7779 \u363 n\u257 mantrayatesma | \u347 ruta\u7747  may\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 -\
\
m\uc0\u257 pattim\u257 pann\u257  vipratis\u257 raj\u257 t\u257 : \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 \u7747  praty\u257 khy\u257 ya h\u257 n\u257 y\u257 v\u7771 tt\u257  iti | tasm\u257 dyu\u7779 m\u257 bhi:\

\uc0\u347 \u257 sanasthitaye te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  c\u257 nukampay\u257  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 pann\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  pariv\u257 so deyo\

ma\uc0\u7751 \u7693 alakena | sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ake\u7751 a bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhikay\u257  s\u257 m\u299 c\u299 \u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  v\u7771 ddh\u257 nte utku\u7789 ukena \

\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ahameva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  bhik\u7779 u: sa\u7747 bahul\u257 : sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257  \u257 patt\u299 r\u257 panna: \

\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 vargik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: p\u257 riv\u257 sikam\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rik\u257 : santo bhik\u7779 \u363 n\u257 varhanti | etatpra-\

\
rhitavya: | na ekonavi\uc0\u7747 \u347 aty\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 sikairekena prak\u7771 tisthakena | n\u257 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 da\u347 abhi: p\u257 riv\u257 - \
\
sikairdv\uc0\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  prak\u7771 tisthak\u257 bhy\u257 meva\u7747  y\u257 vanna ekonavi\u7747 \u347 aty\u257  prak\u7771 tisthakairekena [p\u257 riv\u257 sikena] | \

yath\uc0\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 sikaireva\u7747  paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sairm\u257 n\u257 pyai\u347 c\u257 ritam\u257 n\u257 pyai: \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 dattakai\u347 ca |\
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 vargik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: p\u257 riv\u257 sikam\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rik\u257 : santa: p\u257 riv\u257 sik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 -\
\
mantike pariv\uc0\u257 sa\u7747  caranti | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha |\
\
na bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257  catur\u7751 \u257 \u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 sik\u257 n\u257 mantik\u257 t pariv\u257 sa\u347 caritavya: | na tray\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  p\u257 riv\u257 si-\
\
k\uc0\u257 n\u257 mekasya prak\u7771 tisthakasya | na dvayo: p\u257 riv\u257 sikayordvayo: prak\u7771 tistha[ka]yo: | na \
\
tray\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  prak\u7771 tisthak\u257 n\u257 mekasya p\u257 riv\u257 sikasya | api tu sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  pari\u347 uddh\u257 n\u257 \u7747  sam\u257 nad\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 i-\
\
k\uc0\u257 n\u257 mantik\u257 tpariv\u257 sa\u347 caritavya: |\
\
yath\uc0\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 sik\u257 n\u257 meva\u7747  paryu\u7779 itap\u257 riv\u257 sik\u257 n\u257 \u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rik\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  caritam\u257 n\u257 py\u257 n\u257 \u7747  \
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 \u257 dattak\u257 n\u257 \u7747  ca |\
\
yath\uc0\u257  pariv\u257 sameva\u7747  m\u363 lapariv\u257 sa\u7747  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 a\u7747  m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  m\u363 lam\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 am\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  \
\
caranti |\
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 vargik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: p\u257 riv\u257 sikam\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rik\u257 : santa: \u347 \u363 nyavih\u257 ra\u7747  gatv\u257  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  \
\
caranti | te bhik\uc0\u7779 ubhird\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257  ukt\u257 \u347 ca | \u257 yu\u7779 manta: kime\u7779 a vih\u257 ro yu\u7779 m\u257 bhir\u257 v\u257 sita: | te \
\
kathayanti | n\uc0\u257 yamasm\u257 bhir\u257 v\u257 sita: | ki\u7747 tu pariv\u257 sa\u7747  car\u257 ma iti | te kathayanti |\
\
y\uc0\u363 ya\u7747  pariv\u257 sa\u7747  caratha | ki\u7747  tarhi pracch\u257 dyante | tairabhy\u257 hat\u257 st\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mavasthit\u257 : | etatpra-\
\
kara\uc0\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | na bhik\u7779 ava: \u347 \u363 ny\u257 g\u257 re pariv\u257 sa\u347 ca-\
\
ritavyo n\uc0\u257 pi yatraiko bhik\u7779 urdvau trayo v\u257  | api tu yatra catv\u257 ro bhik\u7779 ava: pari\u347 uddh\u257 :\
\
sam\uc0\u257 nad\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 aya: prativasanti tatra pariv\u257 sa\u347 caritavya: |\
\
@052\
\
yath\uc0\u257  pariv\u257 sa eva\u7747  m\u363 lapariv\u257 so m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 o m\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  m\u363 lam\u257 n\u257 pya\u7747  m\u363 l\u257 pakar\u7779 am\u257 -\
\
n\uc0\u257 pya\u7747  ca |\
\
ath\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nud\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | yath\u257 pi tadbhadanta p\u257 riv\u257 sikam\u257 n\u257 -\
\
pyac\uc0\u257 rikai: [\u347 ruta\u7747 ]bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gacchanti kalahak\u257 rak\u257  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257  vigrahak\u257 rak\u257  \
\
viv\uc0\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257  \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 : | te\'92sm\u257 \u7747 \u347 codayi\u7779 yanti alajjitena v\u257  vaitarike\u7751 a v\u257  \
\
iti | taiste\uc0\u7779 \u257 \u7747  katha\u7747  pratipattavyamiti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | p\u257 riv\u257 sikam\u257 n\u257 pyac\u257 rikairud\u257 -\
\
lin bhik\uc0\u7779 ubhi: kalahak\u257 rak\u257  bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gacchant\u299 ti \u347 rutv\u257  sa pariv\u257 so bhik\u7779 o: purast\u257 tpra-\
\
tinisra\uc0\u7779 \u7789 avya: | eva\u7747  ca puna: pratinisra\u7779 \u7789 avya: | s\u257 m\u299 c\u299 \u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  utku\u7789 ukena sthitv\u257 \'f1jali\u7747  \
\
prag\uc0\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam | samanv\u257 har\u257 yu\u7779 mannahameva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  eva\u7747 r\u363 p\u257 \u7747  caiva\u7747 r\u363 p\u257 \u7747  ca sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e-\
\
\uc0\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: iyaccirak\u257 lapraticchann\u257 m | tasya mama sa\u7747 ghena iyanta\u7747  k\u257 la\u7747  pariv\u257 so\
\
datta: | tena may\uc0\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 sikena sat\u257  \u347 ruta\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gacchanti kalahak\u257 rak\u257  bha\u7751 \u7693 ana-\
\
k\uc0\u257 rak\u257  vigrahak\u257 rak\u257  viv\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257  \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 ste m\u257 \u7747  codayi\u7779 yanti sm\u257 rayi\u7779 yanti \
\
alajjitena v\uc0\u257  vaitarike\u7751 a v\u257  | so\'92hameva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 siko bhik\u7779 usta\u7747  pariv\u257 sam\u257 yu\u7779 mata: \
\
purast\uc0\u257 tpratinis\u7771 j\u257 mi | iyatk\u257 la\u7747  me caritamiyatk\u257 la\u7747  tu caritavyam  | prak\u7771 tisthaka\u7747  \
\
m\uc0\u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mandh\u257 rayatviti | tata: punarapi gatavegairhatavegairgatapratyarthikaistathaiva prak\u7771 tisthakasya \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 o: purast\u257 tpariv\u257 sa: sam\u257 d\u257 tavya: | eva\u7747  ca puna: sam\u257 d\u257 tavya: | s\u257 m\u299 c\u299 \u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  \
\
utku\uc0\u7789 ukena sthitv\u257  a\'f1jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam | samanv\u257 har\u257 yu\u7779 mannahameva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  bhik\u7779 ureva\u7747 -\
\
r\uc0\u363 p\u257 \u7747  caiva\u7747 r\u363 p\u257 \u7747  ca sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: iyaccirak\u257 lapraticchann\u257 m | tasya mama sa\u7747 ghena \
\
iyanta\uc0\u7747  k\u257 la\u7747  pariv\u257 so datta: | tena may\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 sikena \u347 ruta\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gacchanti kalaha-\
\
k\uc0\u257 rak\u257  bha\u7751 \u7693 anak\u257 rak\u257  vigrahak\u257 rak\u257  viv\u257 dak\u257 rak\u257  \u257 dhikara\u7751 ik\u257 ste m\u257 \u7747  codayi\u7779 yanti \
\
sm\uc0\u257 rayi\u7779 yanti alajjitena vaitarike\u7751 eti | tanmay\u257  p\u257 riv\u257 sikav\u7771 tta\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: purast\u257 tprati-\
\
nis\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 am | so\'92hameva\u7747  n\u257 m\u257  bhik\u7779 usta\u7747  pariv\u257 sam\u257 yu\u7779 mata: purast\u257 t sam\u257 dade | iyatk\u257 la\u7747  \
\
me caritamiyatk\uc0\u257 la\u7747  me kartavya\u7747  bhavi\u7779 yati | p\u257 riv\u257 sika\u7747  m\u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mandh\u257 rayatu |\

@053\

po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panavastu\
\
[ po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panavast\u363 dd\u257 nam |]\
\
a\uc0\u347 uddhapo\u7779 adh\u257 dbhik\u7779 urmaudgaly\u257 yanena n\u257 \u347 ita: |\
\
tata: \uc0\u347 \u257 str\u257 \u7751 i vigarhitv\u257  sa\u7747 ghena p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: po\u7779 adha: ||1||\
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257  udd\u257 nag\u257 th\u257  camp\u257 y\u257 \u7747  po\u7779 adhas\u363 tre vistare\u7751 a |\
\
tacca po\uc0\u7779 adhas\u363 tra\u7747  madhyam\u257 game sa\u7747 g\u299 tanip\u257 te pa\u7789 hyate ||2||\
\
udd\uc0\u257 nam |\
\
codan\uc0\u257 tsm\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 ccaiva avak\u257 \u347 o\'92vacan\u299 yata: |\
\
avav\uc0\u257 da: prasth\u257 pana\u7747  po\u7779 adha\u347 ca prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257  ||3||\
\
ukta\uc0\u7747  bhagavat\u257  sa\u7747 ghasthavire\u7751 a tvardham\u257 sa\u7747  pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 a udde\u7779 \u7789 avya iti | upadhi-\
\
v\uc0\u257 rika: sa\u7747 ghasthavirasya purast\u257 t sthitv\u257  kathayati | sthavira pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amuddi\u347 eti |\
\
sa kathayati | \uc0\u257 yu\u7779 manna \u347 uddh\u257  t\u257 vadbhik\u7779 upar\u7779 at | ko\'92tra sthavire\u7751 \u257 pari\u347 uddho d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | \
\
tvameva t\uc0\u257 vat | kathamaha\u7747  sthavire\u7751 a d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | divyena cak\u7779 u\u7779 \u257  | hanted\u257 n\u299 \u7747  na\u7779 \u7789 \u257 : sma: |\
\
yatra bhik\uc0\u7779 avo divyena cak\u7779 u\u7779 \u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  codayanti sm\u257 rayanti | ityetatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo \
\
bhagavata \uc0\u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | asa\u7747 vyavah\u257 rya\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo divyacak\u7779 u: | tasam#nna \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  divyena cak\u7779 u\u7779 \u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u347 codayitavya: sm\u257 rayitavya: | bhik\u7779 urdivyena cak\u7779 u\u7779 \u257  \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  bhik\u7779 u\u7747  codayati sm\u257 rayati s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati |\
\
yath\uc0\u257  divyena cak\u7779 u\u7779 \u257  eva\u7747  divyena \u347 rotre\u7751 a |\
\
punarapyas\uc0\u257 vupadhiv\u257 rika: sa\u7747 ghasthavirasya purata: sthitv\u257  kathayati | sthavira pr\u257 timo-\
\
k\uc0\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amuddi\u347 eti | sa kathayati | \u257 yu\u7779 mannapari\u347 uddh\u257  t\u257 vadbhik\u7779 upar\u7779 at | sthavira \
\
ko\'92tr\uc0\u257 pari\u347 uddha: | tvameva t\u257 vat | sthavira katha\u7747  n\u257 ma tvay\u257  sa\u7747 ghamadhye mama \u347 irasi \
\
mu\uc0\u7779 \u7789 irnip\u257 tit\u257  | aho vat\u257 ha\u7747  tvay\u257  ek\u257 nte codita: sy\u257 miti | sa t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mavasthita: |\
\
etatprakara\uc0\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | ek\u257 nte codayitavyo na \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghamadhye | sacedek\u257 nte codyam\u257 no na smarati sm\u257 rayitavya: | sm\u257 rita\u347 cetkopam\u257 padyate |\
\
avak\uc0\u257 \u347 a: k\u257 rayitavya: | avak\u257 \u347 a\u7747  k\u257 ryam\u257 \u7751 o\'92nyen\u257 nya\u7747  pratisarati | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha |\
\
avacan\uc0\u299 ya: kartavya: | avacan\u299 ya: k\u7771 ta: | tath\u257 pyanyen\u257 nya\u7747  pratisarati | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha |\
\
avav\uc0\u257 do\'92sya sth\u257 payitavya: po\u7779 adha: prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257  ca |\

@054\
\
ekamadh\uc0\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panameka\u7747  dh\u257 rmikam | dve adh\u257 rmike [dve dh\u257 rmike]|\
\
tr\uc0\u299 \u7751 yadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i tr\u299 \u7751 i dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | catv\u257 ryadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i catv\u257 ri dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 c\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i pa\'f1ca dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | \u7779 a\u7693 adh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i \u7779 a\u7693  dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | sapt\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i \
\
sapta dh\uc0\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | a\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 vadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i a\u7779 \u7789 hau  dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | nav\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i nava \
\
dh\uc0\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | da\u347 \u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i da\u347 a dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni |\
\
ekamadh\uc0\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panameka\u7747  dh\u257 rmikam | adh\u257 rmika\u7747  katarat | am\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pana\u7747  [katarat |] sam\u363 lakena \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | idamekamadh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panameka\u7747  \
dh\uc0\u257 rmikam |\
\
dve adh\uc0\u257 rmike po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pane dve dh\u257 rmike | katame | am\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 ten\u257 m\u363 lakena \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena sam\u363 lakena\
k\uc0\u7771 tena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | ime dve adh\u257 rmike po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pane \
\
dve dh\uc0\u257 rmike |\
\
tr\uc0\u299 \u7751 yadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i tr\u299 \u7751 i dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | katam\u257 ni | am\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena \
\
am\uc0\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena am\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam |\
\
sam\uc0\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adha-\
\
sth\uc0\u257 panam | im\u257 ni tr\u299 \u7751 yadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni tr\u299 \u7751 i dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i |\
\
catv\uc0\u257 ryadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i catv\u257 ri dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | katam\u257 ni | am\u363 likay\u257  \
\
\uc0\u347 \u299 lavipatty\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipatty\u257  \u257 c\u257 ravipatty\u257  \u257 j\u299 vavipatty\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payatyadh\u257 rmika\u7747  \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | sam\u363 likay\u257  \u347 \u299 lavipatty\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipatty\u257  \u257 c\u257 ravipatty\u257  \u257 j\u299 vavipatty\u257  \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | im\u257 ni catv\u257 ryadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni \
\
catv\uc0\u257 ri dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 c\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i | pa\u7747 ca dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | katam\u257 ni | am\u363 likay\u257  \
\
p\uc0\u257 r\u257 jikay\u257  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ay\u257  p\u257 yantikay\u257  pratide\u347 anikay\u257  du\u7779 \u7789 atay\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payatyadh\u257 rmika\u7747  \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | sam\u363 likay\u257  p\u257 r\u257 jikay\u257  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ay\u257  p\u257 yantikay\u257  pratide\u347 anikay\u257  \
\
du\uc0\u7779 k\u7771 tay\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 pa[yati dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pa]nam | im\u257 ni pa\'f1c\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni pa\'f1ca dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i |\
\
@055\
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7693 adh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni \u7779 a\u7693  dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | katam\u257 ni |\
\
am\uc0\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena am\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena am\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena | am\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a \
\
am\uc0\u363 lake[n\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a am\u363 lake]na k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payatyadh\u257 rmika\u7747  \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena  sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena | [sam\u363 lakena \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a] sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a po\u7779 adha\u7747  \
\
sth\uc0\u257 payati dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | im\u257 ni \u7779 a\u7693 adh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni \u7779 a\u7693  \
\
dh\uc0\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i|\
\
sapt\uc0\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | sapta dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni |\
\
katam\uc0\u257 ni | am\u363 likay\u257  \u347 \u299 lavipatty\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipatty\u257  \u257 c\u257 ravipatty\u257  \u257 j\u299 vavipatty\u257  \
\
[am\uc0\u363 lakena] d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ena \u347 rutena pari\u347 a\u7747 kitena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payatyadh\u257 rmika\u7747   po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam |\
\
sam\uc0\u363 likay\u257  \u347 \u299 lavipatty\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipatty\u257  \u257 c\u257 ravipatty\u257  \u257 j\u299 vavipatty\u257  sam\u363 lakena d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ena \
\
\uc0\u347 rutena pari\u347 a\u7747 kitena  po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | im\u257 ni  sapt\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i \
\
sapta dh\uc0\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni |\
\
a\uc0\u7779 \u7789 \u257 vadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i a\u7779 \u7789 au dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni  | katam\u257 ni | am\u363 likay\u257  \
\
p\uc0\u257 r\u257 jikay\u257  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ay\u257  p\u257 yantikay\u257  pratide\u347 anikay\u257  du\u7779 \u7789 atay\u257  am\u363 lakena d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ena \u347 rutena \
\
pari\uc0\u347 a\u7747 kitena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payatyadh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | sam\u363 likay\u257  p\u257 r\u257 jikay\u257  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ay\u257  \
\
p\uc0\u257 yantikay\u257  pratide\u347 anikay\u257  du\u7779 \u7789 atay\u257  sam\u363 lakena d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ena \u347 rutena pari\u347 a\u7747 kitena po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati |\
\
dh\uc0\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | im\u257 nya\u7779 \u7789 \u257 vadh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni a\u7779 \u7789 au dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i |\
\
nav\uc0\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i nava dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | katam\u257 ni | am\u363 lakena \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tena am\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena am\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena | am\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a am\u363 la-\
\
ken\uc0\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a am\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a | am\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena nirava\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a \
\
am\uc0\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena nirava\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a am\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena nirava\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati |\
\
adh\uc0\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena sam\u363 lakena \
\
k\uc0\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena | sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a sam\u363 lakena \
\
k\uc0\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena s\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a | sam\u363 lakena k\u7771 tena nirava\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a [sam\u363 laken\u257 k\u7771 tena nirava\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a]\
\
sam\uc0\u363 lakena k\u7771 t\u257 k\u7771 tena nirava\u347 e\u7779 e\u7751 a po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | im\u257 ni \
\
nav\uc0\u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni nava dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i |\

@056\
\
da\uc0\u347 \u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i da\u347 a dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | katam\u257 ni | p\u257 r\u257 jiko \
\
na bhavati | p\uc0\u257 r\u257 jikakath\u257  na viprak\u7771 t\u257  bhavati | \u347 ik\u7779 \u257  na praty\u257 khy\u257 t\u257  bhavati | \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 -\
\
praty\uc0\u257 khy\u257 nakath\u257  naviprak\u7771 t\u257  bhavati | sa\u7747 gho na praty\u257 khy\u257 to bhavati | sa\u7747 ghapraty\u257 khy\u257 nakath\u257  na \
\
viprak\uc0\u7771 t\u257  bhavati | \u347 \u299 lavipanno [na] bhavati na d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipanno n\u257 c\u257 ravipanno n\u257 j\u299 vavipanna: |\
\
katha\uc0\u7747  p\u257 r\u257 jiko na bhavati | yair\u257 k\u257 rairyairli\u7749 gairyairnimittai: p\u257 r\u257 jik\u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 padyate \
\
ta\uc0\u7747  ca bhik\u7779 u: pa\u347 yati na tair\u257 k\u257 rairnatairli\u7749 gairna tairnimittai: p\u257 r\u257 jik\u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 padyam\u257 nam | sa \

jiko na bhavati |\

te ca bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: utth\u257 y\u257 sanebhyo n\u257 n\u257  viprakr\u257 manti | sa c\u257 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  a\u347 rutv\u257  \

apari\uc0\u347 a\u7747 kya ca po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | eva\u7747  p\u257 r\u257 jikakath\u257 \

na viprak\uc0\u7771 t\u257  bhavati | \

\
kriyate ta\uc0\u7747  ca bhik\u7779 u: pa\u347 yati na tair\u257 k\u257 rairna tairli\u7749 gairna tairnimittai: \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 praty\u257 khy\u257 na\u7747  \

bhavati | \

\
bhavati | tasya ca bhik\uc0\u7779 urad\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  a\u347 rutv\u257  apari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adha-\

\
bhavati | tasya ca bhik\uc0\u7779 urad\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  a\u347 rutv\u257  apari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adha-\
\

\
pratipadyate | tasya ca bhik\uc0\u7779 urad\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  a\u347 rutv\u257  apari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | adh\u257 rmika\u7747  \
\

\
a\uc0\u347 rutv\u257  apari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | adh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | eva\u7747  n\u257 j\u299 vavipanno \

bhavati |\

bhavati |\

sth\uc0\u257 panam | eva\u7747  \u347 \u299 lavipanno bhavati |\

katha\uc0\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipanno bhavati | dv\u257 \u7779 a\u7779 \u7789 erd\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igat\u257 manyatar\u257 nyatar\u257 \u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 imabhinivi\u7779 \u7789 o bhavati |\
\
tasya ca bhik\uc0\u7779 urd\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  \u347 rutv\u257  pari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | eva\u7747  \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ivipanno bhavati |\
\
katham\uc0\u257 c\u257 ravipanno bhavati | \u257 nulomikai: \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 nuk\u363 lairvacanapathairucyam\u257 no na samyak \
\
pratipadyate | tasya [ca] bhik\uc0\u7779 urd\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  \u347 rutv\u257  pari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 adha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adha-\
\
sth\uc0\u257 panam | evam\u257 c\u257 ravipanno bhavati |\
\
\
\
katham\uc0\u257 j\u299 vavipanno bhavati | \u257 j\u299 vo\'92sy\u257 pari\u347 uddho bhavati | tasya [ca] bhik\u7779 urd\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  \
\
\uc0\u347 rutv\u257  pari\u347 a\u7747 kya po\u7779 odha\u7747  sth\u257 payati | dh\u257 rmika\u7747  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panam | evam\u257 j\u299 vavipanno bhavati |\

@059\
po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panavastu\
\
\
im\uc0\u257 ni da\u347 \u257 dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i da\u347 a dh\u257 rmik\u257 \u7751 i po\u7779 adhasth\u257 pan\u257 ni | yath\u257  po\u7779 adhasth\u257 panameva\u7747  \
\
prav\uc0\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 sth\u257 panam |\
\
pa\uc0\u7747 ceme bhik\u7779 ava: sa\u7747 gh\u257 : | katame pa\u7747 ca | alajjisa\u7747 gha: e\u7693 a[m\u363 ]kasa\u7747 gha: ga\u7751 asa\u7747 gha:\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 v\u7771 tisa\u7747 gha: param\u257 rthasa\u7747 gha\u347 ca |\
\
alajjisa\uc0\u7747 gha: katama: | yatra sarve bhik\u7779 avo du:\u347 \u299 l\u257  p\u257 padharm\u257 \u7751 a: | e\u7693 am\u363 kasa\u7747 gha: \
\
katama: | yatra na s\uc0\u363 tradharo na vinayadharo na m\u257 t\u7771 k\u257 dhara: | ga\u7751 asa\u7747 gha: katama: | yatra \
\
ga\uc0\u7751 asa\u7747 bandhena karm\u257 \u7751 i kriyante | sa\u7747 v\u7771 tisa\u7747 gha: katama: | sarve p\u7771 thagjanakaly\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 : |\
\
param\uc0\u257 rthasa\u7747 gha: katama: | \u347 aik\u7779 \u257 \u347 aik\u7779 \u257  a\u7779 \u7789 au mah\u257 puru\u7779 apudgal\u257 : | tatra ye p\u363 rvak\u257 straya: sa\u7747 gh\u257 :\
\
alajji[na:]sa\uc0\u7747 gha: e\u7693 am\u363 kasa\u7747 gha: ga\u7751 asa\u7747 gha\u347 ca labhyamebhiradharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kartum | yo\'92ya\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 v\u7771 tisa\u7747 gho labhyamanena dharmasa\u7747 j\'f1in\u257  adharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kartum | yastvaya\u7747  parm\u257 rthasa\u7747 gho na \
\
labhyamanen\uc0\u257 dharme\u7751 a karma\u7751 \u257  kartum |\
\
po\uc0\u7779 adhasth\u257 panavastu sam\u257 ptam ||\

@060\

\uc0\u347 ayan\u257 sanavastu\

[\uc0\u347 ayan\u257 sanavast\u363 dd\u257 nam |]\
\
\uc0\u347 \u257 ky\u257 : pa\u7747 cak\u257 dha\u347 ca s\u257 \u7749 ghika\u7747  paudgalika\u7747  ca vastubha\u7749 gena |\
\
k\uc0\u257 rayet pratisa\u7747 stara\u7751 abh\u363 mimara\u7751 ya\u7747  ca tric\u299 varam |\
\
ucchedyamara\uc0\u7751 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 usthaviro l\u257 bhay\u257 \u7779 \u7789 au bhavati pa\u347 cimam ||1||\
\
buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tena khalu \
\
samayena sa\uc0\u7747 bahul\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 mupasth\u257 na\u347 \u257 l\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 n\u257 \u7747   sa\u7747 nipatit\u257 n\u257 mayameva\u7747 r\u363 po\'92bh\u363 da-\
\
ntar\uc0\u257 kath\u257 samud\u257 h\u257 ra: | ko\'92sm\u257 bhir\u257 yu\u7779 manta: satkartavyo gurukartavyo m\u257 nayitavya: p\u363 jayi-\
\
tavya: | kasya c\uc0\u257 sm\u257 bhirabhiv\u257 dana-vandana-pratyutth\u257 n\u257 \u7747 jalis\u257 m\u299 c\u299 karma karttavyam |\
\
ko\'92sm\uc0\u257 kamarhati agr\u257 sanamagrodakamagrapi\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 ta\u7747  paribhoktumiti | tatraike evam\u257 hu: \u347 \u257 kya\u7747  \
\
pravrajita iti | anye tvevam\uc0\u257 hu: yo br\u257 hma\u7751 a : pravrajita iti | apare ya: k\u7779 atriya:\
\
pravrajita: | apare yo vai\uc0\u347 ya: pravrajita: | apare ya: \u347 udra: pravrajita: | apare \
\
ucc\uc0\u257 tkul\u257 tpravrajito\'92ny\u363 n\u257 t | \u257 \u7693 hy\u257 tkul\u257 tpravrajito\'92d\u299 n\u257 t | apare yo\'92bhir\u363 po \
\
dar\uc0\u347 an\u299 ya: pr\u257 s\u257 dika: kaly\u257 \u7751 av\u257 kyo v\u257 kkara\u7751 enopeto j\'f1\u257 to mah\u257 pu\u7751 ya: s\u363 tradharo \
\
vinayadharo m\uc0\u257 t\u7771 k\u257 dharo bahu\u347 ruto dh\u257 rmakathika: sthaviro r\u257 janya: \u257 ra\u7751 yaka: traic\u299 variko \
\
n\uc0\u257 matika: p\u257 \u7747 sukulika: pi\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 tika: ek\u257 sanika: khalupa\u347 c\u257 dbhaktiko v\u7771 k\u7779 am\u363 lika: \
\
\uc0\u347 m\u257 \u347 \u257 niko\'92bhyavak\u257 \u347 ika: nai\u7779 adiko yath\u257 sa\u7747 stariko yo l\u257 bh\u299  anityasa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 y\u257 : \

p\uc0\u363 rvavady\u257 vat yo\'92rhanna\u7779 \u7789 avimok\u7779 adhy\u257 y\u299 ti | apare evam\u257 hu: sarve\u7779 \u257 masm\u257 kam\u257 yu\u7779 manto na \

sameti yaduta n\uc0\u257 n\u257  praj\'f1apty\u257  | ete vaya\u7747  yena bhagav\u257 \u7747 stenopasa\u7747 kram\u257 ma: | upasa\u7747 kramya \
\
bhagavantametamartha\uc0\u7747  parip\u7771 cch\u257 ma: | yath\u257 sm\u257 ka\u7747  sa bhagav\u257 n vy\u257 kari\u7779 yati tathaina\u7747  \
\
dh\uc0\u257 rayi\u7779 y\u257 ma iti |\
\

\
\uc0\u347 iras\u257  vanditv\u257  ek\u257 nte ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 : | ek\u257 ntani\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 : sa\u7747 bahul\u257  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavantamidam-\

vocan | ih\uc0\u257 sm\u257 ka\u7747  bhadanta sa\u7747 bahul\u257 n\u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 mupasth\u257 na\u347 \u257 l\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 n\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 nipatit\u257 n\u257 -\

@061\
\
tathaina\uc0\u7747  dh\u257 rayi\u7779 y\u257 ma iti  | te vaya\u7747  bhadanta bhagavantametamev\u257 rtha\u7747  parip\u7771 cch\u257 ma: | ko\'92sm\u257 bhi:\

satkartavyo gurukartavyo m\uc0\u257 nayitavya: p\u363 jayitavya: | p\u363 rvavady\u257 vad agrapi\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 ta\u7747  paribhoktu-\
\
miti | bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | v\u7771 ddhatarako yu\u7779 m\u257 bhirbhik\u7779 ava: satkartavyo gurukartavyo m\u257 nayitavya: \

tyagr\uc0\u257 sanamagrodakamagrapi\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 ta\u7747  paribhoktumiti |\
\

\
paribhoktumiti | bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: \u257 g\u257 rik\u257 n v\u7771 ddh\u257 n satkurvanti m\u257 nayanti p\u363 jayanti | \u347 rutv\u257  \

\
nimagn\uc0\u257 : | katha\u7747  y\u363 yamasm\u257 ka\u7747  satkurvatha | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | prabrajit\u257 n bhik\u7779 avo may\u257  sandh\u257 yokta\u7747  no tv\u257 g\u257 rik\u257 niti |\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: anyat\u299 rthik\u257 nv\u7771 ddh\u257 n d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  satkurvanti gurukurvanti m\u257 nayanti p\u363 jayanti |\

te \uc0\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erak\u257 nv\u7771 ddhaprabrajit\u257 n d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  satkurvanti gurukurvanti m\u257 nayanti p\u363 jayanti |\

\
te navopasa\uc0\u7747 pann\u257 n v\u7771 ddh\u257 n satkurvanti gurukurvanti m\u257 nayanti p\u363 jayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha |\
\
anyonya\uc0\u7747  var\u7779 \u257 gra\u7747  p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  vanditavyam | te p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 : santo janmavar\u7779 \u257 \u7751 i kathayanti |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | upasa\u7747 apdvar\u7779 \u257 gra\u7747  pra\u7779 \u7789 avyamiti | bhik\u7779 avo na j\u257 nate [kati var\u7779 \u257 gr\u257 \u7751 \u299 ti] |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | s\u257 mayikam\u257 rocayitavyam | bhak\u7779 avo na j\u257 nate kati s\u257 mayik\u257 niti |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | pa\u7747 ceme bhik\u7779 ava: samay\u257 : | haimantika\u7747  grai\u7779 mika\u7747  v\u257 r\u7779 ika\u7747  m\u7771 tav\u257 r\u7779 ika\u7747  d\u299 rghav\u257 r\u7779 ika-\
\

sam\uc0\u257 rakasya sabrahmakasya sa\u347 rama\u7751 abr\u257 hma\u7751 ik\u257 y\u257  [praj\u257 ]y\u257 : sadevam\u257 nu\u7779 \u257 y\u257 stath\u257 gat\u257 rhatsamyak-\

@062\

da\uc0\u347 \u257 vandy\u257 : | katame | p\u257 riv\u257 siko m\u363 lap\u257 riv\u257 sika: paryu\u7779 itapariv\u257 sa: m\u257 n\u257 pya-\
\
c\uc0\u257 rika\u347 caritam\u257 n\u257 pyo\'92dar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 iptaka: apratikarm\u257 yotk\u7779 iptaka: apratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake \

yad\uc0\u257  bhagavat\u257  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhikay\u257  praj\'f1apt\u257 stad\u257  bhik\u7779 avo\'92nyonya\u7747  satkurvanti gurukurvanti \
\
m\uc0\u257 nayanti p\u363 jayanti | te\'92nyonya\u7747  satkurvanto m\u257 nayanta: p\u363 jayanto vardhante ku\u347 alairdharmairutpala\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  yathodake | bhik\u7779 ava: sa\u7747 \u347 ayaj\u257 t\u257 : sarvasa\u7747 \u347 ayacchett\u257 ra\u7747   buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  papracchu: | pa\u347 ya\
\
bhadanta yad\uc0\u257  bhagavat\u257  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhikay\u257  praj\'f1apt\u257 stad\u257  bhik\u7779 avo\'92nyonya\u7747  satkurvanti gurukurvanti \
\

ku\uc0\u347 alairdharmairutpala\u7747  v\u257  yathodake iti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | kimatra bhik\u7779 ava: \u257 \u347 carya\u7747  yadid\u257 n\u299 \u7747 \
\
may\uc0\u257  vigatar\u257 ge\u7751 a vigatadve\u7779 e\u7751 a vigatamohena parimuktena j\u257 tijar\u257 vy\u257 dhimara\u7751 a\u347 okaparideva-\
\
du:khadaurmanasyop\uc0\u257 y\u257 sai: sarvaj\'f1ena sarv\u257 k\u257 raj\'f1ena sarvaj\'f1\u257 naj\'f1eyava\u347 ipr\u257 ptena yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  \
\
praj\'f1apt\uc0\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 m\u257 gamya bhik\u7779 avo\'92nyonya\u7747  satkurvanti gurukurvanti p\u363 rvavady\u257 vadutpala\u7747 \
\
v\uc0\u257  yathodake iti | yattu may\u257  sar\u257 ge\u7751 a sadve\u7779 e\u7751 a samohen\u257 parimuktena j\u257 tijar\u257 vy\u257 dhi-\
\
mara\uc0\u7751 a-\u347 oka-parideva-du:kha-daurmanasyop\u257 y\u257 sairvinipatita\u347 ar\u299 re\u7751 a yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  praj\'f1apt\u257 y\u257 \u7747  \
\
yath\uc0\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 m\u257 gamya sakalo jamb\u363 dv\u299 paniv\u257 s\u299  janak\u257 yo yadbh\u363 yas\u257  pra\u7751 \u299 te trayastri\u7747 \u347 e \
\
devanik\uc0\u257 ye upapannastacchr\u363 yat\u257 m |\
\
bh\uc0\u363 tap\u363 rva\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: k\u257 \u347 \u299 \u7779 u janapade anyatamasminvanagahane catv\u257 ra :pr\u257 \u7751 ina: prati-\
\
vasanti kapi\'f1jala: \uc0\u347 a\u347 o marka\u7789 o gaj\u257 \u347 ca: | te ca paraspara\u7747  sakhyen\u257 vasthit\u257 : sahit\u257 : \
\
samagr\uc0\u257 : sa\u7747 modam\u257 n\u257  avivadam\u257 n\u257  a\u347 a\u7747 kino yathe\u7779 \u7789 avih\u257 ratay\u257  k\u257 lamatin\u257 mayanti |\
\
y\uc0\u257 vadapare\u7751 a samayena te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  buddhirutpann\u257  | asti vaya\u7747  bhavanta: paraspara\u7747  sakhyen\u257 vasthit\u257 :\
\
sahit\uc0\u257 : samagr\u257 : sa\u7747 modam\u257 n\u257  avivadam\u257 n\u257 :  | kintu na j\u257 n\u299 ma: ko\'92sm\u257 bhi: satkartavyo\
\
gurukartavyo m\uc0\u257 nayitavya: p\u363 jayitavya: iti | yattu vaya\u7747  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 \u7747  praj\'f1apayema iti |\
\
te paraspara\uc0\u7747  sa\u7747 jalpa\u7747  kartum\u257 rabdh\u257  iti | ko\'92sm\u257 ka\u7747  v\u7771 ddha iti | tata: kapi\u7747 jalena va\u7789 av\u7771 k\u7779 o \
\
dar\uc0\u347 ita: | bhavanta: e\u7779 a va\u7789 av\u7771 k\u7779 a: kena kiyatpram\u257 \u7751 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a iti | hast\u299  kathayati  | may\u257  \
\
y\uc0\u363 thena sah\u257 nena path\u257  gacchat\u257  aya\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 o matpram\u257 \u7751 a eva uccatveneti | marka\u7789 a: kathayati |\
\
may\uc0\u257  y\u363 thena sah\u257 nena path\u257  gacchat\u257  aya\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 o mama tulya evoccatveneti | te kathayanti |\
\
tvamasya v\uc0\u7771 ddha iti | \u347 a\u347 a: kathayati | may\u257 pyasya dvipatrakasya patre\u7779 vev\u257 va\u347 y\u257 yabindavo \
\

@063\
\
pa\uc0\u347 yata y\u363 yamena\u7747  mahatpram\u257 \u7751 \u257 k\u257 ram | te kathayanti | pa\u347 y\u257 ma: | etasm\u257 nmay\u257  \
\
phal\uc0\u257 ni bhak\u7779 ayitv\u257 sminprade\u347 e ucc\u257 ra: k\u7771 tastasm\u257 daya\u7747  j\u257 ta iti | te kathayanti | yadyeva\u7747  \
\
tvamasm\uc0\u257 ka\u7747  sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  v\u7771 ddha iti | tato hast\u299  sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  satkartum\u257 rabdha: | karma\u7789 a: \u347 a\u347 a: \
\
kapi\uc0\u7747 jala\u7747  ca | \u347 a\u347 a: kapi\u7747 jalameva | te eva\u7747  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhikay\u257  satkurvantastasminvanagahane \
\
ita\uc0\u347 c\u257 muta\u347 ca paribhramanti | yad\u257  vi\u7779 amanimn\u257 : prade\u347 \u257  gantavy\u257  bhavanti tad\u257  hastina\u7747  \

marka\uc0\u7789 o\'92bhirohati marka\u7789 a\u7747  \u347 a\u347 a: \u347 a\u347 amapi kapi\u7747 jala: | \

te\uc0\u7779 \u257 meva\u7747  Prav\u7771 ddhasneh\u257 n\u257 \u7747  ca buddhirutpann\u257  | asti vaya\u7747  bhavanta: prav\u7771 ddha-\
\
sneh\uc0\u257 : sagaurav\u257 \u347 ca | anyadapi t\u257 vatki\u7747 citku\u347 ala\u7747  sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartemah\u299 ti | ki\u7747  kurma: |\
\
kapi\uc0\u7747 jala: kathayati | pr\u257 \u7751 \u257 tip\u257 t\u257 tprativiram\u257 ma: | k\u299 d\u7771 \u347 o\'92sm\u257 ka\u7747  pr\u257 \u7751 \u257 tip\u257 ta: |\

kapi\uc0\u7747 jala: kathayati | santi t\u7771 \u7751 apu\u7779 paphal\u257 ni sapr\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 ni santi ni\u7779 pr\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 ni | tadasm\u257 -\

bhirady\uc0\u257 gre\u7751 a sapr\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 \u7751 i parityajya ni\u7779 pr\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 ni paribhoktavy\u257 ni | te sapr\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 ni parityajya\

ni\uc0\u7779 pr\u257 \u7751 ak\u257 ni paribhoktum\u257 rabdh\u257 : |\

te\uc0\u7779 \u257 metadabhavat | asti vaya\u7747  pr\u257 \u7751 \u257 tip\u257 t\u257 tprativirat\u257  no tvadatt\u257 d\u257 n\u257 tprati-\
\
viram\uc0\u257 ma: k\u299 d\u7771 \u347 o\'92sm\u257 kamadatt\u257 d\u257 nam | kapi\u7747 jala: kathayati | santi saparigrah\u257 \u7751 i \
\
t\uc0\u7771 \u7751 apatrapu\u7779 paphal\u257 ni santi ni\u7779 parigrah\u257 \u7751 i | tadasm\u257 bhirady\u257 gre\u7751 a saparigrah\u257 \u7751 i parityajya \
\
ni\uc0\u7779 parigrah\u257 \u7751 i paribhoktavy\u257 ni | te saparigrah\u257 \u7751 i parityajya ni\u7779 parigrah\u257 \u7751 i [pari]\
\
bhoktum\uc0\u257 rabdh\u257 : |\
\
te\uc0\u7779 \u257 metadabhavat | asti vayamadatt\u257 d\u257 n\u257 tprativirat\u257 : | no tu k\u257 mamithy\u257 c\u257 r\u257 t |\

yannu vaya\uc0\u7747  k\u257 mamithy\u257 c\u257 r\u257 t prativiram\u257 ma: | k\u299 d\u7771 \u347 o\'92sm\u257 ka\u7747  k\u257 mamithy\u257 c\u257 ra: | kapi\u7747 jala:\

te\uc0\u7779 \u257 metadabhavat | asti vaya\u7747  m\u7771 \u7779 \u257 v\u257 d\u257 tprativirat\u257 : | no tu sur\u257 maireyamadyapram\u257 -\
\
dasth\uc0\u257 n\u257 tprativirat\u257 : | yannu vaya\u7747  sur\u257 maireyamadyaparm\u257 dasth\u257 n\u257 tprativiram\u257 ma: | k\u299 d\u7771 \u347 amasm\u257 ka\u7747  \

@064\

sur\uc0\u257 maireyamadyapram\u257 dasth\u257 nam | kapi\u7747 jala: kathayati | santi m\u257 dan\u299 y\u257 ni phal\u257 ni santya-\
\
m\uc0\u257 dan\u299 y\u257 ni | tadasm\u257 bhirady\u257 gre\u7751 a m\u257 dan\u299 y\u257 ni phal\u257 ni parityajy\u257 m\u257 dan\u299 y\u257 ni \

phal\uc0\u257 ni paribhoktavy\u257 ni | te m\u257 dan\u299 y\u257 ni phal\u257 ni parityajy\u257 m\u257 dan\u299 y\u257 ni phal\u257 ni \

paribhoktum\uc0\u257 rabdh\u257 : | \
\
yad\uc0\u257  te pa\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pit\u257 stad\u257  kapi\u7747 jala: kathayati | asti vaya\u7747 \
\
bhavanta: pa\uc0\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 hit\u257 : | yannu vayamany\u257 napi pa\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pay\u257 ma: |\
\
tad\uc0\u257  kapi\u7747 jala: kathayati | asti vaya\u7747  bhavanta: pa\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 hit\u257 : | yannu \
\
vayamany\uc0\u257 napi pa\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pay\u257 ma: | te kathayanti | eva\u7747  kurma: | ko yu\u7779 m\u257 ka\u7747  \
\
prati\uc0\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 payati | marka\u7789 a: kathayati  | aha\u7747   sarv\u257 n \u347 \u257 kh\u257 m\u7771 g\u257 nprati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pay\u257 mi | tata: \u347 a\u347 a: \
\
kathayati  | aha\uc0\u7747  sarv\u257 n \u347 a\u347 \u257 n loma\u347 \u257 n m\u7771 g\u257 \u7747 \u347 ca prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pay\u257 mi | hast\u299  kathayati |\
\
aha\uc0\u7747  sarv\u257 n hastina: si\u7747 h\u257 n vy\u257 ghradv\u299 pina\u347 ca prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pay\u257 mi | kapi\u7747 jala: kathayati |\
\
yadyevametattu sa\uc0\u7747 k\u7779 epaya yu\u7779 m\u257 kamavin\u299 y\u257  apad\u257  dvipad\u257 \u347 catu\u7779 pad\u257 : pak\u7779 i\u7751 a\u347 ca | t\u257 naha\u7747  sarv\u257 n \
\
pa\uc0\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pay\u257 m\u299 ti | tataste k\u257 \u347 \u299 vi\u7779 aye y\u257 vattiryagyonigat\u257 : pr\u257 \u7751 inaste \
\
sarve pa\uc0\u7747 casu vratapade\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pit\u257 : | te anyonyamavy\u257 b\u257 dham\u257 n\u257 stasmin vana\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 e \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 praj\u257 navih\u257 ri\u7751 o yathe\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  viharanti | te\u7779 \u257 manubh\u257 v\u257 ddeva: k\u257 lavar\u7779 \u299  sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: |\
\
sad\uc0\u257  pu\u7779 paphal\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 \u257 : \u347 asyavat\u299  vasumat\u299  | tairmanu\u7779 yaird\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257  anyonyamavy\u257 b\u257 dham\u257 n\u257  \
\
viharanta: | sad\uc0\u257   pu\u7779 paphal\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 \u257 : \u347 asyavat\u299  vasumat\u299  | r\u257 j\u257  kathayati  |\

aha\uc0\u7747  dharme\u7751 a r\u257 jya\u7747  k\u257 ray\u257 mi mamai\u7779 o\'92nubh\u257 va iti | anta:pura\u7747  kum\u257 r\u257 m\u257 ty\u257  \
\
bha\uc0\u7789 abal\u257 gra\u7747  naigamaj\u257 napad\u257 \u347 ca | r\u257 j\u257  sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | sarva\u7747  ete kathayanti |\
\
mam\uc0\u257 nubh\u257 vo mam\u257 nubh\u257 va iti | tanna j\'f1\u257 yate kasy\u257 nubh\u257 va iti | sa kut\u363 halaj\u257 to naimitti-\
\
k\uc0\u257 n\u257 h\u363 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 n | tairapi na j\'f1\u257 tam | y\u257 vadv\u257 r\u257 \u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  n\u257 tid\u363 re udy\u257 nam | tatra pa\'f1c\u257 bhij\'f1a \
\
\uc0\u7771 \u7779 i: prativasati sakalasya v\u257 r\u257 \u7751 as\u299 niv\u257 sino janak\u257 yasya p\u363 jyo m\u257 nyo\'92bhiv\u257 dya\u347 ca |\
\
tato r\uc0\u257 j\u257  tasya \u7771 \u7779 e: sak\u257 \u347 amupasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: p\u257 dayornipatya kathayati | mahar\u7779 e mama vijite \
\
y\uc0\u257 vattiryagyonigat\u257 : pr\u257 \u7751 inaste sarve anyonyamavy\u257 b\u257 dham\u257 n\u257 : sa\u7747 praj\u257 navih\u257 ri\u7751 o yathe\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747 \
\
viharanti | deva: k\uc0\u257 lavar\u7779 \u299  sad\u257  pu\u7779 paphal\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 \u257 : \u347 asyavat\u299  ca vasumat\u299  | tasm\u257 nma-\

maitadabhavat | aha\uc0\u7747  dharme\u7751 a r\u257 jya\u7747  kr\u257 ray\u257 mi | mamai\u7779 o\'92nubh\u257 va iti | anta:pura\u7747  kum\u257 r\u257 - \

m\uc0\u257 ty\u257  bha\u7789 abal\u257 gra\u7747  naigamaj\u257 napad\u257 \u347 ca sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayanti | asm\u257 [ka]me\u7779 o\'92nubh\u257 va iti |\

tanna j\'f1\uc0\u257 yate kasy\u257 yamanubh\u257 va iti | kautuka\u347 ca me mah\u257 n | tvamarhasi sa\u7747 \u347 aya\u7747  \

n\uc0\u257 nta:purasya na kum\u257 r\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  na bha\u7789 abal\u257 grasya na naigamaj\u257 napad\u257 n\u257 m |\
\
tu tava vijite catv\uc0\u257 ra: pr\u257 \u7751 ina: prativasanti | te\u7779 \u257 mayamanubh\u257 va iti |\
\
r\uc0\u257 j\u257  kathayati | gacch\u257 mi t\u257 n pa\u347 y\u257 m\u299 ti | \u7771 \u7779 i: kathayati | mah\u257 r\u257 ja ki\u7747  \
\
tava taird\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 airapi tu yatte sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartante tatsam\u257 d\u257 ya vartasveti | ki\u7747  te sam\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
vartante | pa\'f1ca vratapad\uc0\u257 ni | mahar\u7779 e k\u299 d\u7771 \u347 \u257 ni pa\'f1ca vratapad\u257 ni | mah\u257 r\u257 ja te pr\u257 \u7751 ina\u7747  \
\
j\uc0\u299 bit\u257 nna vyavaropayanti | parasva\u7747  n\u257 paharanti | agamy\u257 gamana\u7747  na kurvanti | m\u7771 \u7779 \u257 v\u257 da\u7747  na \
\
bh\uc0\u257 \u7779 ante | madyap\u257 na\u7747  ca n\u257 dhy\u257 caranti | r\u257 j\u257  kathayati | mahar\u7779 e yadyevamahamapyet\u257 ni \
\
pa\'f1ca bratapad\uc0\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartema | atha sa r\u257 j\u257  pa\'f1ca  vratapad\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartitam\u257 rabdha: |\
\
r\uc0\u257 j\u257  pa\'f1ca vratapad\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartata iti devyo\'92pi pa\'f1ca vratapad\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartitum\u257  -\
\
rabdh\uc0\u257 : | kum\u257 r\u257  am\u257 ty\u257  bha\u7789 abal\u257 gra\u7747  naigamaj\u257 napad\u257  api pa\'f1ca vratapad\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
vartitum\uc0\u257 rabdh\u257 ni | pr\u257 tis\u299 mai: ko\u7789 \u7789 ar\u257 jabhi: \u347 rutam  | r\u257 j\u257  brahmadatta: pa\'f1ca vratapad\u257 ni \
\
sam\uc0\u257 d\u257 ya vartate s\u257 rdhamanta:pure\u7751 a kum\u257 rairam\u257 tyairbha\u7789 abal\u257 grairnaigamaj\u257 napadairiti | \u347 rutv\u257  ca \
\
punaste\'92pi pa\'f1cavratapad\uc0\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya vartitum\u257 rabdh\u257 : s\u257 rdhamanta:pure\u7751 a kum\u257 rairam\u257 tyairbha\u7789 a-\

bal\uc0\u257 grairnaigamaj\u257 napadairiti | bh\u363 yas\u257  sarva eva  janak\u257 ya pa\'f1ca vratapad\u257 ni sam\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
vartitum\uc0\u257 rabdha: |\

tena khalu samayena jamb\uc0\u363 dv\u299 pe ya: k\u257 la\u7747  karoti sa k\u257 yasya bhed\u257 tpra\u7751 \u299 te\u7779 u deve\u7779 u \

trayastri\uc0\u7747 \u347 e\u7779 \u363 papadyate | tata: \u347 akro  devendra: \u257 p\u363 ryam\u257 \u7751 a\u7747  devapar\u7779 ada\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  ca punarg\u257 th\u257 \u7747  bh\u257 \u7779 ate |\

sagaurav\uc0\u257 : saprat\u299 \u347 \u257  viharanti tayorvane |\

\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | ki\u7747  manyadhve bhik\u7779 avo yo\'92sau kapi\u7747 jala: ahameva sa: | tena k\u257 lena \
\
tena samayena \uc0\u347 a\u347 a: \u347 \u257 riputro bhik\u7779 urmarka\u7789 o maudgaly\u257 yano bhik\u7779 urgaja \u257 nanda:  | tad\u257 pi \
\
may\uc0\u257  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yath\u257 praj\'f1apt\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 m\u257 gamya sakalo  jamb\u363 dv\u299 paniv\u257 s\u299  janak\u257 yo\
\
bh\uc0\u363 yas\u257  trayastri\u7747 \u347 e devanik\u257 ye upapanna: | etarhyapi may\u257  yath\u257 v\u7771 ddhik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  [yath\u257 ]praj\'f1apt\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yath\u257 -\
\
v\uc0\u7771 ddhik\u257 m\u257 gamya bhik\u7779 avo\'92nyonya\u7747  satkurvanto gurukurvanto m\u257 nayanta: p\u363 jayanto vardhante ku\u347 alai-\
\
rdharmairutpala\uc0\u7747  v\u257  yathodake | tasm\u257 ttarhi bhik\u7779 ava: sagaurav\u257  viharata saprat\u299 \u347 \u257 : sabhayava\u347 avartina:\
\
sabrahmac\uc0\u257 ri\u7779 u sthavire\u7779 u madhye\u7779 u navake\u7779 u | tatkasya heto: | sa t\u257 vadbhik\u7779 avo bhik\u7779 uragauravo\
\
viharannaprat\uc0\u299 \u347 a: abhayava\u347 avart\u299  sthavire\u7779 u madhye\u7779 u navake\u7779 u \u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n \
