@066\
\
parip\uc0\u363 rayi\u7779 yati neda\u7747  sth\u257 na\u7747  vidyate | \u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 naparip\u363 rya \u347 aik\u7779 \u257 n dharm\u257 n \
\
parip\uc0\u363 rayi\u7779 yati neda\u7747  sth\u257 na\u7747  bidyate | \u347 aik\u7779 \u257 ndharm\u257 naparip\u363 rya \u347 \u299 laskandha\u7747  sam\u257 dhiskandha\u7747  \
\
praj\'f1\uc0\u257 skandha\u7747  vimuktiskandha\u7747  vimuktij\'f1\u257 nadar\u347 anaskandha\u7747  parip\u363 rayi\u7779 yati neda\u7747  sth\u257 na\u7747  vidyate |\
\
vimuktij\'f1\uc0\u257 nadar\u347 anaskandhamaparip\u363 ry\u257 nup\u257 d\u257 ya parinirv\u257 syati  neda\u7747  sth\u257 na\u7747  vidyate | sa \
\
t\uc0\u257 vadbhik\u7779 avo bhik\u7779 u: sagauravo viharan saprat\u299 \u347 a: sabhayava\u347 avart\u299  sabrahmac\u257 ri\u7779 u sthavire\u7779 u \
\
madhye\uc0\u7779 u navake\u7779 u \u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n p\u363 rayi\u7779 yati sth\u257 nametadvidyate | \u257 samud\u257 -\
\
c\uc0\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n parip\u363 rya \u347 aik\u7779 \u257 n dharm\u257 n parip\u363 rayi\u7779 yati sth\u257 nametadvidyate | \u347 aik\u7779 \u257 n \
\
dharm\uc0\u257 n parip\u363 rya \u347 \u299 laskandha\u7747  sam\u257 dhiskandha\u7747  praj\'f1\u257 skandha\u7747  vimuktij\'f1\u257 nadar\u347 ana-\
\
skandha\uc0\u7747  parip\u363 rayi\u7779 yati sth\u257 nametadvidyate | vimuktij\'f1\u257 nadar\u347 anaskandha\u7747  parip\u363 ry\u257 nup\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
parinirv\uc0\u257 syati sth\u257 nametadvidyate | tasm\u257 ttarhi bhik\u7779 ava eva\u7747  \u347 ik\u7779 itavyam | yatsagaurav\u257  \
\
vihari\uc0\u7779 y\u257 ma: saprat\u299 \u347 \u257 : sabhayava\u347 avartina: [sabrahmac\u257 ri\u7779 u] sthavire\u7779 u madhye\u7779 u navake\u7779 u |\
\
ityeva\uc0\u7747  vo bhik\u7779 ava: \u347 ik\u7779 itavyam |\
\
yad\uc0\u257  bhagavata: pa\'f1cak\u257  vin\u299 t\u257 ste ara\u7751 ye prativasanti | te ara\u7751 ye prativasanto\'92gamy\u257  \
\
bhavanti si\uc0\u7747 h\u257 n\u257 \u7747  vy\u257 ghr\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  dv\u299 pin\u257 \u7747  tarak\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 m |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | kutra p\u363 rvak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  samyaksa\u7747 buddh\u257 n\u257 \u7747  \u347 r\u257 vak\u257 v\u257 sa\u7747  kalpitavanta: |\
\
pa\uc0\u347 yati vih\u257 re | devat\u257 bhirapyeva\u7747  bhagavata \u257 rocitam|\
\
tena khalu samayena v\uc0\u257 r\u257 \u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  kaly\u257 \u7751 abhadro n\u257 ma g\u7771 hapati: prativasati | tasya ku\u347 ala-\
\
m\uc0\u363 lapratibodhitasantateretadabhavat | aho bat\u257 ha\u7747  bhagavata: \u347 r\u257 vak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  vih\u257 ra\u7747  k\u257 rayeya-\
\
miti | sa k\uc0\u257 lyamevotth\u257 ya yena bhagav\u257 \u7747 stenopasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | upasa\u7747 kramya | bhagavata: p\u257 dau \

\uc0\u347 iras\u257  vanditvaik\u257 nte ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: | ek\u257 ntani\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a\u7747  kaly\u257 \u7751 abhadrika\u7747  g\u7771 hapati\u7747  bhagav\u257 ndharmyay\u257  \

kathay\uc0\u257  sa\u7747 dar\u347 ayati sam\u257 d\u257 payati samuttejayati sa\u7747 prahar\u7779 ayati | anekapary\u257 ye\u7751 a dharmyay\u257  \

kathay\uc0\u257  sa\u7747 dar\u347 ya sam\u257 d\u257 pya samuttejya sa\u7747 prahar\u7779 ya t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | atha kaly\u257 \u7751 abhadriko g\u7771 hapati-\

rutth\uc0\u257 y\u257 san\u257 dek\u257 \u7747 samuttar\u257 sa\u7747 ga\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  yena bhagav\u257 \u7747 sten\u257 \u7747 jali\u7747  pra\u7751 amya bhagavantamidamavocat |\

yadi bhagav\uc0\u257 nanuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 daha\u7747  bhagavata: \u347 r\u257 vak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  vih\u257 ra\u7747  k\u257 rayeyamiti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha |\

iti | bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | yadi trilayana\u7747  k\u257 rayasi madhye gandhaku\u7789 i: k\u257 rayitavy\u257  dvayo:\

gandhaku\uc0\u7789 i: | dv\u257 rako\u7779 \u7789 hakap\u257 r\u347 vayordve layane | sa na j\u257 n\u299 te kati pur\u257 : kartavy\u257  iti |\

@070\

nimantritam | na \uc0\u347 re\u7751 \u299  na p\u363 go na par\u7779 ado n\u257 pi r\u257 j\u257  m\u257 gadha\u347 re\u7751 yo bi\u7747 bis\u257 ro bhaktenopa-\

an\uc0\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasya g\u7771 hapaterbuddha itya\u347 rutap\u363 rva\u7747  gho\u7779 a\u7747  \u347 rutv\u257  sarvaromak\u363 p\u257 ny\u257 h\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 ni | sa \

\uc0\u257 h\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 aromak\u363 pasta\u7747  g\u7771 hapatimidamavocat | ka e\u7779 a g\u7771 hapate buddho n\u257 ma | asti g\u7771 hapate \
\
\uc0\u347 rama\u7751 o gautama: \u347 \u257 kyaputra: \u347 \u257 kyakul\u257 tke\u347 a\u347 ma\u347 r\u363 \u7751 yavat\u257 rya k\u257 \u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7751 i vastr\u257 \u7751 y\u257 cch\u257 dya \
\
samyageva \uc0\u347 raddhay\u257  \u257 g\u257 r\u257 dan\u257 g\u257 rika\u7747  pravrajita: so\'92nuttar\u257 \u7747  samyaksa\u7747 bodhimabhisa\u7747 buddha: | sa \
\
e\uc0\u7779 a g\u7771 hapate buddho n\u257 ma | ka e\u7779 a g\u7771 hapate sa\u7747 gho n\u257 ma | santi g\u7771 hapate k\u7779 atriyakul\u257 dapi \
\
kulaputr\uc0\u257 : ke\u347 a\u347 ma\u347 r\u363 \u7751 yavat\u257 rya k\u257 \u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7751 i vastr\u257 \u7751 y\u257 cch\u257 dya samyageva \u347 raddhay\u257  tameva bhagavanta\u7747  \
\
pravrajitamanupravrajit\uc0\u257 : | br\u257 hma\u7751 akul\u257 dapi  vai\u347 yakul\u257 dapi  \u347 \u363 drakul\u257 dapi kulaputr\u257 : ke\u347 a\u347 ma- \
\
\uc0\u347 r\u363 \u7751 yavat\u257 rya k\u257 \u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7751 i vastr\u257 \u7751 y\u257 cch\u257 dya samyageva \u347 raddhay\u257  \u257 g\u257 r\u257 dan\u257 g\u257 rika\u7747  tameva pravrajita-\

manupravrajit\uc0\u257 : | sa e\u7779 a g\u7771 hapate sa\u7747 gho n\u257 ma | sa may\u257  buddhapramukho bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 gho\'92ntarg\u7771 he  bhakte-\
\
nopanima\uc0\u7747 trita: | kutra g\u7771 hapate sa bhagav\u257 netarhi viharati  | asminneva r\u257 jag\u7771 he \u347 \u299 tavane \
\
\uc0\u347 ma\u347 \u257 ne | labhya\u7747  g\u7771 hapate so\'92sm\u257 bhirbhagav\u257 n dra\u7779 \u7789 um | tena hi g\u7771 hapate \u257 gamaya[sva]\
\
t\uc0\u257 vattvam | sth\u257 nametadvidyate yadih\u257 gata\u7747  \u347 vo drak\u7779 yasi | an\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 ado g\u7771 hapatist\u257 \u7747  r\u257 tri\u7747  \
\
buddh\uc0\u257 lambanay\u257  sm\u7771 ty\u257  middhamavakr\u257 nta: | so\'92prabh\u257 te prabh\u257 tasa\u7747 j\'f1\u299  yena \u347 ivikadv\u257 ra\u7747  tenopa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | tena khalu samayena \u347 ivikadv\u257 ra\u7747  r\u257 try\u257 \u7747  dvau y\u257 mau viv\u7771 ta\u7747  ti\u7779 \u7789 hati p\u363 rvaka\u7747  pa\u347 cimaka\u7747 \

tath\uc0\u257 pi  \u347 ivikadv\u257 ra\u7747  viv\u7771 ta\u7747  ti\u7779 \u7789 hatiti viditv\u257  tenaiv\u257 lokena nagar\u257 nni\u7779 kr\u257 nta: |\

no bhadanta | [g\uc0\u7771 hapate yatra vih\u257 r\u257 : santi tatraiva bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  gantavya\u7747  vastavya\u7747  manyate |\

pravrajy\uc0\u257 vastu \
\
[namo ratnatray\uc0\u257 ya | namo vicchinnabandhan\u257 ya |\
\
nama: sarvatorthikam\uc0\u257 rasenapramardan\u257 ya |\
\
namo bodhipr\uc0\u257 pt\u257 ya |\
\
\uc0\u257 g\u257 ra\u7747  hitv\u257  du\u7779 kar\u257  pravrajy\u257  | pravrajya ca punardu\u7779 karo janapadacary\u257 dhigam\u257 nanda: | \
\
katham\uc0\u257 nandotpatti: | du\u7779 kar\u257  samyakkriy\u257  | du\u7779 kara\u7747  k\u257 \u7779 \u257 yavastradh\u257 ra\u7751 am | sudu\u7779 kara\u7747 \
\
ku\uc0\u347 ala\u347 \u299 lakarmacittamiti | \
\
atha vinayavastuvibh\uc0\u257 g\u257 : | pravrajy\u257 vastu prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 vastu carmavastu bhai\u7779 ajyac\u299 vara-\
\
ka\uc0\u7789 hinavastu ko\u347 \u257 mbakakarmavastu p\u257 \u7751 \u7693 ulohitakavastu pudgalavastu p\u257 riv\u257 sikavastu po\u7779 adha-\
\
sth\uc0\u257 panavastu \u347 ayan\u257 sanavastu sa\u7747 ghabhedavastu ceti |\
\
atha pravrajy\uc0\u257 vastuna: sa\u7747 vibh\u257 g\u257 : | \u347 \u257 r\u299 putrat\u299 rthika: | dvau \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erau | arhadgh\u257 taka: |\
\
ku\uc0\u7751 \u7693 a: | sarvamida\u7747  sam\u257 sata: \u347 \u257 riputrapravrajy\u257  iti | upasampannavidh\u257 nam | upasen\u257 di iti \
\
sam\uc0\u257 sata: pa\'f1ca vibh\u257 g\u257 : |\
\
atha bodhisattvastu\uc0\u7779 it\u257 laye vasati sma | tena samayen a\u7749 gade\u347 e r\u257 j\u257 dhir\u257 ja iti\
\
n\uc0\u257 ma r\u257 j\u257  r\u257 jya\u7747  karoti sma \u7771 ddha\u7747  ca sph\u299 ta\u7747  ca subhik\u7779 a\u7747  bahujan\u257 k\u299 r\u7751 am | magadhade\u347 e \
\
mah\uc0\u257 padma iti n\u257 ma r\u257 j\u257  r\u257 jya\u7747  karoti sma \u7771 ddha\u7747  ca sph\u299 ta\u7747  ca subhik\u7779 a\u7747  bahujan\u257 k\u299 r\u7751 am |\
\
ekasmin samaye a\uc0\u7749 gar\u257 jasya balak\u257 yo mah\u257 n sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta ekasmin samaye ca r\u257 j\'f1o mah\u257 padmasya \
\
balak\uc0\u257 ya:  | yad\u257  a\u7749 gar\u257 jasya balak\u257 yo mah\u257 n sa\u7747 v\u7771 tto hastik\u257 yo\'92\u347 vak\u257 yo rathak\u257 ya:\
\
pattik\uc0\u257 ya iti catura\u7749 gasamanvitastad\u257  r\u257 jag\u7771 ha\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  magadhade\u347 amabhibh\u363 ya nivartate sma |\
\
punaryad\uc0\u257  r\u257 j\'f1o mah\u257 padmasya balak\u257 yo mah\u257 n sa\u7747 v\u7771 tto hastik\u257 yo\'92\u347 vak\u257 yo rathak\u257 ya: \
\
pattik\uc0\u257 ya iti catura\u7749 gasamanvitastad\u257  camp\u257 \u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  a\u7749 gamabhibh\u363 ya nivartate sma | apare\u7751 a \
\
samayena a\uc0\u7749 gar\u257 jasya catura\u7749 gabalak\u257 yo magadhade\u347 am\u257 kramitum\u257 rabdha: | magadhade\u347 av\u257 sino \
\
r\uc0\u257 j\u257 na\u7747  mah\u257 padmam\u257 rocay\u257 m\u257 su: `deva a\u7749 gar\u257 jena catura\u7749 gabalak\u257 yasamanvitena magadhade\u347 a: \
\
sam\uc0\u257 kr\u257 nta: \'91 | r\u257 j\u257  mah\u257 padma etadvacana\u7747  \u347 rutv\u257  catura\u7749 gabalak\u257 yapariv\u7771 to\'92\u7749 gar\u257 jade\u347 \u257 bhimukha\u7747  \
\
pray\uc0\u257 ta:  | atha mah\u257 padmasya hastya\u347 varathapattik\u257 y\u257  a\u7749 gar\u257 jena g\u7771 h\u299 t\u257 : | r\u257 j\u257  mah\u257 padmo\'92pi\
\
par\uc0\u257 jito bhay\u257 bhibh\u363 ta: | apare\'92pi k\u7779 atriy\u257  r\u257 jag\u7771 he praty\u257 gat\u257  r\u257 jag\u7771 ha\u7747  pravi\u347 ya tasya \
\
dv\uc0\u257 ra\u7747  baddhv\u257  tat pr\u257 k\u257 rai: parive\u7779 \u7789 ay\u257 m\u257 su: | a\u7749 gar\u257 jena mah\u257 padmasya lekho\'92nupre\u7779 ita: \

@075\
\
'tva\uc0\u7747  ced bahir\u257 gacchasi iti ku\u347 ala\u7747  noced bahir\u257 gacchasi \u257 k\u257 \u347 apathe gami\u7779 yasi \
\
\uc0\u347 are\u7751 a p\u257 tayi\u7779 y\u257 mi | tva\u7747  cet p\u7771 thivyantara\u7747  pravek\u7779 yasi \u347 akty\u257  udgrah\u299 \u7779 y\u257 mi |\
\
tva\uc0\u7747  cet parvata\u347 ikhare ti\u7779 \u7789 hasi tatr\u257 pi te n\u257 tmarak\u7779 a\u7751 amiti\'92 | r\u257 j\u257  mah\u257 padma: lekha\u7747  \
\
pa\uc0\u7789 hitv\u257  vyathita: kare kapola\u7747  dattv\u257  cint\u257 paro vyavasthita: | atha so\'92m\u257 ty\u257 n\u257 mantrya \
\
etaduv\uc0\u257 ca 'bhavanta e\u7779 o\'92\u7749 gar\u257 ja: parantapo ni\u7779 \u7789 huro mah\u257 balak\u257 yaprabh\u257 v\u257 d asm\u257 kameta\u7747  \

lekha\uc0\u7747  pre\u7779 itav\u257 n | kimid\u257 n\u299 \u7747  vidheyamiti\'92 | te g\u257 thay\u257  abh\u257 \u7779 anta | \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 \u347 ayam\u257 pte vi\u7779 aye pr\u257 \u7751 e\u7779 u ca rak\u7779 y\u257 : pr\u257 \u7751 \u257 : sarvai: |\
\
ity\uc0\u257 hurbudh\u257  yata: punarapi vi\u7779 ayo na tu pr\u257 \u7751 \u257 : ||1||\

etadvacana\uc0\u7747  \u347 rutv\u257  r\u257 j\u257  ka\u7751 \u7789 he asi\u7747  baddhv\u257  bahirgata: | ath\u257 \u7749 gar\u257 jastasya v\u257 r\u7779 ika\u7747  \
\
\uc0\u347 ulka\u7747  nirdh\u257 rya prakr\u257 nta: |\
\
tena samayena bodhisattvastu\uc0\u7779 it\u257 laye ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a :pa\'f1camah\u257 vilokit\u257 ni vilokayati sma |\
\
k\uc0\u257 m\u257 vacar\u257 n \u7779 a\u7693 devanik\u257 y\u257 n tri:k\u7771 tvo j\'f1\u257 payitv\u257  sa gajavaramah\u257 pram\u257 \u7751 a\u7747  m\u257 tu: kuk\u7779 imava-\
\
kr\uc0\u257 mati sma | samanantar\u257 vakr\u257 nte ca bodhisattve mah\u257 n bh\u363 mic\u257 la: abh\u363 t | sarvamida\u7747  \
\
lokadh\uc0\u257 tustrayastri\u7747 \u347 addev\u257 \u347 ca tasya var\u7751 ar\u363 patejas\u257  avabh\u257 sit\u257  abh\u363 van parisphu\u7789 \u257 \u347 ca | yatra \
\
lokadh\uc0\u257 tau anayo\u347 candras\u363 ryayoreva\u7747 mah\u257 nubh\u257 vayoreva\u7747 mahardhikayor\u257 bhay\u257  var\u7751 ena  ca andhak\u257 rata-\
\
misr\uc0\u257  na sphu\u7789 \u257 statra ye sattv\u257  upapann\u257 ste svak\u257 napi  b\u257 h\u363 n pras\u257 rit\u257 n na pa\u347 yanti\

tena avabh\uc0\u257 sena te c\u257 nyonya\u7747  pa\u347 yanti sma anyonya\u7747  sa\u7747 j\u257 nate sma | eva\'f1c\u257 hu: | anye\'92pi \
\
kila bho: sattv\uc0\u257  ihopapann\u257  iti |\
\
bodhisattvasya janmak\uc0\u257 lasamaye caturmah\u257 nagare\u7779 u catv\u257 ro mah\u257 r\u257 j\u257  abh\u363 van | tadyath\u257 \
\
r\uc0\u257 jag\u7771 he mah\u257 padmasya putra: | \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  brahmadattasya putra: | ujjayiny\u257 \u7747  r\u257 j\'f1o\'92nantaneme: \

putra: | kau\uc0\u347 \u257 mby\u257 \u7747  r\u257 j\'f1a: \u347 at\u257 n\u299 kasya putra: |\

\
samujjvala: | aya\uc0\u7747  mahi\u7779 y\u257  bimb\u257 y\u257 stanaya: | ato\'92sya bimbis\u257 ra iti n\u257 ma k\u257 ryam |\
\
r\uc0\u257 j\u257  brahmadatto\'92cintayat | mama putre j\u257 te lokadh\u257 tu: praka\u7789 aparisphu\u7789 o\'92vabh\u257 \u7779 ita\u347 c\u257 bhavat |\
\

atha pa\'f1cabhiram\uc0\u257 tyairbimbis\u257 rasya j\u257 timaha\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  gotr\u257 nur\u363 pa\u7747  n\u257 madheya\u7747 ] vyavasth\u257 pitam |\
\
bimbis\uc0\u257 ra: kum\u257 ro\'92\u7779 \u7789 \u257 bhyo dh\u257 tr\u299 bhyo\'92nupradatta: | dv\u257 bhy\u257 ma\u7747 kadh\u257 tr\u299 bhy\u257 \u7747  dv\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 \u299 radh\u257 tr\u299 bhy\u257 \u7747  \
\
dv\uc0\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  maladh\u257 tr\u299 bhy\u257 \u7747  dv\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  kr\u299 \u7693 anik\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  dh\u257 tr\u299 bhy\u257 m | [t\u257 bhirdh\u257 tr\u299 bhirdugdhena dadhn\u257  \
\
navan\uc0\u299 tena sarpi\u7779 \u257  sarpirma\u7751 \u7693 en\u257 nyai\u347 ca uttaptottaptairupakara\u7751 avi\u347 e\u7779 ai]r\u257 \u347 u vardhyate h\u7771 dasthamiva \

pa\uc0\u7747 kajam | yad\u257   sa mah\u257 n sa\u7747 v\u7771 ttastad\u257  lipy\u257 mupanyasta: | sa\u7747 khy\u257 y\u257 \u7747   ga\u7751 an\u257 y\u257 \u7747  mudr\u257 y\u257 \u7747  y\u257 ni \
\
ca t\uc0\u257 ni r\u257 j\'f1\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 atriy\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  \u347 ilpasth\u257 nakarmasth\u257 n\u257 ni tadyath\u257  hastigr\u299 v\u257 y\u257 ma\u347 vap\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 he rathetsarau\

dhanu\uc0\u7779 i pary\u257 \u7751 e niry\u257 \u7751 e a\u7747 ku\u347 agr\u257 he p\u257 \u347 agr\u257 he tomaragr\u257 he chedye bhedye vedhye [tadyath\u257  d\u363 ravedhye \

\uc0\u347 abdavedhye marmavedhye ak\u7779 u\u7751 \u7751 avedhye d\u7771 \u7693 ha+prah\u257 rit\u257 y\u257 \u7747  ceti] pa\u7747 casu sth\u257 ne\u7779 u k\u7771 t\u257 v\u299  sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: |\

t\uc0\u257 nyapi pa\u7747 c\u257 m\u257 tyaputra\u347 at\u257 ni pa\u7747 casu sth\u257 ne\u7779 u k\u7771 t\u257 v\u299 ni sa\u7747 v\u7771 tt\u257 ni | sa pitr\u257 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 da\u347 asu\

\uc0\u347 re\u7751 \u299 \u7779 vavat\u257 rita: | ato\'92sya \u347 re\u7751 yo [bimbis\u257 ra iti khy\u257 ti: | tato pare\u7751 a samayena sa]\
\
hastikandh\uc0\u257 dhir\u363 \u7693 ho janapad\u257 nnirgacchati | tena te d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257  a\u7749 gasya r\u257 j\'f1a: pauru\u7779 ey\u257 : karapraty\u257 y\u257 -\

nudgr\uc0\u257 hayanta: | sa kathayati | bhavanta: kasyaite karapraty\u257 y\u257 n udgr\u257 hayanti | [te kathayanti |\

so\'92pi r\uc0\u257 j\u257  k\u7779 atriyo m\u363 rdh\u257 bhi\u7779 ikto vayamapi r\u257 j\u257 na: [k\u7779 atriy\u257  m\u363 rdh\u257 bhisikt\u257 : | tat\

kum\uc0\u257 ra: | gacch\u257 mo vayam | mah\u257 padmasya r\u257 j\'f1o gatv\u257  \u257 rocay\u257 ma: | te r\u257 j\'f1o mah\u257 padmasya \

sak\uc0\u257 \u347 amupasa\u7747 kr\u257 nt\u257 : | upasa\u7747 kramya [kathayanti | deva vayama\u7749 gar\u257 jasya pauru\u7779 ey\u257  ] bimbi-\

s\uc0\u257 re\u7751 a kum\u257 re\u7751 a karapraty\u257 y\u257 nudagr\u257 hayanto niv\u257 rit\u257 : | kinnu gr\u257 hay\u257 mo neti | sa \

kathayati | bhavanta: aprak\uc0\u7771 tij\'f1o\'92yamiha kum\u257 ra: | yathaiva y\u363 ya\u7747  bh\u363 te karapraty\u257 y\u257 nudgr\u257 hayatha \

tathaiveti | [atha te puna: karapraty\uc0\u257 y\u257 nudgr\u257 hayanto] janapadebhyo vivartit\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 : |\

[atha a\uc0\u7749 gar\u257 jena mah\u257 padmasya lekha: pre\u7779 ita: | bimbis\u257 rasya ka\u7751 \u7789 he asi\u7747  \
\
baddhv\uc0\u257 ] pre\u7779 aya yavasayogyama\u347 ana\u7747  v\u257  sajj\u299 kuru | e\u7779 o\'92ham\u257 gacch\u257 m\u299 ti | mah\u257 padmo r\u257 j\u257  \
\
lekha\uc0\u7747  \u347 rutv\u257  vyathita: | tena bimbis\u257 ra: kum\u257 ra: \u347 abd\u257 pita: | ukta\u347 ca | putra kasm\u257 ttvay\u257  \
\
a\uc0\u7749 gasya r\u257 j\'f1a: pauru\u7779 ay\u257  [niv\u257 rit\u257 : | sa kathayati | deva kasm\u257 t paratantr\u257 : \
\
karapraty\uc0\u257 y\u257 n prayacch\u257 ma: | putra vaya\u7747  karad\u257  iti] | sa kathayati | deva so\'92pi r\u257 j\u257  \
\
k\uc0\u7779 atriyo m\u363 rgh\u257 bhi\u7779 ikta: | vayamapi r\u257 j\u257 na: k\u7779 atriy\u257  m\u363 rdh\u257 bhi\u7779 ikt\u257 : | kasm\u257 dvaya\u7747  tasya \
\
karapraty\uc0\u257 y\u257 nanuprayacch\u257 ma: | kevala\u7747  mama deva catura\u7749 ga\u7747  balak\u257 yam\u257  [j\'f1\u257 paya | vayama\u7749 gar\u257 jena \
\
saha sa\uc0\u7747 gr\u257 ma\u7747  kari\u7779 y\u257 ma: | atha mah\u257 ] padmena r\u257 j\'f1\u257  lekho\'92nupre\u7779 ita: | y\u257  te \u347 aktirbala\u7747 \
\
v\uc0\u299 rya\u7747  par\u257 kramastanna h\u257 payi\u7779 yas\u299 ti | sa \u347 rutv\u257  ru\u7779 ito\'92m\u257 ty\u257 n\u257 mantrayate | sann\u257 hayantu \
\
bhavanta\uc0\u347 catura\u7749 ga\u7747  balak\u257 yam | [tena balak\u257 yena magadhavi\u7779 aya \u257 kramitavya: | atha sa \
\
catura\uc0\u7749 gabalak\u257 ya\u7747  sajj\u299 k\u7771 tya hastik\u257 yama]\u347 vak\u257 ya\u7747  rathak\u257 ya\u7747  pattik\u257 ya\u7747  magadhavi\u7779 aya\u7747  \
\
n\uc0\u257 \u347 ayitum\u257 rabdho n\u257 \u347 ayat\u299 ti magadhavi\u7779 ayaniv\u257 sin\u257  janak\u257 yena mah\u257 padmamya r\u257 j\'f1a udgr\u257 hak\u257 \
\
datt\uc0\u257 : | deva [a\u7749 gar\u257 jena magadhavi\u7779 aya \u257 kr\u257 nta: | tactchruv\u257  r\u257 j\u257  mah\u257 padmo vyathita: kare \
\
kapola\uc0\u7747  dattv\u257  cint\u257 paro vyavasthita: | atha] tena bimbis\u257 ra\u7747  kum\u257 ra\u7747  \u347 abd\u257 payitv\u257  tasya \
\
catura\uc0\u7749 go balak\u257 yo\'92nupradatta: | bimbis\u257 ra: kum\u257 rast\u257 n sarv\u257 n kum\u257 r\u257 n sa\u7747 nip\u257 tya \
\
kathayati | ahama\uc0\u7749 gena r\u257 j\'f1\u257  s\u257 rdha\u7747  sa\u7747 gr\u257 mayi\u7779 y\u257 mi | [ki\u7747  kara\u7751 \u299 yam | te kathayanti |\
\
deva bhavat\uc0\u257 \u7747  yath\u257 vasth\u257  asm\u257 kamapi tathaiva bhavet | atha te im\u257 \u7747 ] g\u257 th\u257 \u7747  bh\u257 \u7779 ante |\
\
yasmin manu\uc0\u7779 ye ramate kula\u347 r\u299 : sa sarvata: sa\u7747 parirak\u7779 itavya: |\
\
tasmin vina\uc0\u7779 \u7789 e vina\u347 yanti sarve n\u257 bhervin\u257 \u347 \u257 diva cakrap\u257 d\u257 : ||3||\
\
aha\uc0\u7747  bhavadbhi: sarvata: sa\u7747 parirak\u7779 itavya: | [yatra bhavata: p\u257 dau tatra na: \u347 ir\u257 \u7747 si | atha \
\
ca catura\uc0\u7749 gabalak\u257 yapariv\u7771 to r\u257 jag\u7771 h\u257 nnirgata: | tena samayena r\u257 j\u257  mah\u257 padmo\'92m\u257 tyapariv\u7771 ta \
\
upari] pr\uc0\u257 s\u257 datalagatasti\u7779 \u7789 hati | ten\u257 sau nirgacchan d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | so\'92m\u257 ty\u257 n\u257 mantrayate |\

sa\uc0\u7747 gharak\u7779 ito\'92bhihita: | putra aj\u257 ta eva tva\u7747  may\u257 rya\u347 \u257 riputrasya pa\u347 c\u257 cchrama\u7751 o datta iti |\
\
caramabhavika: sa sattva  \uc0\u257 yu\u7779 manta\u7747  \u347 \u257 riputra\u7747  p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 hata: samanubaddha: | sa \u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257   \u347 \u257 riputre\u7751 a\

pravr\uc0\u257 jita upasa\u7747 p\u257 dita \u257 gamacatu\u7779 \u7789 aya\u7747  ca gr\u257 hita: | \

ath\uc0\u257 pare\u7751 a samayena t\u257 ni  pa\'f1cava\u7751 ik\u347 at\u257 ni mah\u257 samudragaman\u299 ya\u7747  pa\u7751 ya\u7747  samud\u257 n\u299 ya \

mah\uc0\u257 samudramavatartuk\u257 m\u257 ni kathayanti | ka\u7747 cid vaya\u7747  bhavanta \u257 ryakamavat\u257 ray\u257 m\u299  yo\'92sm\u257 ka\u7747  \

@088\

samyaksa\uc0\u7747 buddhasya \u347 r\u257 vak\u257  \u257 san | tairasm\u257 ka\u7747  bhakt\u257 gre ra\u7751 amutp\u257 ditam | te \

vaya\uc0\u7747  bhakt\u257 gre ra\u7751 amutp\u257 dayitv\u257  iha pratyekanarake\u7779 \u363 papann\u257 : | sth\u257 nametad vidyate \
\
yadasm\uc0\u257 bhi: ita\u347 cyutairnarake\u7779 \u363 papattavya\u7747  bhavi\u7779 yati | s\u257 dhu sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita jambudv\u299 pa\u7747  gatv\u257  \
\
sabrahmac\uc0\u257 ri\u7751 \u257 m\u257 rocaya | m\u257 yu\u7779 manta: sa\u7747 ghamadhye ra\u7751 amutp\u257 dayi\u7779 yatha | m\u257  asyaiva\u7747 -\
\
r\uc0\u363 pasya du:khadauramanasyasya bh\u257 gino bhavi\u7779 yatha tadyath\u257  \u347 rama\u7751 \u257 : k\u257 \u347 yap\u299 y\u257 : |\
\
sa sa\uc0\u7747 prasthita: | y\u257 vat pa\u347 yati dv\u299 t\u299 ya\u7747  vih\u257 ramudgata\u7747  ma\'f1cap\u299 \u7789 havedik\u257 j\u257 lav\u257 t\u257 -\
\
yanaparik\uc0\u7779 ipta\u7747  gav\u257 k\u7779 aparima\u7751 \u7693 ita\u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7747 \u347 ca sa\u7747 pr\u257 v\u7771 t\u257 n sa\u7747 praticchann\u257 n \u347 \u257 ntenery\u257 pathen\u257 -\
\
vasthit\uc0\u257 n | sa te\u7779 \u257 mupasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | sa tairukta: | sv\u257 gata\u7747   bhadanta sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 it\u257 ya | sa \
\
tairvi\uc0\u347 r\u257 mita: | vi\u347 r\u257 mayitv\u257  vih\u257 ra\u7747  prave\u347 ito y\u257 vat pa\u347 yati \u347 obhan\u257 \u7747   \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  \

k\uc0\u7771 t\u257 \u7747  pra\u7751 \u299 ta\u7747  c\u257 h\u257 ra\u7747  samanv\u257 h\u7771 tam| sa tairukta: | bhadanta sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita bhu\u7749 k\u7779 va | tena \

d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 d\u299 navena bhuktam | bhuktv\u257  ek\u257 nte apakramy\u257 vasthita: | te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299  \u257 ko\u7789 it\u257  |\

te svakasvak\uc0\u257 ni p\u257 tr\u257 \u7751 y\u257 d\u257 ya yath\u257 gatya ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 : | sa ca vih\u257 ro\'92ntarhita: | tadanna-\
\
p\uc0\u257 nam ayorasa\u7747  pr\u257 durbh\u363 tam | tair\u257 rtasvara\u7747  krandadbhist\u257 vadayorasena parasparam\u257 tm\u257  sikto \
\
y\uc0\u257 vat k\u257 lamak\u257 l\u299 bh\u363 tam | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 t punarapi sa te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  vih\u257 ra: pr\u257 durbh\u363 ta: | te ca \

bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: punarapi  \u347 \u257 nt\u257 : \u347 \u257 ntenery\u257 pathen\u257 vasthit\u257 : | sa te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  sak\u257 \u347 amupasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | ke \

y\uc0\u363 yam\u257 yu\u7779 manta: kena v\u257  karma\u7751 \u257  ihopapann\u257 : | du\u7779 kuhak\u257  bhadanta sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita j\u257 mbudv\u299 pak\u257  \

manu\uc0\u7779 y\u257 : | n\u257 bhi\u347 raddadh\u257 syasi | sa kathayati | aha\u7747  pratyak\u7779 adar\u347 \u299  kasm\u257 t n\u257 bhi\u347 radda-\

dh\uc0\u257 sye | te kathayanti | bhadanta sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita vaya\u7747  k\u257 \u347 yapasya samyaksambuddhasya \u347 r\u257 vak\u257  \

\uc0\u257 san | sa\u7747 ghasya ca snehal\u257 bhe sa\u7747 pann\u257  \u257 gantuk\u257  bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gat\u257 : | tairasm\u257 bhira-\

m\uc0\u257 tsaryaparig\u7771 h\u299 taireva\u7747  cittamutp\u257 ditam | na t\u257 vadbhojayi\u7779 y\u257 mo y\u257 vadete \u257 gantuk\u257  \

bhik\uc0\u7779 avo na prakr\u257 nt\u257  bhavi\u7779 yant\u299 ti | tairasm\u257 bhistat tathaiva k\u7771 tam | s\u257 pt\u257 hika\u7747  c\u257 k\u257 - \

ladurddina\uc0\u7747  pr\u257 durbh\u363 tam | tena tadannap\u257 na\u7747  kleda\u7747  gatam | vaya\u7747  \u347 raddh\u257 deya\u7747  vinip\u257 tayitv\u257  iha \

pratyekanarake\uc0\u7779 \u363 papann\u257 : | sth\u257 nametad vidyate yadasm\u257 bhiriha cyutairnarake\u7779 \u363 papattavya\u7747  bhavi\u7779 yati |\

kathayati  | sukhit\uc0\u257  tvam | na pa\u347 yasi may\u257  kriy\u257 k\u257 re\u7751 a prati\u347 raya\u7747   labdha\u7747  ki\u7747  ni\u7779 k\u257 -\

s\uc0\u257 payitumicchasi | s\u257   sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | \u347 r\u257 ntak\u257 yo\'92ya\u7747  svapitu | madhyame y\u257 me \
\
upasa\uc0\u7747 krami\u7779 y\u257 mi | s\u257  madhyame y\u257 me upasa\u7747 kr\u257 nt\u257  | upasa\u7747 kramya kathayati | \u257 rya \

api tu nan\uc0\u363 kta\u7747  bhagavat\u257  | bhayabhairavasahi\u7779 \u7751 un\u257  te bhavitavyamiti | \u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita:\

@094\
\
asmin khalu dharmapary\uc0\u257 ye bh\u257 \u7779 yam\u257 \u7751 e sarvaistai: saha saty\u257 bhisamay\u257 d an\u257 g\u257 miphala-\
\
manupr\uc0\u257 ptam \u7771 ddhi\u347 c\u257 pi nirh\u7771 t\u257  | sarvaistai: subh\u257 \u7779 ita\u7747  madanta sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita subh\u257 \u7779 itamiti\
\
ekan\uc0\u257 do mukta: | tay\u257  devatay\u257  \u7771 ddhyabhisa\u7747 sk\u257 r\u257 : pratiprasrabdh\u257 : | te paraspara\u7747  \
\
dra\uc0\u7779 \u7789 um\u257 rabdh\u257 : | anyonya\u7747  kathayanti | tvamapi \u257 gata: | \u257 gato\'92ham | \u347 obhanam |\
\
te d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 asaty\u257 : kathayanti | labhema vaya\u7747  bhadanta sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita sv\u257 khy\u257 te dharmavinaye \
\
pravrajy\uc0\u257 mupasa\u7747 pada\u7747  bhik\u7779 ubh\u257 va\u7747  carema vaya\u7747  bhagavato\'92ntike brahmacaryam | \u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita: \
\
kathayati | ki\uc0\u7747  matsak\u257 \u347 e pravrajatha \u257 hosvid bhagavata: | te kathayanti  | bhagavata: | \
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita: kathayati | yadyevam \u257 gacchatha bhagavata: s\u257 k\u257 \u347 a\u7747  gacch\u257 ma: | te \

kathayanti | bhadanta sa\uc0\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita kimasmad\u299 yay\u257  \u7771 ddhay\u257  gacch\u257 ma: \u257 hosvit tvad\u299 yay\u257 |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita: sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | ebhirmad\u299 yen\u257 vav\u257 denaiva\u7747 vidh\u257  gu\u7751 aga\u7751 \u257  adhigat\u257 : |\

aha\uc0\u7747  la\u7749 ghanakopama: sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: | sa kathayati | ti\u7779 \u7789 hantu t\u257 vad bhavanto mah\u363 rttam | \u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n \

sa\uc0\u7747 gharak\u7779 ito\'92nyatama\u7747  v\u7771 k\u7779 am\u363 la\u7747  ni\u347 ritya ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: parya\u7749 kam\u257 bhujya \u7771 juk\u257 ya\u7747  pra\u7751 idh\u257 ya pratimukha\u7747  \

prat\uc0\u299 tyasamutp\u257 daku\u347 alo bhavati | sth\u257 n\u257 sth\u257 naku\u347 alo bhavati | aparapratibaddh\u257  \

ida\uc0\u7747  ceda\u7747  ca | te kathayanti | vayamapyup\u257 dhy\u257 ya evameva\u7747  kaly\u257 \u7751 amitram\u257 gamya tasyaiva \

gl\uc0\u257 na \u257 ryaka iti | te\'92pyupasa\u7747 kr\u257 nt\u257 : | asti ki\u7747 cid\u257 rye\u7751 a gu\u7751 aga\u7751 amadhigatam |\

n\uc0\u257 sti | ki\u7747  pra\u7751 idh\u257 na\u7747  k\u7771 tam | ida\u7747  ceda\u7747  ca | te kathayanti | vayamapy\u257 ryameva\u7747  \

kaly\uc0\u257 \u7751 amitram\u257 gamya tasyaiva bhagavato\'92ntike sarvakle\u347 aprah\u257 \u7751 \u257 darhattva\u7747  s\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkuryu: |\

ki\uc0\u7747  manyadhve bhik\u7779 ava: | yo\'92sau vaiy\u257 v\u7771 tyakara e\u7779 a ev\u257 sau sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ito bhik\u7779 u: |\
\
y\uc0\u257 ni t\u257 ni  pa\'f1ca s\u257 rdha\u7747 vih\u257 ri\u347 at\u257 nyet\u257 nyeva t\u257 ni pa\'f1ca va\u7751 ik\u347 at\u257 ni | yadanena tatra \
\
dhrmavaiy\uc0\u257 v\u7771 tya\u7747  k\u7771 ta\u7747  tasya karma\u7751 o vip\u257 ken\u257 \u7693 hye mah\u257 dhane mah\u257 bhoge kule upapanna: |\

lokena utko\uc0\u347 amasi\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  tasy\u257  utk\u7771 ttam\u363 la\u7747  \u347 ira: k\u7771 tv\u257  p\u7771 thivy\u257 \u7747  nip\u257 titam | sa \

bhai\uc0\u7779 \u299 : n\u257 styatra k\u257 cid d\u257 rik\u257 dv\u299 t\u299 y\u257  | sa sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | \u257 rocayi\u7779 y\u257 myasy\u257 : priyo \

bhavi\uc0\u7779 y\u257 mi | sa kathayati | bhadre may\u257  tvadartha\u7747  m\u257 t\u257  pragh\u257 tit\u257  | s\u257  kathayati | ki\u7747  dh\u257 tr\u299 \
\
\uc0\u257 hosvijjanitr\u299  | sa kathayati | janitr\u299  | s\u257  sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | yo n\u257 ma gu\u7751 \u257 n\u257 manabhij\'f1o\
\
bh\uc0\u363 tv\u257  m\u257 tara\u7747  pragh\u257 tayati yad\u257  mam\u257 ntike prakopa\u7747  janayi\u7779 yati k\u257  me samavasth\u257  bhavi\u7779 yati \

ni\uc0\u7779 pal\u257 yita: | \u257 tm\u299 ya\u7747  g\u7771 ha\u7747  gatv\u257  dv\u257 ram\u363 le\'e2\'80\'99si\u7747  prak\u7779 ipya-aya\u7747  sa coro m\u257 tara\u7747  me \

pragh\uc0\u257 tya ni\u7779 pal\u257 yita iti | sa t\u257 \u7747  m\u257 tara\u7747  satk\u257 rya gata: | p\u257 pakarmak\u257 r\u299  sattvo dh\u7771 ti\u7747  na \

labhate | sa t\uc0\u257 ni t\u299 rth\u257 ni tapovan\u257 ti gatv\u257  papraccha bhavanta: ki\u7747  karma kriyate yena p\u257 paka\u7747  \

dharma: aho sa\uc0\u7747 gha: aho dharmasya sv\u257 khy\u257 tat\u257  | yatred\u257 nomeva\u7747 vidh\u257  api p\u257 pak\u257 ri\u7751 o \

antim\uc0\u257 pannakena catv\u257 ra utk\u7779 epakena ca ||19||\

buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane\'e2\'80\'99n\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257  [r\u257 ] ma | yad\u257 \

bhagavat\uc0\u257  r\u257 j\u257  bimbis\u257 ra: satye\u7779 u prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pita: s\u257 rdhama\u347 \u299 ty\u257  devat\u257 sahasrairanekai\u347 ca \

m\uc0\u257 gadhakairbr\u257 hma\u7751 ag\u7771 hapati\u347 atasahasrai: tena sve vijite gha\u7751 \u7789 \u257 vagho\u7779 a\u7751 a\u7747  k\u257 ritam | na mama \
\
vijite caurya\uc0\u7747  kartavyam | ya: karoti tamaha\u7747  nirvi\u7779 aya\u7747  karomi | svasm\u257 cca ko\u347 ako\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 -\

g\uc0\u257 r\u257 nmo\u7779 aka\u7747  dad\u257 m\u299 ti | yad\u257  ca bhagavat\u257  r\u257 j\u257  prasenajid daharopamena s\u363 tre\u7751 a vin\u299 ta-\

stad\uc0\u257  ten\u257 pi sve vijite gha\u7751 \u7789 \u257 vagho\u7779 a\u7751 a\u7747  k\u257 ritam | na mama vijite caurya\u7747  karttavyam |\
\
ya: karoti tasya vadho da\uc0\u7751 \u7693 a: | svasm\u257 cca ko\u347 ako\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 g\u257 r\u257 nmo\u7779 aka\u7747  dad\u257 m\u299 ti | tato ye \
\
magadhavi\uc0\u7779 aye cor\u257  ye ca kosalavi\u7779 aye te s\u299 m\u257 ntarik\u257 n gatv\u257 vasthit\u257 : | yo magadha-\
\
vi\uc0\u7779 ay\u257 t s\u257 rthav\u257 ha \u257 gacchati tamapi mu\u7779 \u7751 anti yo\'e2\'80\'99pi kosalavi\u7779 ay\u257 t | y\u257 vadapare\u7751 a \
\
samayena magadhavi\uc0\u7779 ay\u257 t s\u257 nuy\u257 tra: s\u257 rtha: kosalavi\u7779 aya\u7747  sa\u7747 prasthito yad\u257  s\u299 m\u257 ntarik\u257 n \
\
pr\uc0\u257 ptastad\u257  sa s\u257 rthav\u257 ha: kathayati | bhavanto\'e2\'80\'99sau r\u257 j\u257  prasenajit kosalo vy\u257 \u7693 o \
\
vikr\uc0\u257 nta: \u347 akto\'e2\'80\'99sm\u257 ka\u7747  mo\u7779 a\u7747  d\u257 payitu\u7747  kimartha\u7747  vayam\u257 y\u257 trik\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  bh\u7771 timanuprayacch\u257 ma: |\
\
pratinivartantu ata evaita iti | te tai: pratinivartit\uc0\u257 : | avaga\u7751 ako\'e2\'80\'99sau s\u257 rtha: \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 prasthita: | te ca cor\u257  bhalin dacv\u257 vasthit\u257 : | tena sam\u257 khy\u257 tam | bhavanto\'e2\'80\'99-\
\
vaga\uc0\u7751 aka: s\u257 rtha \u257 gacchati | kimud\u257 s\u299 n\u257 sti\u7779 \u7789 hateti | tataste taskar\u257 : pradh\u257 vi\u7747 t\u257 :|\
\
tatra kecid va\uc0\u7751 ijo j\u299 vit\u257 d vyavaropit\u257 : kecit pu\u7751 ya\u7747  chorayitv\u257  ni\u7779 pal\u257 yit\u257 : | \
\
asamanv\uc0\u257 hnaty\u257 rhat\u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 nada\u347 ana\u7747  na pravartate | arhanto\'e2\'80\'99pi tena s\u257 rthena gacchanto \

j\uc0\u299 vit\u257 d vyavaropit\u257 : | tatra ye va\u7751 ijo ni\u7779 pal\u257 yit\u257 ste p\u257 \u7747 \u347 un\u257  \u347 iro g\u257 tra\u7747  ca \

dh\uc0\u363 layitvoddhastamastak\u257  vikro\u347 anto r\u257 jha: prasenajita: kosalasya sak\u257 \u347 a\u7747  gat\u257 : k\u7771 takarapu\u7789 \u257 \

vijh\uc0\u257 payanti | deva tava vijite vayamava\u7751 ijo vyavasth\u257 pit\u257 : | ki\u7747  k\u7771 tam | corairmu-\
\
\uc0\u7779 it\u257 : sma | katarasmin prade\u347 e | amu\u7779 min | r\u257 jh\u257  vir\u363 \u7693 hakasya sen\u257 pater\u257 jh\u257  datt\u257  |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u299 ghra\u7747  mo\u7779 aka\u7747  taskar\u257 \u7747 \u347 c\u257 nayeti | sa catura\u7749 ga balak\u257 ya\u7747  sann\u257 hya hastik\u257 yama\u347 vak\u257 ya\u7747  \

@105\
\
rathak\uc0\u257 ya\u7747  pattik\u257 ya\u7747  sannahya nirgata: | te\'e2\'80\'99pi cor\u257  visrabdhavih\u257 ri\u7751 o muktasann\u257 h\u257 :\
\
anyatamasy\uc0\u257 \u7747  \u347 \u257 l\u257 \u7789 avy\u257 \u7747  mo\u7779 aka\u7747  bh\u257 jayam\u257 n\u257 sti\u7779 \u7789 hanti | te vir\u363 \u7693 hakena caturdi\u347 a\u7747  \
\
ve\uc0\u7779 \u7789 ayitv\u257  madhye \u347 a\u7749 khapa\u7789 aha\u347 abdairvitr\u257 sit\u257 : | te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  kecinmo\u7779 aka\u7747  chorayitv\u257  ni\u7779 pal\u257 yit\u257 : \

kecit pragh\uc0\u257 tit\u257 : | \u7779 a\u7779 \u7789 istu j\u299 vagr\u257 ha\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 t\u257 : | sa t\u257 n mo\u7779 aka\u7747  c\u257 d\u257 ya r\u257 j\'f1a: \
\
sak\uc0\u257 \u347 a\u7747  gata: | deva am\u299  cor\u257  aya\u7747  ca mo\u7779 aka iti | tataste r\u257 j\'f1\u257 bhihit\u257 : | \

bhavanto na yu\uc0\u7779 m\u257 bhi: \u347 ruta\u7747  r\u257 j\'f1\u257 vagho\u7779 a\u7751 a\u7747  k\u257 ritam | na me vijite kenacit caurya\u7747  \
\
kartavyam | ya: karoti tasya badho da\uc0\u7751 \u7693 a: svasm\u257 cca ko\u347 ako\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 g\u257 r\u257 nmo\u7779 aka\u7747  dad\u257 m\u299 ti |\
\
te kathayanti | \uc0\u347 rutam | atha kasm\u257 d va\u7751 ijo mu\u7779 it\u257 : | deva na j\u299 v\u257 ma: | deva na j\u299 v\u257 m: | kasm\u257 d \
\
j\uc0\u299 vit\u257 d vyavaropit\u257  | bhayamupadar\u347 ayadbhi: | k\u299 d\u7771 \u347 a\u7747  yu\u7779 m\u257 bhirbhayamupadar\u347 itam | id\u257 n\u299 \u7747  \

vast\uc0\u257 d\u7771 \u347 a\u7747  bhayamupadar\u347 ay\u257 mi yanna kenacid dar\u347 itap\u363 rvam | tato r\u257 j\'f1\u257 m\u257 ty\u257 n\u257 m\u257 j\'f1\u257  datt\u257  |\
\
gacchantu bhavanta: sarv\uc0\u257 n et\u257 n pragh\u257 tayata | te rathy\u257 v\u299 thicatvara\u347 \u7771 \u7749 g\u257 \u7789 ake\u7779 vanu\u347 r\u257 vya-\
\
m\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u257  \u257 gh\u257 tana\u7747  n\u299 yante | anyatama\u347 ca coro rathy\u257 sa\u7747 b\u257 dhe ni\u7779 pal\u257 yito jetavana\u7747  bhik\u7779 o:\
\
sak\uc0\u257 \u347 amupasa\u7747 kramya kathayati | \u257 rya pravrajitumicch\u257 mi | sa tena pravrajita upasa\u7747 p\u257 dita: |\
\
te\'e2\'80\'99pi cor\uc0\u257 : pragh\u257 tit\u257 : | ukta\u7747  bhagavat\u257  \u257 tmavipatti\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo\'e2\'80\'99bh\u299 k\u7779 \u7751 a\u7747  pratyavek\u7779 adhvam | \

tat kasya heto: | \uc0\u257 tmavipattirbhik\u7779 ava: sa\u7747 vejan\u299 ya\u7747  sth\u257 na\u7747  paravipatti: \u257 tmasampatti:\

caranti | so\'e2\'80\'99pi tai: s\uc0\u257 rdha\u7747  \u347 ma\u347 \u257 nac\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  carati | tena te cor\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257 : pragh\u257 tit\u257 : | \

s\uc0\u257 \u347 ruka\u7751 \u7789 ho vyavasthita: | bhik\u7779 ava: kathayanti | \u257 yu\u7779 manta: \u299 d\u7771 \u347 o\'e2\'80\'99pyaya\u7747  bhadr\u257 \u347 ayo \
\
navapravrajita iti | sa muktakenaiva ka\uc0\u7751 \u7789 hena roditum\u257 rabdha: | bhik\u7779 ujbhirucyate | \u257 yu\u7779 man \

kasy\uc0\u257 rthe\u7747  tvamevamor\u257 \u7789 ik\u257 \u7747  karo\u7779 \u299 ti | sa kathayati | aya\u7747  me pit\u257  aya\u7747  [me]\

bhr\uc0\u257 t\u257  aya\u7747  me pit\u7771 vya: aya\u7747  me m\u257 tula iti | te kathayanti | ebhirarhanto j\u299 vit\u257 d \
\
vyavaropit\uc0\u257  m\u257  tvay\u257 pi vyavaropit\u257 : | sa kathayati | vyavaropit\u257 : | etat prakara\u7751 a\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | arhadgh\u257 tako\'e2\'80\'99ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 ava: pudgala: |\

n\uc0\u257 \u347 ayata y\u363 yamarhadgh\u257 taka\u7747  pudgalam | apraroha\u7751 adharm\u257  arhadgh\u257 taka: pudgalo\'e2\'80\'99smin \

dharmavinaye | tasm\uc0\u257 t tarhi bhik\u7779 avo yasya kasyacit pravrajy\u257 pek\u7779 a upasa\u7747 kr\u257 mati tena \
\
pra\uc0\u7779 \u7789 avyo m\u257 syarhadgh\u257 taka iti | ap\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  pravr\u257 jayati upasa\u7747 p\u257 dayati s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati |\

\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n up\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | yena bhadanta p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  pravrajy\u257 y\u257 \u7747 \
\
tath\uc0\u257 gatasya \u347 r\u257 vakasa\u7747 gho bhinna: sacet sa \u257 k\u257 \u7749 k\u7779 et sv\u257 khy\u257 te dharmavinaye pravrajy\u257 -\

@106\
\
tasm\uc0\u257 ttarhi yasya kasyacit pravrajy\u257 pek\u7779 a upasa\u7747 kr\u257 mati sa tena pra\u7779 \u7789 vyo m\u257 si sa\u7747 ghabhedaka \
\
iti | ap\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  pravr\u257 jayati s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nup\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | yena bhadanta tath\u257 gatasy\u257 ntike du\u7779 \u7789 acitta-\
\
rudhiramutp\uc0\u257 dita\u7747  sa \u257 k\u257 \u7749 k\u7779 et sv\u257 khy\u257 te dharmavinaye pravrajy\u257 mupasa\u7747 pada\u7747  bhik\u7779 ubh\u257 vam |\

pravr\uc0\u257 jayitavyo na pravr\u257 jayitavya: | na pravr\u257 jayitavya up\u257 lin | tasm\u257 t tarhi yasya \
\
kasyacit pravrajy\uc0\u257 pek\u7779 a upasa\u7747 kr\u257 mati sa tena pra\u7779 \u7789 avyo m\u257 si tath\u257 gatasy\u257 ntike du\u7779 \u7789 acitta-\

\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nup\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | yo bhadanta p\u363 rvik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  pravrajy\u257 y\u257 \u7747  catur\u7751 \u257 \u7747  \

p\uc0\u257 r\u257 jik\u257 n\u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna: sacet sa \u257 k\u257 \u7749 k\u7779 et sv\u257 khy\u257 te dharmavinaye pravrajy\u257 mupasa\u7747 pada\u7747  \

yasya kasyacit pravrajy\uc0\u257 pek\u7779 a upasa\u7747 kr\u257 mati sa tena pra\u7779 \u7789 avyo m\u257 si catur\u7751 \u257 \u7747  p\u257 r\u257 jik\u257 n\u257 manya-\
\
tam\uc0\u257 nyatam\u257 m\u257 pattim\u257 panna iti | ap\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  pravr\u257 jayati upasa\u7747 p\u257 dayati v\u257  s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati | \

buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 n \u347 r\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati jetavane\'e2\'80\'99n\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tatra bhagav\u257 n \

br\uc0\u363 y\u257 t pravr\u257 jayantu m\u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 manto drak\u7779 y\u257 my\u257 pattimiti | pravr\u257 jayitavya: | pravr\u257 jayitv\u257  \

br\uc0\u363 y\u257 t na pa\u347 y\u257 my\u257 pattimiti | sacet sa\u7747 ghas\u257 magr\u299 m\u257 r\u257 gayati punarapyadar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 eptavya: |\

noced\uc0\u257 r\u257 gayi\u7779 yat sacet upasa\u7747 panna: s\u363 pasa\u7747 panna: | durlabho hi pudgalasya sv\u257 khy\u257 te dharmavinaye \

pravrajy\uc0\u257 mupasa\u7747 pada: bhik\u7779 ubh\u257 va: | ath\u257 dar\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 iptaka: evamapratidharmasth\u257 yotk\u7779 iptaka: |\

j\uc0\u257 n\u299 te du\u7779 \u7789 hulasamud\u257 c\u257 r\u257  eta iti | yad\u257  tu sa\u7747 j\u257 n\u299 te tad\u257  prak\u7771 tisthabhik\u7779 ubhi: s\u257 rdha\u7747  \

prativasati n\uc0\u257 nyatra | \u347 \u257 stur\u257 j\'f1ay\u257  k\u257 la\u7747  dar\u347 an\u257 yopasa\u7747 kr\u257 mati | tataste sa\u7747 jalpa\u7747  kurvanti |\

nandopananda ete k\uc0\u257 lap\u257 trik\u257  j\u257 t\u257 pah\u257 ri\u7751 o y\u257 d\u7771 \u347 \u257  vaya\u7747  pravr\u257 jay\u257 ma: | ete\'e2\'80\'99paharanti | \

id\uc0\u257 n\u299 \u7747  t\u257 d\u7771 \u347 a\u7747  pravr\u257 jay\u257 mo yo na k\u257 lap\u257 trikairapahriyata iti |\
\
y\uc0\u257 vadapare\u7751 a samayena upanandena paribhramat\u257  hastacchinnaka: puru\u7779 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | bhadramukha \
\
kimartha\uc0\u7747  na pravrajas\u299 ti | sa kathayati | \u257 rya ko\'e2\'80\'99ya\u7747  hastavikala\u7747  pravr\u257 jayat\u299 ti | \
\
upananda: kathayati | bhadramukha karu\uc0\u7751 \u257 prabh\u257 vita\u7747  bhagavata: \u347 \u257 sanam | aha\u7747  te pravr\u257 jay\u257 m\u299 ti |\
\
sa tena pravr\uc0\u257 jita upasa\u7747 p\u257 dita: | tato dvau tr\u299 n v\u257  divas\u257 n \u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n \
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 ayitv\u257 bhihita: | bhadramukha na m\u7771 go m\u7771 ga\u7747  pu\u7779 \u7751 \u257 ti | vist\u299 r\u7751 \u257  \u347 r\u257 vast\u299  | svo\
\
gocara: pitryo vi\uc0\u7779 aya: | pi\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 tama\u7789 itv\u257  j\u299 vik\u257 \u7747  kalpayasveti | sa kathayati |\
\
up\uc0\u257 dhy\u257 ya katha\u7747  pi\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 tama\u7789 \u257 m\u299 ti | sa kathayati | et\u257 vattva\u7747  na parij\'f1\u257 yate | aha\u7747  \

te kathay\uc0\u257 m\u299 ti | tena tasya rajjv\u257  niv\u257 sana\u7747  baddha\u7747  ka\u7751 \u7789 akai\u347 c\u299 vara\u7747  pr\u257 v\u7771 tam | v\u257 me b\u257 hau \

p\uc0\u257 trayo\u7751 ik\u257  nyast\u257  dak\u7779 i\u7751 e b\u257 hau kha\u7747 kharako baddha: | tato\'e2\'80\'99sau \u347 r\u257 vast\u299 \u7747  gocar\u257 ya\

pras\uc0\u7771 ta: | m\u257 t\u7771 gr\u257 ma urasi prah\u257 ra\u7747  dattv\u257  kathayati | \u257 rya ki\u7747  te pravrajitasya hastau \

d\uc0\u257 c\u257 ra\u7747  mukttv\u257  ko\'e2\'80\'99nya: eva\u7747 vidha\u7747  pravr\u257 jayi\u7779 yati | etat prakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \

\uc0\u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | ya: ka\u347 cid\u257 d\u299 navo bhik\u7779 avo hastacchinnaka\u7747  \

pravr\uc0\u257 jayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | na bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  hastacchinnaka: pravr\u257 jayitavya: upasa\u7747 p\u257 dayitavyo\

v\uc0\u257  | bhik\u7779 u: hastacchinnaka\u7747  pravr\u257 jayati upasa\u7747 p\u257 dayati s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati | yath\u257  \

hastacchinnak\uc0\u257  eva\u7747  p\u257 dacchinnak\u257 : a\u7749 gul\u299  [cchinnak\u257 :] pha\u7751 ahastak\u257 : ano\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 \
\
lak\uc0\u7779 a\u7751 \u257 hat\u257 : ka\u347 \u257 hat\u257 \u347 citr\u257 \u7749 g\u257  ativ\u7771 ddh\u257 \u347 ca na pravr\u257 jayitavy\u257 : | atib\u257 l\u257 n pravr\u257 jayanti \
\
te sa\uc0\u7747 ghika\u7747  \u347 ayan\u257 sanamucc\u257 raprasr\u257 ve\u7751 a n\u257 \u347 ayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | te'pi na pravr\u257 jayitavya: |\
\
kha\uc0\u7747 ja\u7747  pravr\u257 jayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | na pravr\u257 jayitavya: | k\u257 \u7751 \u7693 arikak\u257 \u7751 aku\u7751 ikubjav\u257 ma \

api na pravr\uc0\u257 jayitavy\u257 : | pravr\u257 jayanti s\u257 tis\u257 r\u257  bhavanti | bhik\u7779 ava: str\u299 cchinn\u257 n bh\u257 ra-\

@114\

\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ida\u7747  v\u257 stu sarv\u257 k\u257 raparini\u7779 \u7789 hitamanta:s\u299 ma\u7747  bahirvy\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  \

sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukhamabhibhavitam | sacet sa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 tsa\u7747 gho yatsa\u7747 gha\

ida\uc0\u7747  v\u257 stu sarv\u257 k\u257 raparini\u7779 \u7789 hitamanta:s\u299 ma\u7747  bahirvy\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  sa\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  sa\u7747 manyeta |\

e\uc0\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | ida\u7747  v\u257 stu sarv\u257 k\u257 raparini\u7779 \u7789 hitamanta:s\u299 ma\u7747  bahirvy\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukhamabhibhavita\u7747  tat sa\u7747 gha eva\u7747  v\u257 stu sarv\u257 k\u257 raparini\u7779 \u7789 hitamanta:s\u299 ma\u7747  bahirvy\u257 - \
\
mopac\uc0\u257 ra\u7747  sa\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  sa\u7747 manyate | yath\u257  c\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amate ida\u7747  v\u257 stu sarv\u257 k\u257 rapari-\
\
ni\uc0\u7779 \u7789 hitamanta:s\u299 ma\u7747  bahirvy\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  sa\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  sa\u7747 mantu\u7747  sa t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amate\
\
bh\uc0\u257 \u7779 at\u257 m | sa\u7747 mata\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena ida\u7747  v\u257 stu sarv\u257 k\u257 raparini\u7779 \u7789 hitamanta:s\u299 ma\u7747  bahirvy\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  sa\u7747 ghasya \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 t t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m evametad dh\u257 ray\u257 mi | yatra sa\u7747 ghena \
\

r\uc0\u257 jag\u7771 hanid\u257 nam | tena khalu samayen\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n br\u257 hma\u7751 akapphi\u7751 o r\u257 jag\u7771 he viharati\

senikaguh\uc0\u257 y\u257 mekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sa[ sa\u7747  ]v\u7771 tty\u257  sa\u7747 ghasya | atha sa\u7747 bahul\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: tadeva \

po\uc0\u7779 adhe pa\u7747 cada\u347 y\u257 \u7747  po\u7779 adh\u257 mukhe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 : sannipatit\u257 : yattu yad\u257  \u257 yu[\u7779 manta\u7747 ]\
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 nta\u7747  br\u257 hma\u7751 akapphi\u7751 am\u257 gamayam\u257 n\u257 : | atha \u257 yu\u7779 mato br\u257 hma\u7751 akapphi\u7751 asyaitadabhavat |\
\
adya sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adhapa\u7747 cada\u347 ik\u257  mam\u257 pi kapphi\u7751 asya bhik\u7779 o: po\u7779 adhapa\u7747 cada\u347 ik\u257  kinnu gaccheya\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya [po\u7779 adh\u257 ] mukham \u257 hosvit na gaccheya\u7747  sa\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukham | ki\u7747  nu \
\
pratyanubhaveya\uc0\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena s\u257 rdha\u7747  po\u7779 adh\u257 mukham\u257 hosvinna pratyanubhaveyam | [ki\u7747  nu] sa\u7747 ghasya\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghak\u7771 tye\u7779 u sa\u7747 gha[ka]ra\u7751 \u299 ye\u7779 u[ gaccheyam ] \u257 hosvinna gaccheyam | ki\u7747  nu pratyanubhaveya\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghena s\u257 rdha\u7747  sa\u7747 ghak\u7771 ty\u257 ni sa\u7747 ghakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 ny\u257 hosvita na pratyanubhaveyam | ukta\u7747  ca bhagavat\u257  \
\
\uc0\u347 uddhasya hi sad\u257  phalgu sad\u257  \u347 uddhasya po\u7779 adha: |\
\
\uc0\u347 ucikarma\u7751 o hi \u347 uddhasya tasya sampadyate vratam ||3|| iti |\
\
\uc0\u347 uddho\'e2\'80\'99hamasmi paramay\u257  \u347 uddhy\u257  samanv\u257 gata: | \
\
@115\
\
atha bhagav\uc0\u257 n br\u257 hma\u7751 akapphi\u7751 asya cetas\u257  cittam\u257 j\'f1\u257 ya ve\u7751 uvane\'e2\'80\'99ntarhita: senika-\
\
guh\uc0\u257 y\u257 \u7747  pratya\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 t \u257 yu\u7779 mato br\u257 hma\u7751 akapphi\u7751 asya purata: | eva\u7747  c\u257 ha | nanu te kapphi\u7751 a\
\
ek\uc0\u257 kino rahogatasya pratisa\u7747 l\u299 nasyaiva\u7747  cetasi ceta:parivitarka udap\u257 di | adya sa\u7747 ghasya \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adhapa\u7747 cada\u347 ik\u257  mam\u257 pi kapphi\u7751 asya bhik\u7779 o: po\u7779 adhapa\u7747 cada\u347 ik\u257  p\u363 rvavat y\u257 vat tasya \
\
sampadyate vratamiti | \uc0\u347 uddho\'e2\'80\'99hamasmi paramay\u257  \u347 uddhy\u257  samanv\u257 gata iti | eva\u7747  bhadanta: |\
\
tva\uc0\u7747  t\u257 vat kapphi\u7751 a na gami\u7779 yasi sa\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  ko\'e2\'80\'99nyo gami\u7779 yati | tva\u7747  na \
\
pratyanubhavi\uc0\u7779 yasi sa\u7747 ghena s\u257 rdha\u7747  po\u7779 adha\u7747  ko\'e2\'80\'99nya: pratyanubhavi\u7779 yati | tva\u7747  na gami\u7779 yasi sa\u7747 ghasya \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghak\u7771 tye\u7779 u sa\u7747 ghakara\u7751 \u299 ye\u7779 u ko\'e2\'80\'99nyo gami\u7779 yati | tva\u7747  na pratyanubhavi\u7779 yasi sa\u7747 ghena s\u257 rdha\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghak\u7771 ty\u257 ni sa\u7747 ghakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 ni ko\'e2\'80\'99nya: pratyanubhavi\u7779 yati | gaccha tva\u7747  kapphi\u7751 a sa\u7747 ghasya \
\
po\uc0\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  m\u257  na gaccha | pratyanubhava tva\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena s\u257 rdha\u7747  po\u7779 adha\u7747  m\u257  na pratyanubhava | gaccha \
\
tva\uc0\u7747  kapphi\u7751 a sa\u7747 ghasya sa\u7747 ghak\u7771 tye\u7779 u sa\u7747 ghakara\u7751 \u299 ye\u7779 u m\u257  na gaccha | pratyanubhava tva\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena \
\
s\uc0\u257 rdha\u7747  sa\u7747 ghak\u7771 ty\u257 ni sa\u7747 ghakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 ni m\u257  na pratyanubhava |\
\
atha bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 yu\u7779 manta\u7747  br\u257 hma\u7751 akapphi\u7751 am\u257 d\u257 ya yena po\u7779 adh\u257 mukha\u7747  tenopasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | \
\
upasa\uc0\u7747 kramya purast\u257 d bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 ghasya praj\'f1apta ev\u257 sane ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 a: | ni\u7779 adya ca bhagav\u257 n bhik\u7779 \u363 n \
\
\uc0\u257 mantrayate sma | tasm\u257 ttarhi bhik\u7779 ava: anuj\u257 n\u257 mi | bhik\u7779 ubhirekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299 \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257  baddhavy\u257  | ukta\u7747  bhagavat\u257  ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddhavy\u257  iti | \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avo na j\u257 nte katha\u7747  baddhavyeti |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | p\u363 rva\u7747  t\u257 vad\u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhirmahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 vara- \
\
nimitt\uc0\u257 ni sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayitavy\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  pa\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 muttarasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 t \
\
\uc0\u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 n samanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e \
\
sannipatite \uc0\u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhirmahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni \
\
parik\uc0\u299 rtayitavy\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  \
\
pr\uc0\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i pa\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 muttarasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i \
\
ku\uc0\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asmin \u257 v\u257 se \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhirmahaty\u257 : \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747 \
\
@116\
\
v\uc0\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  \
\
pa\uc0\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 muttarasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i [ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747 \
\
v\uc0\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257 ] sacet sa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7747 gho yat sa\u7747 gha: \
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257 \u7747  nimitt\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 gekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u299 y\u257 t y\u257 vacc\u257 ra\u7751 ya\u7747  y\u257 vacca \
\
\uc0\u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca gr\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  ca | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam | \
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asmin \u257 v\u257 se \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhirmahaty\u257 : \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747 \
\
v\uc0\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  prak\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  [v\u257 ] | dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  \
\
pa\uc0\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 muttarasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | tat sa\u7747 ghastath\u257  [nimitt\u257 n\u257 ma]rv\u257 gekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  \
\
mahat\uc0\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u257 ti y\u257 vacc\u257 ra\u7751 ya\u7747  y\u257 vacca \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca gr\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  \
\
ca | e\uc0\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amate e\u7779 \u257 \u7747  nimitt\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 gekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  sa\u7747 ghasya mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  \
\
baddhu\uc0\u7747  y\u257 vacc\u257 ra\u7751 ya\u7747  y\u257 vacca \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca gr\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  ca sa t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m |\
\
na k\uc0\u7779 amate bh\u257 \u7779 at\u257 m |\
\
baddh\uc0\u257  sa\u7747 ghena e\u7779 \u257 \u7747  nimitt\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 gekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  sa\u7747 ghasya mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  \
\
y\uc0\u257 vacc\u257 ra\u7751 ya\u7747  y\u257 vacca \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca gr\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  ca | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 t t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametad dh\u257 ray\u257 mi | yatra sa\u7747 ghena mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  bhavati tatra\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ubhirni\u7779 adya po\u7779 adha: kartavya: prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 ca | j\'f1aptidvit\u299 ya\u7747  j\'f1apticaturtha\u7747  karma kartavyam |\
\
vyagr\uc0\u257 : kurvanti s\u257 tis\u257 r\u257  bhavanti |\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avastric\u299 vara\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 tv\u257  div\u257 vih\u257 ra\u7747  gacchanti | khedam\u257 padyante | etat prakara\u7751 a\u7747 \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | mahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257  arv\u257 k sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  \
\
c\uc0\u299 varak\u257 \u7751 \u257 maviprav\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 ttird\u257 tavy\u257  | eva\u7747  ca punard\u257 tavy\u257  | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  \
\
ga\uc0\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 n samanuyujya sarvasa\u7747 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sannipatite ekena \
\
hi bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asmin \u257 v\u257 se samagre\u7751 a sa\u7747 ghena ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  sa\u7747 ghasya mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  | sacet sa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7747 gho \
\
yatsa\uc0\u7747 gho mahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257  arv\u257 k sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  c\u299 varak\u257 \u7751 \u257 maviprav\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tti\u7747  dady\u257 t |\
\
itye\uc0\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  karma kartavyam |\
\
@117\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | asmin \u257 v\u257 se samagre\u7751 a sa\u7747 ghenaikapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  | tat sa\u7747 gho mahaty\u257  s\u299 may\u257  sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  c\u299 varak\u257 \u7751 \u257 ma-\
\
viprav\uc0\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tti\u7747  dad\u257 ti | e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amante mahaty\u257  s\u299 may\u257  sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  c\u299 vara-\
\
k\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u257 maviprav\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tti\u7747  d\u257 tu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m |\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghena mahaty\u257  s\u299 may\u257  sarve\u7779 \u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  c\u299 varak\u257 \u7751 \u257 maviprav\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tti\u7747  k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghena yasm\u257 t t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametad dh\u257 ray\u257 mi | yatra sa\u7747 ghena mahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257  arv\u257 k bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  \
\
c\uc0\u299 varak\u257 \u7751 \u257 maviprav\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 ttirdatt\u257  bhavati bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  s\u257 ntarottare\u7751 a gantavyam | n\u257 tra\
\
kauk\uc0\u7771 tya\u7747  kara\u7751 \u299 yam |\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  caturvargakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 ni karm\u257 \u7751 i bhavanti | pa\'f1cavargakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 ni da\u347 avargakara\u7751 \u299 y\u257 ni \
\
karm\uc0\u257 \u7751 i bhavanti | te sarvasa\u7749 gha sannid\u257 hayanti | bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  ku\u347 alapak\u7779 aparih\u257 nirbhavati |\
\
etat prakara\uc0\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | khuddalik\u257  s\u299 m\u257  baddhavy\u257  |\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 mantavya\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | eva\u7747  ca punarbaddhavy\u257  | p\u363 rva\u7747  t\u257 vat mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  moktavy\u257  |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca punarmoktavy\u257  | \u347 ayan\u257 sana[pra]j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 n \
\
samanuyujya sarvasa\uc0\u7747 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sannipatite ekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 smin \u257 v\u257 se samagre\u7751 a sa\u7747 ghena ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  sa cet sa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7747 gho \
\
yatsa\uc0\u7747 gho mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  mu\u7747 ceta | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 sminn\u257 v\u257 se samagre\u7751 a sa\u7749 ghena ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 -\
\
sasa\uc0\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  tat sa\u7749 gho mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  mu\u7747 cati | e\u7779 \u257 \u7747  c\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  \
\
k\uc0\u7779 amante mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  moktu\u7747  te t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amante bh\u257 \u7779 ant\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  \
\
dvit\uc0\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | mukt\u257  sa\u7747 ghena mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7747 ghena \
\
yasm\uc0\u257 t t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametad dh\u257 ray\u257 mi |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 t \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: khuddalik\u257 y\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  \
\
sth\uc0\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayitavy\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  m\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257  kathayitavya\u7747  \u347 il\u257  \
\
v\uc0\u257  ucchr\u257 payitavy\u257  k\u299 lako nikhantavya: | dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  pa\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 muttarasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i\
\
ku\uc0\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  m\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257 \
\
kathayitavya\uc0\u7747  \u347 il\u257  [v\u257 ] ucchr\u257 payitavy\u257  nimitta\u7747  v\u257  k\u299 lako v\u257  nikhantavya: |\
\
@118\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 t \u347 ayan\u257 sana [pra]j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 n \
\
samanuyujya sarvasa\uc0\u7749 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sannipatite \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: khuddalik\u257 y\u257 : \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sv\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtayitavy\u257 ni p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  [v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257 ] \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  m\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257  \
\
kathita\uc0\u7747  \u347 il\u257  v\u257  ucchr\u257 pit\u257  k\u299 lak\u257  nikh\u257 t\u257 : | dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  pa\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 muttarasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i\
\
ku\uc0\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  \
\
m\uc0\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257  kathita\u7747  \u347 il\u257  v\u257  ucchr\u257 pit\u257  k\u299 lak\u257  nikh\u257 t\u257 : | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 dekena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 \
\
j\'f1apti\uc0\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7749 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 smin \u257 v\u257 se \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi:\
\
khuddalik\uc0\u257 [y\u257 :]s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  \
\
di\uc0\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  m\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257  kathita\u7747  \u347 il\u257  v\u257  ucchr\u257 pit\u257  k\u299 lak\u257  v\u257  nikh\u257 t\u257 : | sacet sa\u7747 ghasya \
\
pr\uc0\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7749 gho yat sa\u7749 gha: e\u7779 \u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u299 y\u257 t \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 manyeta ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | evam ca karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7749 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 smin \u257 v\u257 se \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: \
\
khuddalik\uc0\u257 y\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i \
\
ku\uc0\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  \
\
m\uc0\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257  kathita\u7747  \u347 il\u257  v\u257  ucchr\u257 pit\u257  [k\u299 lak\u257  v\u257  nikh\u257 t\u257 : |] tat sa\u7749 gha\
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u257 ti sa\u7747 manyate ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amate \
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  baddhu\u7747  sa t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na k\u7779 amate bh\u257 \u7779 at\u257 m | baddh\u257  sa\u7747 ghena \
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257 \u7747  nimitt\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257  s\u299 m\u257  sa\u7747 mata\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | k\u7779 \u257 ntamanuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7749 ghena \
\
yasm\uc0\u257 t t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametad dh\u257 ray\u257 mi |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 nmahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddhavy\u257  | eva\u7747  ca punarbaddhavy\u257  | p\u363 rva\u7747  t\u257 vanmahaty\u257 : \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257  \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi\u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayitavy\u257 ni \
\
p\uc0\u363 rvavad vistare\u7751 a v\u257 cyam |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 nmahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257  arv\u257 g bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  c\u299 varak\u257 \u7751 \u257 maviprav\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 ttird\u257 tavy\u257  |\
\
eva\uc0\u7747  ca punard\u257 tavy\u257  \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  p\u363 rvavad vistare\u7751 a |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n up\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | abaddhas\u299 me bhadant\u257 v\u257 se k\u257  s\u299 m\u257  |\
\
@119\
\
ku\uc0\u7693 y\u257 ntaramup\u257 lin s\u257 mantakena | ye ku\u7693 yasy\u257 bhyantare bhik\u7779 ava: prativasanti tairekadhye \
\
ni\uc0\u7779 adya po\u7779 adha: kartavya: prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257  ca | j\'f1aptidvit\u299 ya\u7747  j\'f1apticaturtha\u7747  karma kartavyam | vyagr\u257 :\
\
kurvanti s\uc0\u257 tis\u257 r\u257  bhavanti |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nup\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | agr\u257 make bhadanta ara\u7751 y\u257 yatane k\u257 \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257  | kro\u347 amup\u257 lin s\u257 mantakena | ye kro\u347 asy\u257 bhyantare bhik\u7779 ava: prativasanti \
\
sarvaistairekadhye ni\uc0\u7779 adya po\u7779 adha: prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257  vistare\u7751 a | vyagr\u257 : kurvanti s\u257 tis\u257 r\u257  bhavanti |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 nup\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 [ccha]ti | labhya\u7747  bhadanta ekay\u257  j\'f1apty\u257  \
\
ekena karmak\uc0\u257 rake\u7751 a ekay\u257  karmav\u257 canay\u257  s\u257 ntarbahirmukh\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 mabhiharttu\u7747  v\u257 bhinihartu\u7747  v\u257  |\
\
labhyamup\uc0\u257 lin | tatr\u257 yamabhisa\u7747 h\u257 rasa\u7747 koca: | tatr\u257 yamabhinirh\u257 ravistara: | eva\u7747  ca puna:\
\
kartavyam | p\uc0\u363 rva\u7747  t\u257 vanmahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  moktavy\u257  [tata:] khuddalik\u257  s\u299 m\u257  | pratiprasra\u7747 bhi-\
\
tavya\uc0\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | eva\u7747  ca punarmoktavy\u257  | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya \
\
p\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 n samanuyujya sarvasa\u7749 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sannipatite ubhayata: s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 :\
\
sa\uc0\u7749 gha\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  karmak\u257 rake\u7751 a bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  tatra s\u299 me k\u257 \u7779 \u7789 hena v\u257  da\u7751 \u7693 ena v\u257  k\u299 lakena v\u257  \
\
kili\'f1jena v\uc0\u257 vasth\u257 pya j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam | \
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7749 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 smin \u257 v\u257 se samagre\u7751 a sa\u7747 ghena ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  khuddalik\u257  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  sa\u7747 mata\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | sacet \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7749 gho yat sa\u7749 gho mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  mu\u7747 c\u299 ta khuddalik\u257 \u7747  \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 \u7747  mu\u7747 c\u299 ta pratiprasra\u7747 bheta ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | e\u7779 \u257  j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  ca karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7749 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 sminn\u257 v\u257 se samagre\u7751 a sa\u7749 ghena ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sa-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  khuddalik\u257  s\u299 m\u257  baddh\u257  sa\u7747 mata\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | tat sa\u7749 gho mahat\u299 \u7747  \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 \u7747  mu\u7747 cati khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  mu\u7747 cati prati prasra\u7747 bhati ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amate \
\
mahat\uc0\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  moktu\u7747  [khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  moktu\u7747 ] pratiprasrabdhu\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alaka\u7747  sa t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 m | na \
\
k\uc0\u7779 amate bh\u257 \u7779 at\u257 m | iya\u7747  pratham\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  dvit\u299 y\u257  t\u7771 t\u299 y\u257  karmav\u257 can\u257  | mukt\u257  sa\u7749 ghena \
\
mahat\uc0\u299  s\u299 m\u257  mukt\u257  khuddalik\u257  s\u299 m\u257  pratiprasrabdha\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | k\u7779 \u257 ntamamuj\'f1\u257 ta\u7747  sa\u7749 ghena \
\
yasm\uc0\u257 t t\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mevametad dh\u257 ray\u257 mi | \
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 d\u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: khuddalik\u257 y\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i\
\
nimitt\uc0\u257 ni sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayitavy\u257 ni | p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i ku\u7693 yanimitta\u7747  v\u257  v\u7771 k\u7779 animitta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ailanimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  pr\u257 k\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  m\u257 rgika\u7747  v\u257  kathayitavya\u7747  \u347 il\u257  v\u257  ucchr\u257 -\
\
@120\
\
payitavy\uc0\u257  k\u299 lak\u257  v\u257  nikhantavy\u257 : | yath\u257  p\u363 rvasy\u257 \u7747  di\u347 yeva\u7747  dak\u7779 i\u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  pa\u347 cim\u257 y\u257 -\
\
muttarasy\uc0\u257 \u7747  di\u347 i |\
\
tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 t \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  ga\u7751 \u7693 \u299 m\u257 ko\u7789 ya p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 av\u257 cikay\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 n samanuyujya \
\
sarvasa\uc0\u7749 ghe sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 e sannipatite \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: khuddalik\u257 y\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  \
\
sth\uc0\u257 varanimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtayitavy\u257 ni p\u363 rvavad y\u257 vat k\u299 lak\u257  nikh\u257 t\u257 :| mahaty\u257 : \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rttayitavy\u257 ni p\u363 rvavad y\u257 vat pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  \
\
v\uc0\u257  | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 t ubhayata: s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u7747  sa\u7749 gha\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  karmak\u257 rake\u7751 a bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  tatra s\u299 me \
\
k\uc0\u257 \u7779 \u7789 hena v\u257  da\u7751 \u7693 ena v\u257  k\u299 lakena v\u257  kili\'f1jena v\u257  avasth\u257 pya j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 sminn\u257 v\u257 se \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: khuddalik\u257 y\u257 : \
\
s\uc0\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 varanimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni p\u363 rvavad y\u257 vat k\u299 lak\u257  nikh\u257 t\u257 : |\
\
mahaty\uc0\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni p\u363 rvavad y\u257 vat \
\
pr\uc0\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | sacet sa\u7747 ghasya pr\u257 ptak\u257 la\u7747  k\u7779 amet\u257 nuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7747 gho yat sa\u7747 gha: \
\
e\uc0\u7779 \u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u299 y\u257 t sa\u7747 manyeta ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | te\u7779 \u257 m\u257 gha\u7789 an\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 k\
\
ekapo\uc0\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u299 y\u257 t y\u257 vacc\u257 ra\u7751 ya\u7747  y\u257 vacca \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  \
\
sth\uc0\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca gr\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  ca | e\u7779 \u257 j\'f1apti: | eva\u7747  karma kartavyam |\
\
\uc0\u347 \u7771 \u7751 otu bhadanta: sa\u7747 gha: | y\u257 vadev\u257 sminn\u257 v\u257 se \u257 v\u257 sikanaiv\u257 sikairbhik\u7779 ubhi: khuddali-\
\
k\uc0\u257 y\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni p\u363 rvavad y\u257 vat k\u299 lak\u257  \
\
nikh\uc0\u257 t\u257 : | mahaty\u257 : s\u299 m\u257 y\u257 \u347 caturdi\u347 a\u7747  sth\u257 var\u257 \u7751 i nimitt\u257 ni parik\u299 rtit\u257 ni p\u363 rvavad \
\
y\uc0\u257 vat pr\u257 gbh\u257 ranimitta\u7747  v\u257  | tat sa\u7747 gha: e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 gha\u7789 an\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  badhn\u257 ti \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 manyate ma\u7751 \u7693 alakam | te\u7779 \u257 m\u257 gha\u7789 an\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 k ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  \
\
badhn\uc0\u257 ti y\u257 vacc\u257 ra\u7751 ya\u7747  y\u257 vacca \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca gr\u257 mopac\u257 ra\u7747  ca | ye\u7779 \u257 m\u257 yu-\
\
\uc0\u7779 mat\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 amate e\u7779 \u257 m\u257 gha\u7789 an\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 k khuddalik\u257 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  baddhu\u7747  sa\u7747 mantu\u7747  ma\u7751 \u7693 alaka\u7747  te\u7779 \u257 m\u257 gha\u7789 a-\
\
n\uc0\u257 n\u257 marv\u257 k ekapo\u7779 adh\u257 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u257 sasa\u7747 v\u7771 tty\u257  mahat\u299 \u7747  s\u299 m\u257 \u7747  baddhu\u7747  sth\u257 payitv\u257  gr\u257 ma\u7747  ca \

p\uc0\u257 ri\u347 uddhigr\u257 hakasy\u257 ha\u7747  bhik\u7779 or\u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n praj\'f1apayi\u7779 y\u257 mi | p\u257 ri-\

\uc0\u347 uddhigr\u257 hake\u7751 a bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  p\u257 ri\u347 uddhi\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 tv\u257  na dh\u257 vitavya\u7747  na dravitavya\u7747 [na parikh\u257  la\u7747 gha]-\

yitavy\uc0\u257  na pari\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 e la\u7747 ghayitavya\u7747  noparivih\u257 yas\u257  sth\u257 tavya\u7747  na bahi:s\u299 m\u257  gantavy\u257 \
\
naikena p\uc0\u257 dena dvau ni\u347 re\u7751 ipadakau abhibhavitavyau naikena p\u257 dena dvau sop\u257 nak\u257 vev\u257 bhibhavitavyau \
\
na svapitavya\uc0\u7747  na sam\u257 pattavyam | svapiti sam\u257 padyate dv\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  k\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  garhyo bhavati \
\
yacc\uc0\u257 lajjitvena yacca vaitarikatvena |\
\
yad\uc0\u257  sa\u7747 ghasthavira: kathayati | an\u257 gaman\u257 ya \u257 yu\u7779 manta\u347 chanda\u7747  ca p\u257 ri\u347 uddhi\u7747  ca \
\
\uc0\u257 rocayata | \u257 rocit\u257 \u7747  ca pravedayateti | ten\u257 ntarikasya bhik\u7779 o: purata: sthitv\u257 \
\
vaktavyam | samanv\uc0\u257 hara \u257 yu\u7779 man amu\u7779 minn\u257 v\u257 se bhik\u7779 ur\u257 b\u257 dhiko du:khito b\u257 \u7693 hagl\u257 na: |\
\
adya sa\uc0\u7747 ghasya po\u7779 adhapa\u7747 cada\u347 ik\u257  tasy\u257 pi bhik\u7779 o: po\u7779 adhapa\u7747 cada\u347 ik\u257  | so\'e2\'80\'99yameva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u: pari\u347 uddham\u257 ntar\u257 yikai: dharmair\u257 tm\u257 na\u7747  vedayati | po\u7779 adhe\'e2\'80\'99sya p\u257 ri\u347 uddhim\u257 rocay\u257 mi \
\
\uc0\u257 rocit\u257 \u7747  ca praveday\u257 mi | p\u257 ri\u347 uddhigr\u257 hako bhik\u7779 ur\u257 samud\u257 c\u257 rik\u257 n dharm\u257 n na sam\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
vartate s\uc0\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati |\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n up\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | p\u257 ri\u347 uddhigr\u257 hakast\u257 vad bhadanto \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u: p\u257 ri\u347 uddhi\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 tv\u257  tatraivocchedya k\u257 la\u7747  kury\u257 t | \u257 n\u299 t\u257  p\u257 ri\u347 uddhirvaktavy\u257  |\
\
an\uc0\u257 n\u299 t\u257  up\u257 lin punarapy\u257 nayitavy\u257  | \u257 g\u257 rikatva\u7747  pratij\u257 n\u257 ti samanudde\u347 akatva\u7747  \
\
\uc0\u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 hakatva\u7747  pa\u7751 \u7693 akatva\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u299 d\u363 \u7779 akatva\u7747  m\u257 t\u7771 gh\u257 takatva\u7747  pit\u7771 gh\u257 takatvamarhadgh\u257 takatva\u7747  sa\u7747 ghabhedakatva\u7747  \
\
tath\uc0\u257 gatasy\u257 ntike du\u7779 \u7789 acittarudhirotp\u257 dakatva\u7747  t\u299 rthikatva\u7747  t\u299 rthik\u257 vakr\u257 ntakatva\u7747  steyasa\u7747 v\u257 sikatva\u7747  \
\
n\uc0\u257 n\u257 sa\u7747 v\u257 sikatvam asa\u7747 v\u257 sikatva\u7747  pratij\u257 n\u257 ti | \u257 n\u299 t\u257  p\u257 ri\u347 uddhirvaktavy\u257  | an\u257 n\u299 t\u257  \

g\uc0\u7771 h\u299 tv\u257  sa\u7747 ghamadhye pr\u257 pta: k\u257 la\u7747  kury\u257 t | \u257 n\u299 t\u257  p\u257 ri\u347 uddhirvaktavy\u257  | an\u257 n\u299 t\u257  \

\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n up\u257 l\u299  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchati | yasmin bhadanta \u257 v\u257 se eko bhik\u7779 u:\

prativasati tena tadeva po\uc0\u7779 adhe pa\u7747 cada\u347 y\u257 \u7747  katha\u7747  pratipattavyam | tenop\u257 lin bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  vih\u257 ra: \

li\uc0\u7747 g\u257 ni] \u257 gantukanimitt\u257 ni | tadyath\u257  aj\'f1\u257 taka\u7747  p\u257 tra\u7747  c\u299 vara\u7747  ya\u7779 \u7789 i\u7747  visik\u257 \u7747  ku\u7751 \u7693 \u299 \u7747  \

[ye\'e2\'80\'99n\uc0\u257 ga]tak\u257  [tairvin\u257  kalpayanti | tatra ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257  eva kalpayanti | p\u7771 thak \
\
ni\uc0\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257  eva kalpayanti | ] na\u347 yantu te anyatra eva bhavantu p\u7771 thag bhavantu d\u363 re\u7751 a \
\
bhavantu pare\uc0\u7751 a bhavantu | te bhed\u257 rthino bhedapari\u7779 k\u257 r\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kurvanti |\

eva bhavantu p\uc0\u7771 thag bhavantu | [te] bhed\u257 rthino bhedapari\u7779 k\u257 r\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  \

kurvanti | pr\uc0\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amuddi\u347 anti | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 d\u257 gantuk\u257  bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gacchantya-\

nimitt\uc0\u257 ni | tadyath\u257  vih\u257 ra\u7747  sikta\u7747  sa\u7747 m\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  sukum\u257 r\u299 \u7747  gomayak\u257 r\u7779 \u299 manupradatt\u257 m | \u347 ayan\u257 -\

iti | ye\'e2\'80\'99n\uc0\u257 gatak\u257  na\u347 yantu anyatra eva bhavantu p\u7771 thak bhavantu d\u363 re\u7751 \u257 pare\u7751 a bhavantu |\

te bhed\uc0\u257 rthino bhedapari\u7779 k\u257 r\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kurvanti | pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amuddi\u347 anti |\
