pradatt\uc0\u257 m | \u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 t\u257 m | te\u7779 \u257 meva\u7747  bhavati | santi bhik\u7779 avo ye\'e2\'80\'99n\u257 gatak\u257 \

iti | ye\'e2\'80\'99n\uc0\u257 gatak\u257  bhik\u7779 avo na kalpayantyasm\u257 ka\u7747  tairvin\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kartu\u7747  \

pr\uc0\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amudde\u7779 \u7789 um | te\'e2\'80\'99dharmasa\u7747 j\'f1ino vyagrasa\u7747 j\'f1ino j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kurvanti |\

yath\uc0\u257 pi tattadeva po\u7779 adhe pa\'f1cada\u347 y\u257 m\u257 gantuk\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257  bhavanti sanni-\

patit\uc0\u257 : | catv\u257 ro v\u257  uttare v\u257  | te tatra pa\u347 yanti naiv\u257 sik\u257 k\u257 r\u257 \u7751 i naiv\u257 sikali\u7749 g\u257 ni \
\
naiv\uc0\u257 sikanimitt\u257 ni | tadyath\u257  bih\u257 ra\u7747  sikta\u7747  sa\u7747 m\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  sukum\u257 r\u299 \u7747  gomayak\u257 \u7779 \u299 manupradatt\u257 m |\
\
\uc0\u347 ayan\u257 sanapraj\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 t\u257 m | tailapradyot\u257 n\u257 d\u299 pit\u257 n | te\u7779 \u257 meva\u7747  bhavati | santi bhik\u7779 avo\
\
ye\'e2\'80\'99n\uc0\u257 gatak\u257  iti | ye\'e2\'80\'99n\u257 gatak\u257  iti na kalpayantyasm\u257 ka\u7747  tairvin\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  \
\
kartu\uc0\u7747  pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amudde\u7779 \u7789 um | te kalp\u257 rthina: kalpapari\u7779 k\u257 r\u257  y\u257 vatt\u257 vanm\u257 rgitv\u257  \
\
j\'f1apti\uc0\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kurvanti | pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amuddi\u347 anti | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 nnaiv\u257 sik\u257  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: \u257 gacchantyalpatarak\u257 : | tai punarapi j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha: kartavya: | pr\u257 timok\u7779 a-\
\
s\uc0\u363 trodde\u347 a udde\u7779 \u7789 avya: | p\u363 rvak\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: s\u257 tis\u257 r\u257 : |  kalpas\u257 mantak\u257 :|\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tattadeva po\u7779 adhe pa\'f1cada\u347 y\u257 m\u257 gantuk\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257 : sannipatit\u257 : |\
\
catv\uc0\u257 ro v\u257  uttare v\u257  | te tatra pa\u347 yanti naiv\u257 sik\u257 kar\u257 \u7751 i naiv\u257 sikali\u7749 g\u257 ni naiv\u257 sika-\
\
nimitt\uc0\u257 ni | tadyath\u257  vih\u257 ra\u7747  sikta\u7747  sa\u7747 m\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  sukum\u257 r\u299 \u7747  gomayak\u257 r\u7779 \u299 manupradatt\u257 m | \u347 ayan\u257 sana-\
\
praj\'f1apti\uc0\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  tailapradyot\u257 n\u257  [d\u299 ] pit\u257 n | te\u7779 \u257 meva\u7747  bhavati | santi bhik\u7779 avo ye\'e2\'80\'99n\u257 gatak\u257  \
\
iti | ye\'e2\'80\'99n\uc0\u257 gatak\u257  na kalpate\'e2\'80\'99sm\u257 ka\u7747  tairvin\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kartu\u7747 \
\
pr\uc0\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amudde\u7779 \u7789 um | t\u257 nadhy\u257 \u347 ayana\u7747  m\u257 rganti | te t\u257 nadhy\u257 \u347 ayana\u7747  m\u257 rgitv\u257 \
\
na labhante | j\'f1apti\uc0\u7747  k\u7771 rtv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  kurvanti | pr\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 amuddi\u347 anti | tata: \
\
pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 nnaiv\u257 sik\u257  bhik\u7779 ava \u257 gacchantyalpatarak\u257 : | tai: punarapi j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha: kartavya: | \
\
pr\uc0\u257 timok\u7779 as\u363 trodde\u347 a udde\u7779 \u7789 avya: | p\u363 rvak\u257  bhik\u7779 avo na s\u257 tis\u257 r\u257 : |\

yath\uc0\u257 pi tattadeva po\u7779 adhe pa\'f1cada\u347 y\u257 m\u257 gantuk\u257  bhik\u7779 ava: sanni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 \u257  bhavanti sanni-\

patit\uc0\u257 : | catv\u257 ro v\u257  uttare v\u257  | te tatra pa\u347 yanti naiv\u257 sik\u257 k\u257 r\u257 \u7751 i [naiv\u257 sikali\u7749 g\u257 ni]\
\
naiv\uc0\u257 sikanimitt\u257 ni | tadyath\u257  vih\u257 ra\u7747  sikta\u7747  sa\u7747 m\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  sukum\u257 r\u299 \u7747  gomayak\u257 r\u7779 \u299 manupradatt\u257 m |\
\

\
ye\'e2\'80\'99n\uc0\u257 gatak\u257  iti | ye\'e2\'80\'99n\u257 gatak\u257  iti na kalpate\'e2\'80\'99sm\u257 ka\u7747  tairvin\u257  j\'f1apti\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  po\u7779 adha\u7747  \

@134\

gocaram\uc0\u257 rge\'e2\'80\'99pi ca\u7749 krame\'e2\'80\'99pi me\u7693 y\u257 \u7747  dv\u257 rako\u7779 \u7789 hake\'e2\'80\'99pi bhik\u7779 \u363 nadhy\u257 vi\u347 anti | tatra prav\u257 rakasya \

\
prade\uc0\u347 e prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pita: | anyatamena ca mahallena b\u257 lena m\u363 \u7693 hen\u257 vyakten\u257 ku\u347 alen\u257 pratir\u363 pe \
\
prade\uc0\u347 e ucc\u257 raprasr\u257 va\u7747  k\u7779 e\u7789 a\u7747  \u347 i\u7749 gh\u257 naka\u7747  v\u257 nta\u7747  virikta\u7747  choritama\u347 uciprasikta\u7747  v\u257  \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747 \

\
dhara: | eva\uc0\u7747 r\u363 pa\u7747  codakam\u257 j\'f1\u257 payitv\u257  sa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payitv\u257  prav\u257 rayitavyam | saceccodaka: k\u257 yena \

@137\

codakam\uc0\u257 j\'f1\u257 payitv\u257  sa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payitv\u257  prav\u257 rayitavyam | sa ceccodaka: k\u257 yena sa\u7747 v\u7771 to v\u257 c\u257  \

[ca] s\uc0\u363 tradharo vinayadharo m\u257 t\u7771 k\u257 dhara: s\u363 travyakto vinayavyakto m\u257 t\u7771 k\u257 vyakta: s\u363 trakovido \

saceccodaka: k\uc0\u257 yena sa\u7747 v\u7771 to bhavati v\u257 c\u257  [ca] s\u363 tradharo vinayadharo m\u257 t\u7771 k\u257 dhara: \

s\uc0\u363 traku\u347 alo vinayaku\u347 alo m\u257 t\u7771 k\u257 ku\u347 ala: | na sa\u7747 cintya sa\u7747 ghamdhye adharma\u7747  dharmato d\u299 payati \

dharma\uc0\u7747  c\u257 dharmata: | avinaya\u7747  vinayato d\u299 payati vinaya\u7747  c\u257 vinayata: | sa ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 ya: |\

yad\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 man codakena vadasi p\u257 r\u257 jikay\u257  sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ay\u257  pratide\u347 ani[kay\u257 ] du\u7779 \u7789 hulay\u257 \

r\uc0\u257 trik\u7771 tena divasak\u7771 tena pathak\u7771 tenotpathak\u7771 tena gacchatasti\u7779 \u7789 hato ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asy\u257 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya |\

sacetp\uc0\u257 r\u257 jikay\u257  na sa\u7747 gh\u257 va\u347 e\u7779 ay\u257  na p\u257 yantikay\u257  na pratide\u347 anikay\u257  na du\u7779 \u7789 hulay\u257  | sa \

na caturthikay\uc0\u257  | sacet caturthikay\u257  na prathamay\u257  na dvit\u299 yay\u257  na t\u7771 t\u299 yay\u257  | sacet prathamay\u257 \

na dvit\uc0\u299 yay\u257  [na y\u257 vanna] vatimay\u257  | sacennavatimay\u257  na prathamay\u257  na dvit\u299 yay\u257  \
\
y\uc0\u257 vannaikanavatimay\u257  | sacet prathamay\u257  pratide\u347 an\u299 y\u257  na dvit\u299 yay\u257  na t\u7771 t\u299 yay\u257  na \
\
caturthikay\uc0\u257  | saced dvit\u299 yay\u257  na prathamay\u257  na t\u7771 t\u299 yay\u257  na caturthikay\u257  | sacet \
\
t\uc0\u7771 t\u299 yay\u257  na prathamay\u257  na dvit\u299 yay\u257  na caturthikay\u257  | [sacet caturthikay\u257 ] na prathamay\u257 \

na dvit\uc0\u299 yay\u257  na t\u7771 t\u299 yay\u257  | sacetprathamay\u257  du\u7779 \u7789 hulay\u257  na dvit\u299 yay\u257  na t\u7771 t\u299 yay\u257  na \

\
sacedutpathak\uc0\u7771 tena na pathak\u7771 tena | sacetpathak\u7771 tena notpathak\u7771 tena | saced gacchato na\
\
ti\uc0\u7779 \u7789 hato na ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya n\u257 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya | sacet ti\u7779 \u7789 hato na gacchato na ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya \
\
n\uc0\u257 ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya | sacet ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya na gacchato [na ti\u7779 \u7789 hato n\u257 ] ni\u7779 a\u7751 \u7751 asya |\

saceccodaka: eva\uc0\u7747  s\u257 dhu ca su\u7779 \u7789 hu ca samena yujyam\u257 na: samanu\u347 \u257 syam\u257 na: \
\
samanug\uc0\u257 hyam\u257 na: sth\u257 n\u257 tsth\u257 na\u7747  sa\u7747 kr\u257 mati acodaka: sy\u257 t acodita: sy\u257 t | saceccodaka:\

[gantavyeti \uc0\u257 rocayitavyam | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 d bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  go]cara\u7747  v\u257 valokayitv\u257  channe \

sth\uc0\u257 ne vij\'f1\u257 : sabrahmac\u257 ri\u7751 o ye\'e2\'80\'99nutpanna\u7747  du:kha\u7747  daurmanasya\u7747  notp\u257 dayi\u7779 yanti | utpanna\u7747  ca \

yitavya: |\

tata: pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 cchanne pravi\u347 ya bhik\u7779 oryath\u257 v\u7771 ddhikay\u257  sam\u299 c\u299 \u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  utku\u7789 ukena \
\
sthitv\uc0\u257 \'f1jali\u7747  prag\u7771 hya ida\u7747  sy\u257 dvacan\u299 yam | samanv\u257 hara tvam\u257 yu\u7779 man | adya sa\u7747 ghavar\u7779 opasth\u257 na-\
\
[m\uc0\u257 s\u257 rdha\u7747  \u7779 o\u7693 a\u347 am | aham] eva\u7747  n\u257 m\u257 mu\u7779 minn\u257 v\u257 se\'e2\'80\'99nta:s\u299 me p\u363 rvik\u257 \u7747  traim\u257 s\u299 \u7747 \
\
var\uc0\u7779 \u257 mupagacch\u257 mi | amukena vaiy\u257 v\u7771 ttakare\u7751 a amukena gocaragr\u257 me\u7751 a y\u257 vadev\u257 sy\u257 v\u257 sasya \
\
kha\uc0\u7751 \u7693 achu\u7789 y\u257  pratisa\u7747 skara\u7751 \u257 rthamiha me var\u7779 \u257  [upagacch\u257 mi | eva\u7747  dvit\u299 ya\u7747  t\u7771 t\u299 yam\u257 ro-\
\
cayitavyam |] \
\
@142\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 avo var\u7779 \u257  upagantavy\u257  na ca punarvar\u7779 o\u7779 itena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  bahi:s\u299 m\u257  gantavy\u257  |\
\
saced gacchati na tatra vastavyam | ukta\uc0\u7747  bhagavat\u257  na hi bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  var\u7779 o\u7779 itena bahi:s\u299 m\u257  \
\
gantavy\uc0\u257  sa cedgacchati na tatra vastavyamiti | [hastip\u257 lagr\u257 me udayanag\u7771 ha] pati: \
\
prativasati | tasya g\uc0\u7771 hakalatra\u7747  tu pratyupasthitam | \u257 tmano ve\u7779 \u7789 anam | tena tatra prabh\u363 to \
\
vastul\uc0\u257 bha: \u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 ta: | tena bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 to\'e2\'80\'99nupre\u7779 ita: | \u257 gacchantu\
\
\uc0\u257 ry\u257 : paribhok\u7779 yante iti | bhik\u7779 ava: p\u7771 cchitum\u257 rabdh\u257 : ki\u7747  [s\u257 tirekaistri]bhiryojanai:\
\
\uc0\u347 ak\u7779 y\u257 mo y\u257 vadadyaiva gatv\u257 gantu\u7747  na \u347 ak\u7779 y\u257 ma: | te sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayanti | ukta\u7747  bhagavat\u257  na bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 \
\
var\uc0\u7779 opagatena bahi:s\u299 m\u257  gantavy\u257  | sa ced gacchati na tatra vastavyamiti | te na gat\u257 : | \
\
tatra ye bhik\uc0\u7779 avo hastip\u257 lagr\u257 mo [pac\u257 re var\u7779 opagat\u257 ste\u7779 \u257 \u7747 ] prabh\u363 to vastul\u257 bha: \u257 mi\u7779 a-\
\
l\uc0\u257 bha\u347 c\u257 nupradatta: | te tray\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  v\u257 r\u7779 ik\u257 \u7751 \u257 matyay\u257 tk\u7771 tac\u299 var\u257  ni\u7779 \u7789 hitac\u299 var\u257 : sam\u257 d\u257 ya \
\
p\uc0\u257 trac\u299 vara\u7747  yena \u347 r\u257 vast\u299  tena c\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  prakr\u257 nt\u257 : | anup\u363 rve\u7751 a c\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  caranta: \u347 r\u257 vast\u299 -\
\
manupr\uc0\u257 pt\u257 : | d\u363 rato d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257 bhihit\u257 : | sv\u257 gata\u7747  sv\u257 gatam\u257 yu\u7779 manta: | vi\u347 r\u257 mit\u257  ukt\u257 : |\
\
kuto y\uc0\u363 yam\u257 yu\u7779 manta: etarhy\u257 gacchatha kutra v\u257  stha | var\u7779 \u257  upagat\u257  hastip\u257 lagr\u257 mak\u257  \
\
vayam\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 manta etarhy\u257 gacch\u257 ma: | hastip\u257 lagr\u257 make c\u257 sma var\u7779 \u257  upagat\u257 : | ki\u7747  y\u363 yam\u257 yu- \
\
\uc0\u7779 manto hastip\u257 lagr\u257 make sukhaspar\u347 a\u7747  var\u7779 \u257  u\u7779 it\u257 : na ca stha kl\u257 nt\u257 : pi\u7751 \u7693 akena | tatra\
\
vayam\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 manto hastip\u257 lagr\u257 make sukhaspar\u347 a\u7747  var\u7779 \u257  upagat\u257 : | na c\u257 sma kl\u257 nt\u257 : pi\u7751 \u7693 akena | \
\
yath\uc0\u257 katham\u257 yu\u7779 manto hastip\u257 lagr\u257 make sukhaspar\u347 a\u7747  var\u7779 \u257  upagat\u257 : | na c\u257 sma kl\u257 nt\u257 :\
\
pi\uc0\u7751 \u7693 akena | tatra hastip\u257 lagr\u257 make udayano n\u257 ma g\u7771 hapati: prativasati | tasya \
\
g\uc0\u7771 hakalatra\u7747  pratyupasthitam | \u257 tmano ve\u7779 \u7789 anam | ten\u257 sm\u257 ka\u7747  prabh\u363 to vastul\u257 bha: \u257 mi\u7779 a-\
\
l\uc0\u257 bha\u347 c\u257 nupradatta:| eva\u7747  vayam\u257 yu\u7779 manto hastip\u257 lagr\u257 make sukhaspar\u347 a\u7747  var\u7779 \u257  u\u7779 it\u257 : | na \
\
c\uc0\u257 sma kl\u257 nt\u257 : pi\u7751 \u7693 akena | te kathayanti | \u257 yu\u7779 manto\'e2\'80\'99sm\u257 kamapi tena g\u7771 hapatin\u257  \
\
d\uc0\u363 to'nupre\u7779 ita: | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : paribhok\u7779 yanta iti | tairasm\u257 bhi: p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | kiyadd\u363 re \
\
hastip\uc0\u257 lagr\u257 maka: | s\u257 tirekaistribhiryojanai: | te\u7779 \u257 masm\u257 ka\u7747  buddhirutpann\u257  | ukta\u7747  bhagavat\u257  \
\
na bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  var\u7779 opagatena bahi:s\u299 m\u257  gantavy\u257  | saced gacchati na tatra vastavyamiti \
\
vaya\uc0\u7747  na gat\u257 : | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati |\
\
\uc0\u257 k\u257 \u7747 k\u7779 ati katama: \u347 r\u257 vako vastul\u257 bham\u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\'f1ca | yattvaha\u7747  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  sukhaspar\u347 avih\u257 r\u257 rtha\u7747 \
\
d\uc0\u257 tr\u803 \u772 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  ca deyadharmaparibhog\u257 rtha\u7747  sapt\u257 hamanuj\u257 n\u299 y\u257 m | tasm\u257 danuj\u257 n\u257 mi sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya \
\
gantavya\uc0\u7747  kara\u7751 \u299 yena | \
\
ukta\uc0\u7747  bhagavat\u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya gantavya\u7747  kara\u7751 \u299 yeneti | bhik\u7779 avo na j\u257 nate kasya \
\
@143\
\
kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yam | etatprakara\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | bhagav\u257 n\u257 ha | up\u257 sakasya\
\
kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yena up\u257 sik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yena bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 y\u257 : \u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 \u257 y\u257 : \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erakasya \
\
\uc0\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yena | \
\
kimup\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 sakasya g\u7771 hakalatra\u7747  pratyupasthita\u7747  bhavati \u257 tmano \
\
ve\uc0\u7779 \u7789 anam | tena tatra prabh\u363 to vastul\u257 bha \u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 ta: | sa bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 a-\
\
yati | \uc0\u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : paribhok\u7779 yante | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya \
\
kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 iyam | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 saka-\
\
\uc0\u347 c\u257 turdi\u347 e bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 ghe vih\u257 ra\u7747  prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 payituk\u257 mo bhavati | tena tatra prabh\u363 to vastul\u257 bha \u257 mi\u7779 a-\
\
l\uc0\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 ta: | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanuprepayati \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : paribhok\u7779 yante | gantavya\u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyu-\
\
p\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 saka: asminneva vih\u257 re \u347 ayan\u257 sanamanuprad\u257 tuk\u257 mo \
\
bhavati | tena tatra prabh\uc0\u363 to vastul\u257 bha: \u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 to bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  \
\
d\uc0\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 [ry\u257 :] paribhok\u7779 yante | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya \
\
up\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadup\u257 sakastasminneva vih\u257 re dhruvabhik\u7779 \u257 \u7747  praj\'f1apayituk\u257 mo bhavatyanuk\u363 layaj\'f1a: | tena tatra\
\
prabh\uc0\u363 to vastul\u257 bha: \u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 to bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \
\
\uc0\u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : paribhok\u7779 yante | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena |\
\
idamup\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 sakastasminneva\
\
vih\uc0\u257 re tath\u257 gatasya \u347 ar\u299 rast\u363 pa\u7747  prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 payituk\u257 mo bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \
\
\uc0\u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257  dharmasah\u257 y\u257  bhavi\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya \
\
kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi \
\
tadup\uc0\u257 sakastasminneva st\u363 pe ya\u7779 \u7789 y\u257 ropa\u7751 a\u7747  chatr\u257 ropa\u7751 a\u7747  dhvaj\u257 ropa\u7751 a\u7747  pat\u257 k\u257 ropa\u7751 am | alameka\u7747  \
\
candanaseka\uc0\u7747  ku\u7747 kumasekamanuprad\u257 tuk\u257 mo bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257  \
\
dharmasah\uc0\u257 y\u257  me bhavi\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya |\
\
idamup\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 sakakara\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  \
\
catur\uc0\u7751 \u257 \u7747  s\u363 tranik\u257 y\u257 n\u257 manyatam\u257 nyatama\u7747  s\u363 tranik\u257 ya\u7747  vistare\u7751 oddi\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  bhavati prav\u7771 tta\'f1ca | tena \
\
tatra prabh\uc0\u363 to vastul\u257 bha \u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 to bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanuprepayati |\

\uc0\u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : paribhok\u7779 yante | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | \

kauk\uc0\u7771 tyamutpanna\u7747  bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : utpanna\u7747  kauk\u7771 tya\u7747  \
\
prativinodayi\uc0\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 -\
\
sakasya kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 sakasya p\u257 paka\u7747 \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpanna\u7747  bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257  utpanna\u7747  p\u257 paka\u7747  \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igata\u7747  pratinis\u7771 j\u257 payi\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena |\
\
idamup\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tatsa\u7747 gha up\u257 sakasya \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ghena p\u257 tra\u7747  nikubjayituk\u257 mo bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257  \
\
dharme\uc0\u7751 a pak\u7779 a\u7747  bhaji\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 saka[sya] kara\u7751 \u299 yena |\
\
idamup\uc0\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadup\u257 sakasya sa\u7747 ghena \
\
p\uc0\u257 tra\u7747  nikubja[mutkubj\u257 pa]yituk\u257 mo bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257 : \
\
p\uc0\u257 tra\u7747  nikubjamutkubj\u257 payi\u7779 yatha | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya \

kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapyup\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi \
\
tadup\uc0\u257 sakasya \u257 b\u257 dhiko du:khito v\u257 \u7693 hagl\u257 na: | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 ry\u257 \

v\uc0\u257 ca\u7747  d\u257 syanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya up\u257 sakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | idamup\u257 -\
\
sakasya kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yam |\
\
kimup\uc0\u257 sik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | [etadeva sarvamup\u257 sik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747 ] sth\u257 payitv\u257  \

g\uc0\u7771 hakalatram\u257 tmano ve\u7779 \u7789 ana\u7747  ca |\
\
ki\uc0\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadbhik\u7779 u\u347 c\u257 turdi\u347 e bhik\u7779 usa\u7747 ghe \u257 r\u257 ma\u7747  niry\u257 tayitu-\
\
k\uc0\u257 mo bhavati | tena tatra prabh\u363 to vastul\u257 bha \u257 mi\u7779 al\u257 bha\u347 ca samup\u257 n\u299 to bhavati | sa \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 yu\u7779 manta: paribhok\u7779 yante | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 ha-\
\
madhi\uc0\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapi bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadbhik\u7779 urasminnev\u257 r\u257 me vih\u257 ra\u7747  \u347 ayan\u257 sana\u7747  dhruvabhik\u7779 \u257 \u7747  tath\u257 gatasya \u347 \u257 r\u299 rast\u363 pam |\
\
alameka\uc0\u7747  ya\u7779 \u7789 y\u257 ropa\u7751 a\u7747  dhvaj\u257 ropa\u7751 a\u7747  s\u363 tranik\u257 y\u257 n\u257 manyatam\u257 nyatama\u7747  s\u363 tranik\u257 ya\u7747  kauk\u7771 tya\u7747  \
\
p\uc0\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igatamutpanna\u7747  bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 yu\u7779 manta: utpanna\u7747  \
\
p\uc0\u257 paka\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igata\u7747  pratinis\u7771 j\u257 payi\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya bhik\u7779 o: \
\
kara\uc0\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | p\u363 rvavat sarva\u7747  vistare\u7751 a v\u257 cyam | \
\
aparamapi bhik\uc0\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tatsa\u7747 gho bhik\u7779 orim\u257 nyeva\u7747 r\u363 p\u257 \u7751 i pra\u7751 idhi-\
\
karm\uc0\u257 \u7751 i kartuk\u257 mo bhavati | tadyath\u257  tarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma nigarha\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  prav\u257 san\u299 ya\u7747  pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 yam \

adar\uc0\u347 an\u257 yotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yam apratikarma\u7751 ayotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yam apratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747 \
\
karma | sa bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 yu\u7779 manto dharme\u7751 a pak\u7779 a\u7747  bhaji\u7779 ye | abhi-\
\
gantavya\uc0\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapi \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tatsa\u7747 ghena bhik\u7779 orim\u257 nyeva\u7747 r\u363 p\u257 \u7751 i pra\u7751 idhikarm\u257 \u7751 i k\u7771 t\u257 ni \
\
bhavanti | tadyath\uc0\u257  tarjan\u299 ya\u7747  karma nigarha\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma prav\u257 san\u299 ya\u7747  pratisa\u7747 hara\u7751 \u299 yam adar\u347 an\u257 yo-\
\
tk\uc0\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yam apratikarma\u7751 ayotk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 yam apratinis\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 e p\u257 pake d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 igate utk\u7779 epa\u7751 \u299 ya\u7747  karma |\
\
sa bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 yu\u7779 manto v\u257 ca\u7747  bh\u257 [\u7779 i]\u7779 yanti us\u257 rayi\u7779 yanti |\
\
gantavya\uc0\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapi \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tadbhik\u7779 ur\u257 b\u257 dhiko du:khito v\u257 \u7693 hagl\u257 no bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  \
\
d\uc0\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 yu\u7779 manto v\u257 ca\u7747  bh\u257 [\u7779 i]\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  \
\
sapt\uc0\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  bhik\u7779 o: kara\u7751 \u299 yam |\
\
ki\uc0\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 y\u257  kara\u7751 \u299 yam | sth\u257 payitv\u257  pra\u7751 idhikarm\u257 \u7751 i |\
\
ki\uc0\u7747  \u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 \u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | etadeva sarva\u7747  \u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 \u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapi \
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 \u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tat \u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 o dve var\u7779 e \u7779 a\u7789 su dharme\u7779 u \u7779 a\u7789 svanudharme\u7779 u \
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 ita\u7747  bhavati | sa bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 ry\u257  upasa\u7747 p\u257 dayi\u7779 yanti |\
\
gantavya\uc0\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  sapt\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya \u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 \u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  \u347 ik\u7779 am\u257 \u7751 \u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam |\
\
ki\uc0\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | etadeva sarva\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | aparamapi \
\
\uc0\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tacchr\u257 ma\u7751 eraka: sa parip\u363 r\u7751 avi\u7747 \u347 ativar\u7779 o bhavati | sa \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gacchantv\u257 yu\u7779 manta: upasamp\u257 dayi\u7779 yanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257 \
\
sapt\uc0\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erakasya kara\u7751 \u299 yam | \
\
ki\uc0\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | etadeva sarva\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | \
\
aparamapi \uc0\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | yath\u257 pi tacchr\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257  g\u7771 h\u257 d\u257 pt\u257  dv\u257 da\u347 avar\u7779 \u257  \
\
bhavati | kum\uc0\u257 rik\u257  kubh\u257 v\u257  a\u7779 \u7789 \u257 da\u347 avar\u7779 \u257  | s\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  d\u363 tamanupre\u7779 ayati | \u257 gaccha- \
\
ntv\uc0\u257 ry\u257 : | dve var\u7779 e \u7779 a\u7789 su dharme\u7779 u \u7779 a\u7789 svanudharme\u7779 u \u347 ik\u7779 \u257 \u7747  d\u257 syanti | gantavya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  \
\
sapt\uc0\u257 hamadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yena | ida\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 erik\u257 y\u257 : kara\u7751 \u299 yam | \

udd\uc0\u257 nam \

bhai\uc0\u7779 ajyamupasth\u257 paka: str\u299  puru\u7779 a: \u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 aka: | \

nimitta\uc0\u7747  nidhayo j\'f1\u257 taya: antar\u257 ye\u7751 a prakramet ||1||\

@146\

yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | ahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | na \
\
ca me\'e2\'80\'99sti ka\uc0\u347 citpi\u7751 \u7693 akasya d\u257 t\u257  | so\'e2\'80\'99ha\u7747  pi\u7751 \u7693 akamalabham\u257 na: klameya\u7747  k\u257 la\u7747  v\u257 \
\
kury\uc0\u257 m | sa me sy\u257 dantar\u257 ya: apr\u257 ptasya pr\u257 ptaye | anadhigatasy\u257 dhigam\u257 ya |\
\
as\uc0\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tk\u7771 tasya s\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 yai | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 t \
\
prakr\uc0\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | ahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | na \
\
ca me ka\uc0\u347 cid gl\u257 nasya gl\u257 nopasth\u257 pakasya bhai\u7779 ajyamalabham\u257 na: klameya\u7747  v\u257  k\u257 la\u7747  kury\u257 m |\
\
sa me sy\uc0\u257 dantar\u257 ya: apr\u257 ptasya pr\u257 ptaye | anadhigatasy\u257 dhigam\u257 ya | as\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tk\u7771 tasya \
\
s\uc0\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 yai | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva \
\
pratyaya\uc0\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 o: str\u299  upasa\u7747 kramya apratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  \
\
upanimantrayati | [vasa \uc0\u257 rya rama \u257 rya] duhitarante d\u257 sy\u257 mi snu\u7779 \u257 nte d\u257 s\u299 \u7747  te \
\
karmakar\uc0\u299 \u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | ahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257 \
\
upagata: | iya\uc0\u7747  ca me str\u299  upasa\u7747 kramya apratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  upanimantrayati | vasa \
\
\uc0\u257 rya rama \u257 rya | aha\u7747  te upasth\u257 sy\u257 mi duhitara\u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi snu\u7779 \u257 \u7747  te d\u257 s\u299 \u7747  te \
\
karmakar\uc0\u299 \u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257 \u7747  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  \
\
j\uc0\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa \
\
tasm\uc0\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagata\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7747  puru\u7779 a upasa\u7747 kramy\u257 pratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  upanimantra-\
\
yati | vasa \uc0\u257 rya rama \u257 rya | duhitara\u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi snu\u7779 \u257 \u7747  te d\u257 s\u299 \u7747  te karmakar\u299 \u7747  te \
\
d\uc0\u257 sy\u257 mi | tad var\u7779 opgatasya bhik\u7779 ireva\u7747  bhavati | [aha]masminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: |\
\
aya\uc0\u7747  ca me puru\u7779 a upasa\u7747 kramy\u257 pratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  upanimantrayati | vasa \u257 rya rama\
\
\uc0\u257 rya | duhitara\u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi snu\u7779 \u257 \u7747  te d\u257 s\u299 \u7747  te karmakar\u299 \u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi | aha\u7747  cedasmi-\
\
nn\uc0\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: |\
\
yattvahamasm\uc0\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 patti-\
\
rvar\uc0\u7779 occhede | \
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagata\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7747  \u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 aka upasa\u7747 kramy\u257 pratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  upanimantra-\
\

tatra var\uc0\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | ahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | aya\u7747  ca me \u7779 a\u7751 \u7693 aka\
\
upasa\uc0\u7747 kramy\u257 pratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  upanimantrayati | vasa \u257 rya rama \u257 rya | aha\u7747  te \
\
upasth\uc0\u257 sy\u257 mi | d\u257 s\u299 \u7747  te karmakar\u299 \u7747  te d\u257 sy\u257 mi | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme \
\
ato nid\uc0\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 -\
\
tprakr\uc0\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagatena bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  anyatam\u257 nyatama\u7747  \u347 i\u347 umud\u257 ravar\u7751 a\u7747  ra\'f1jan\u299 ya\u7747  m\u257 t\u7771 gr\u257 ma\u7747  \
\
d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  ayoni\u347 o nimittamudg\u7771 h\u299 ta\u7747  bhavati | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati |\
\
ahamasminn\uc0\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | may\u257  c\u257 nyatam\u257 nyatama\u7747  \u347 i\u347 umud\u257 var\u7751 a\u7747   ra\'f1jan\u299 ya\u7747  \
\
m\uc0\u257 t\u7771 gr\u257 ma\u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  ayoni\u347 o nimittamudg\u7771 h\u299 tam | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  \
\
sy\uc0\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 -\
\
v\uc0\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 t prakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 ornidhaya upadar\u347 ayanti |tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  \
\
bhavati | [aham] sminn\uc0\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | idameva nidhaya upadar\u347 ayanti | aha\u7747  \
\
cedasminn\uc0\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: [\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo]\
\
brahmacary\uc0\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  \
\
k\uc0\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede | \
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagata\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7747  j\'f1\u257 taya upasa\u7747 kramy\u257 pratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  upanima-\
\
ntrayanti | kasm\uc0\u257 ttvam\u257 rya mu\u7751 \u7693 a: p\u257 trap\u257 \u7751 iranuve\u347 m\u257 nuve\u347 ma kul\u257 nyupasa\u7747 kr\u257 masi | im\u257 ni \
\
ca te \uc0\u347 \u299 tal\u257 ni k\u257 \u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7751 i vastr\u257 \u7751 i k\u257 ya\u7747  parit\u257 payanti | ehi tvam\u257 rya ni\u7779 adya k\u257 m\u257 \u7747 \u347 ca \
\
paribhu\uc0\u7749 k\u7779 va d\u257 n\u257 ni ca dehi pu\u7751 y\u257 ni ca kuru | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati |\
\
ahamasminn\uc0\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | ime ceme j\'f1\u257 taya: upasa\u7747 kramy\u257 pratir\u363 pay\u257  upanimantra\u7751 ay\u257  \
\
upanimantrayanti | kasm\uc0\u257 t tvam\u257 rya mu\u7751 \u7693 a: p\u257 trap\u257 \u7751 iranuve\u347 m\u257 nuve\u347 ma kul\u257 nyupasa\u7747 kr\u257 masi |\
\
im\uc0\u257 ni ca te \u347 \u299 tal\u257 ni k\u257 \u7779 \u257 y\u257 \u7751 i vastr\u257 \u7751 i k\u257 ya\u7747  parit\u257 payanti | ehi tvam\u257 rya ni\u7779 adya\
\
k\uc0\u257 m\u257 \u7747 \u347 ca paribhu\u7749 k\u7779 va d\u257 n\u257 ni ca dehi pu\u7751 y\u257 ni ca kuru | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257 \
\
vaseya\uc0\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: [\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya:] |\

rvar\uc0\u7779 occhede |\

y\uc0\u257 vad\u257 r\u257 ma[dv\u257 ra]m\u257 gatya yath\u257 g\u7771 h\u299 taka\u7747  gho\u7779 ayati | g\u7771 h\u7751 antu bhavanta: \u347 rama\u7751 \u257 n \

@148\

\uc0\u347 \u257 kyap\u363 tr\u299 y\u257 n p\u363 rvavadyath\u257  prav\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 vastunyeva\u7747  vistare\u7751 a v\u257 cyam | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | ahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | aya\u7747  ca r\u257 j\u257  catura\u7749 ga\u7747  balak\u257 ya\u7747  \
\
sann\uc0\u257 hya p\u363 rvavady\u257 vatsacedahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \
\
\uc0\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 -\
\
tprakr\uc0\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagato bhik\u7779 urya\u7747  str\u299 puru\u7779 apa\u7751 \u7693 akamupani\u347 ritya var\u7779 \u257  upagato bhavati sa \
\
r\uc0\u257 j\'f1\u257  upag\u7771 h\u299 to bhavati baddho v\u257  gh\u257 tito v\u257  santa:sv\u257 pateya\u7747  v\u257 sy\u257 pah\u7771 tam | r\u257 jabhayena \
\
v\uc0\u257  parar\u257 \u7779 \u7789 ra\u7747  paravi\u7779 aya\u7747  ni\u7779 pal\u257 na ucchidya v\u257  k\u257 lagata: | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  \
\
bhavati | ahamasminn\uc0\u257 v\u257 se ya\u7747  str\u299 puru\u7779 apa\u7751 \u7693 akamupani\u347 ritya var\u7779 \u257  upagata: sa r\u257 j\'f1\u257  g\u7771 h\u299 to\
\
baddho v\uc0\u257  gh\u257 tito v\u257  santa:sv\u257 pateya\u7747  v\u257 sy\u257 pah\u7771 tam | r\u257 jabhayena v\u257  parar\u257 \u7779 \u7789 ra\u7747  paravi\u7779 aya\u7747  \
\
ni\uc0\u7779 pal\u257 na ucchidya k\u257 lagata: | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  \
\
j\uc0\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa \
\
tasm\uc0\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\

\
g\uc0\u257 \u7747  v\u257  hatv\u257  mahi\u7779 \u299 \u7747  v\u257  ch\u257 galik\u257 \u7747  v\u257  rudhir\u257 \u7749 gak\u257 ni rudhiravilekhak\u257 ni k\u7771 tv\u257  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  \

dagdha: santa:sv\uc0\u257 pate [ya\u7747  v\u257 sy\u257 gnin\u257  dagdham | agnibhayena parar\u257 \u7779 \u7789 ra\u7747  v\u257  paravi\u7779 aya\u7747  ni\u7779 pal\u257 na: \
\
ucchidya v\uc0\u257  k\u257 lagata: | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | aha\u7747 ] str\u299 puru\u7779 apa\u7751 \u7693 aka-\
\
mupani\uc0\u347 ritya var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | so\'92gnin\u257  dagdha: santa:sv\u257 pateya\u7747  v\u257 sy\u257 gnin\u257  dagdham | \
\
agnibhayena v\uc0\u257  [parar\u257 \u7779 \u7789 ra\u7747  v\u257  paravi\u7779 aya\u7747  ni\u7779 pal\u257 na: ucchidya v\u257  k\u257 lagata: | tatra var\u7779 opa- \
\
gatasya bhik\uc0\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato nid\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vi- \
\
t\uc0\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 ya: |] yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 meyam | sa\
\
tasm\uc0\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede | \
\
[yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvih\u257 ra: an\u363 pamadhye prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pito bhavati | upari parvatasa\u7747 k\u7779 epe sth\u363 la- \
\
binduko devo var\uc0\u7779 an gr\u257 manigamar\u257 jar\u257 \u7779 \u7789 radh\u257 n\u299 \u7747  vahan paraiti | gocaramapi p\u363 rvavat y\u257 vat \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 syandayati | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | aha\u7747  ca asminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | \
\
aya\uc0\u7747  vih\u257 ra: an\u363 pamadhye prati\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 pita: | upari parvatasa\u7747 k\u7779 epe p\u363 rvavat y\u257 vat sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 t \
\
prakr\uc0\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\
\
yath\uc0\u257 pi tadbhik\u7779 urya\u7747  str\u299 puru\u7779 apa\u7751 \u7693 akamupani\u347 ritya var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | sa udakeno\u7693 ha: santa:- \
\
sv\uc0\u257 pateya\u7747  v\u257 syodakeno\u7693 ha\u7747  bhavati | u[cchidya v\u257  k\u257 lagata: | tatra var\u7779 opagatasya \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | ahamasminn\u257 v\u257 se str\u299 puru\u7779 apa\u7751 \u7693 akamupani\u347 ritya] var\u7779 \u257  upagata: | sa \
\
udakeno\uc0\u7693 ha: udakabhayena v\u257  parar\u257 \u7779 \u7789 ra\u7747  paravi\u7779 aya\u7747  ni\u7779 pal\u257 na: ucchidya v\u257  [k\u257 lagata: | \
\
tasya var\uc0\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oreva\u7747  bhavati | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseya\u7747  sy\u257 nme ato \

nid\uc0\u257 na\u7747  j\u299 vit\u257 ntar\u257 ya: \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 y\u257 ntar\u257 yo brahmacary\u257 ntar\u257 ya: | yattvahamasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 t prakr\u257 me-\
\
yam | sa tasm\uc0\u257 d\u257 v\u257 ]s\u257 tprakr\u257 matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede | \

udd\uc0\u257 nam \
\

p\uc0\u363 rva\u7747  dv\u257 da\u347 a pa\u347 cima\u7747  ca dv\u257 da\u347 a] ||2||\

yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagato bhik\u7779 u: pa\u347 yati | asminn\u257 v\u257 se bhik\u7779 urj\'f1\u257 payati sa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati\
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghabhed\u257 ya par\u257 kr\u257 mati | sth\u257 nametadvidyate yadasminnev\u257 ntarvar\u7779 e sa\u7747 gho \
\
bhidyate | ta[sya var\uc0\u7779 opagatasya bhik\u7779 oretadabhavat | asminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 opagato bhik\u7779 urj\'f1\u257 - \
\
payati sa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghabhed\u257 ya] par\u257 kr\u257 mati | sth\u257 nametadvidyate yada- \
\
sminnev\uc0\u257 ntarvar\u7779 e sa\u7747 gho bhidyate | aha\u7747  cedasminn\u257 v\u257 se var\u7779 \u257  vaseyam | [asamagracitto \
\
bhaveya\uc0\u7747  c\u257 pr\u257 ptasya pr\u257 ptaye anadhiga] tasy\u257 dhigam\u257 ya as\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tk\u7771 tasya s\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 yai |\

@152\

yattvahamasm\uc0\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprak\u257 meyam | sa tasm\u257 d\u257 v\u257 s\u257 tprakr\u257 [matyetadeva pratyaya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  \
\
an\uc0\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\

yath\uc0\u257 pi tadvar\u7779 opagato bhik\u7779 u: \u347 \u7771 \u7751 oti | amu\u7779 min \u257 v\u257 se bhik\u7779 ustath\u257  tath\u257  j\'f1\u257 pa- \

yati] sa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghasya bhed\u257 ya par\u257 kr\u257 mati | sth\u257 nametadvidyate \

yattvamu\uc0\u7779 minn\u257 v\u257 se\'92nta[rvar\u7779 e sa\u7747 gho bhidyeta | sa bhik\u7779 urmama \u257 laptaka: sa\u7747 laptaka: sa\u7747 stutaka: \

sapremaka: | tasya bhik\uc0\u7779 oretadabhavat | sa cet tatra gatv\u257  may\u257  eva\u7747  kartavya\u7747 ] yath\u257 \

ka[ra\uc0\u7751 \u299 yena | saced gacchat\u299 tyeva\u7747  ku\u347 ala\u7747  no cedgacchati s\u257 tis\u257 ro bhavati | \

sacettugatasya sapt\uc0\u257 ho\'92tikr\u257 nta:] an\u257 pattirvar\u7779 occhede |\

[buddho bhagav\uc0\u257 \'f1chr\u257 vasty\u257 \u7747  viharati mma jetavane\'92n\u257 thapi\u7751 \u7693 adasy\u257 r\u257 me | tasmin \

samaye\'92\uc0\u347 makanagar\u257 ntake v\u257 sava] gr\u257 make balaseno n\u257 ma g\u7771 hapati: prativasaty\u257 \u7693 hy\u257  mah\u257 dhano\

[vi\uc0\u347 \u257 la]-lal\u257 \u7789 a: sa\u7749 gatabhr\u363 ruttu\u7749 gan\u257 so ratnapratyuptikay\u257  kar\u7751 ikay\u257  \u257 muktay\u257 la\u7749 k\u7771 ta: |\

bala [senena g\uc0\u7771 hapatin\u257  ratnapar\u299 k\u7779 ak\u257  \u257 h\u363 yokt\u257 : | bhavanto rant\u257 n\u257 \u7747  m\u363 lya\u7747  kuruta\

yasminneva divase \uc0\u347 ro\u7751 a: ko\u7789 \u299 kar\u7751 o j\u257 tastasminneva divase balasenasya g\u7771 hapaterdvau pre\u7779 ya]\

\uc0\u347 ro\u7751 a: ko\u7789 \u299 kar\u7751 o\'92\u7779 \u7789 \u257 bhyo dh\u257 tr\u299 bhyo\'92nupradatto dv\u257 bhy\u257 m a\u7747 sadh\u257 tr\u299 bhy\u257 \u7747  dv\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  [kr\u299 \u7693 ani-\

so\'92\uc0\u7779 \u7789 \u257 su par\u299 k\u7779 \u257 s\u363 dgh\u257 \u7789 ako v\u257 caka: pa\u7751 \u7693 ita: pa\u7789 uprac\u257 ra: sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: | tasya pitr\u257 ] tr\u299 \u7751 i\
\
v\uc0\u257 sag\u7771 h\u257 \u7751 i m\u257 pit\u257 ni | haimantika\u7747  grai\u7779 mika\u7747  v\u257 r\u7779 ikam] | tr\u299 \u7751 yudy\u257 n\u257 ni m\u257 pit\u257 ni \

haimantika\uc0\u7747  [ grai\u7779 mika\u7747  v\u257 r\u7779 ikam | tr\u299 \u7751 yanta:pur\u257 \u7751 i pratyupasth\u257 pi]t\u257 ni jye\u7779 \u7789 haka\u7747  madhyama\u7747 \

kan\uc0\u299 yasam | sa uparipr\u257 s\u257 datalagato ni\u7779 puru\u7779 e\u7751 a t\u363 rye\u7751 a kr\u299 \u7693 ati ramate paric\u257 rayati |\

balaseno g\uc0\u7771 hapatirnityameva k\u7771 [ \u7779 ikarm\u257 nte udyukta: | sa ko\u7789 \u299 kar\u7751 asta\u7747  pitara\u7747  pa\u347 yati\

putra t\uc0\u257 vanta\u7747  me ratnaj\u257 tamasti yadi tva\u7747  tilata\u7751 \u7693 ulakolakulatthany\u257 yena ratn\u257 ni paribhok\u7779 yase\

sa sa\uc0\u7747 prasthito y\u257 vadapara\u7747  pa\u347 yaty\u257 yasa\u7747  nagaram ucca\u7747  ca prag\u7771 h\u299 ta\u7747  ca | tatr\u257 pi dv\u257 re\

puru\uc0\u7779 asti\u7779 \u7789 hati k\u257 la\u347 ca\u7751 \u7693 o lohit\u257 k\u7779 a udbaddhapi\u7751 \u7693 o lohalagu\u7693 avyagrahasta: | sa tasya\

sak\uc0\u257 \u347 amupasa\u7747 kr\u257 nta: | upasa\u7747 kramyaivam\u257 ha | bho: puru\u7779 a astyatra nagare p\u257 n\u299 yam | sa\

t\uc0\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mavasthita: | bh\u363 yastena p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | bho: puru\u7779 a astyatra nagare p\u257 n\u299 yam | sa\

t\uc0\u363 \u7779 \u7751 \u299 mavasthita: | tena tatra pravi\u347 ya p\u257 n\u299 ya\u7747  p\u257 n\u299 yamiti \u347 abda: k\u7771 ta: | anekai:\
\
pretasahasrairdagdhasth\uc0\u363 \u7751 \u257 k\u7771 tibhirasthiyantravaducchritai: svake\u347 aromapraticchannai: parvatasannibhodarai:\

s\uc0\u363 c\u299 cchidropamamukhairanupariv\u257 rita: | [te kathayanti] | \u347 ro\u7751 a k\u257 ru\u7751 ikastvamasm\u257 ka\u7747 \

t\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u257 rt\u257 n\u257 \u7747  p\u257 n\u299 yamanuprayaccha | sa kathayati | ahamapi bhavanta: p\u257 n\u299 yameva m\u7771 gay\u257 mi\

kuto\'92ha\uc0\u7747  yu\u7779 m\u257 ka\u7747  p\u257 n\u299 ya\u7747  dad\u257 m\u299 ti | te kathayanti | \u347 ro\u7751 a pretanagaramida\u7747  kuto\'92tra\
\
p\uc0\u257 n\u299 yam | ady\u257 sm\u257 bhirdv\u257 da\u347 abhirvar\u7779 aistvatsak\u257 \u347 \u257 t p\u257 n\u299 ya\u7747  p\u257 n\u299 yamiti \u347 abda: \u347 ruta: | sa\

c\uc0\u257 ha | ke y\u363 ya\u7747  bhavanta: kena v\u257  karma\u7751 \u257  ihopapann\u257 : | ta \u363 cu: | \u347 ro\u7751 a du\u7779 kuhak\u257 \

d\uc0\u257 na\u7747  ca na dattama\u7751 vapi yena vaya\u7747  pretalokam\u257 gat\u257 : ||3||\

\uc0\u347 ro\u7751 a gaccha pu\u7751 yakarm\u257  tvam | asti ka\u347 citvay\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: \u347 ruta: pretanagara\u7747  pravi\u347 ya\

[svastik\uc0\u7779 em\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747 ] j\u299 van nirgacchan | sa sa\u7747 prasthita: | y\u257 vat ten\u257 sau puru\u7779 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: |\

\
naiv\uc0\u257 hamatra pravi\u7779 \u7789 a: sy\u257 m | sa kathayati | \u347 ro\u7751 a gaccha pu\u7751 yamahe\u347 \u257 khyastvam | asti\

sa sa\uc0\u7747 prasthita: | y\u257 vat pa\u347 yati s\u363 ryasy\u257 sta\u7747 gamanak\u257 le vim\u257 na\u7747  catasro\'92psarasa:\

abhir\uc0\u363 p\u257 : pr\u257 s\u257 dik\u257  dar\u347 an\u299 y\u257 : | eka\u347 ca puru\u7779 o\'92bhir\u363 po dar\u347 an\u299 ya: pr\u257 s\u257 dika: a\u7749 gada-\
\
ku\uc0\u7751 \u7693 alavicitram\u257 ly\u257 bhara\u7751 \u257 nulepanast\u257 bhi: s\u257 rdha\u7747  kr\u299 \u7693 ati ramate paric\u257 rayati | sa taird\u363 rata\

eva d\uc0\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | te ta\u7747  pratyavabh\u257 \u7779 itum\u257 rabdh\u257 : | sv\u257 gata\u7747  \u347 ro\u7751 a m\u257 si t\u7771 \u7779 ito bubhuk\u7779 ito v\u257  |\

sthito y\uc0\u257 vat s\u363 ryasy\u257 bhyudgamanak\u257 lasamaya: | sa tairukta: | \u347 ro\u7751 a avatara \u257 d\u299 navo-\
\
\'91tra bhavi\uc0\u7779 yati | so\'92vat\u299 rya ek\u257 nte prakramy\u257 vasthita: | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 t s\u363 ryasy\u257 bhyudga-\
\
manak\uc0\u257 lasamaye tadvim\u257 namantarhitam | t\u257  apyapsaraso\'92ntarhit\u257 \u347 catv\u257 ra: \u347 y\u257 ma\u347 aval\u257 :\

kukkur\uc0\u257 : pr\u257 durbh\u363 t\u257 : | taista\u7747  puru\u7779 amavam\u363 rdhaka\u7747  p\u257 tayitv\u257  t\u257 vat p\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 hava\u7747 \u347 \u257 nyutp\u257 \u7789 yotp\u257 \u7789 ya\

bhak\uc0\u7779 it\u257 ni y\u257 vat s\u363 ryasy\u257 sta\u7747 gamanak\u257 lasamaya: | tata: pa\u347 c\u257 t punarapi tad vim\u257 na\u7747 \

vaktavya: tava pitr\uc0\u257 gni\u7779 \u7789 omasy\u257 dhast\u257 t suvar\u7751 akala\u347 a: p\u363 rayitv\u257  sth\u257 pita: | tamuddh\u7771 ty\u257 tm\u257 na\u7747 \

samyak sukhena pr\uc0\u299 \u7751 aya \u257 rya\u7747  ca mah\u257 k\u257 ty\u257 yana\u7747  k\u257 lena k\u257 la\u7747  pi\u7751 \u7693 akena pratip\u257 daya asm\u257 ka\u7747 \

dar\uc0\u347 an\u299 y\u257  pr\u257 s\u257 dik\u257  a\u7749 gadaku\u7751 \u7693 alavicitram\u257 ly\u257 bhara\u7751 \u257 nulepan\u257  | tasy\u257 \u347 catur\u7779 u parya\u7749 kap\u257 dake\u7779 u\

catv\uc0\u257 ra: pret\u257  baddh\u257 sti\u7779 \u7789 hanti | s\u257  ta\u7747  d\u363 rata eva d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  pratyanubh\u257 \u7779 itum\u257 rabdh\u257  | \u347 ro\u7751 a\

sv\uc0\u257 gata\u7747  m\u257  t\u7771 \u7779 ito\'92si m\u257  bubhuk\u7779 ito\'92si v\u257  | sa sa\u7747 lak\u7779 ayati | n\u363 na\u7747  dev\u299 ya\u7747  v\u257 \

tay\uc0\u257 sau sn\u257 pita: bhojita: ukta\u347 ca | \u347 ro\u7751 a yadyete ki\'f1cinm\u7771 gayanti m\u257  d\u257 syas\u299 tyuktv\u257 \
\
te\uc0\u7779 \u257 \u7747  sattv\u257 n\u257 \u7747  karma svak\u7771 ta\u7747  pratyak\u7779 \u299 kartuk\u257 m\u257  vim\u257 na\u7747  pravi\u347 y\u257 vasthit\u257  | te m\u7771 gayitum\u257 -\
\
rabdh\uc0\u257 : | \u347 ro\u7751 a k\u257 ru\u7751 ikastva\u7747  bubhuk\u7779 it\u257  vayamasm\u257 kamanuprayaccha | tenaikasya k\u7779 ipta\u7747  \
\
nusapl\uc0\u257 v\u299  pr\u257 durbh\u363 t\u257  | aparasya [k\u7779 ipta] mayogu\u7693 a\u7747  bhak\u7779 ayitum\u257 rabdha: | aparasya k\u7779 ipta\u7747 \
\
svam\uc0\u257 \u7747 sa\u7747  bhak\u7779 ayitum\u257 rabdha: | aparasya k\u7779 ipta\u7747  p\u363 ya\u347 o\u7751 ita\u7747  pr\u257 durbh\u363 tam | s\u257  pa\u347 yati\
\
visragandhena nirgatam | \uc0\u347 ro\u7751 a niv\u257 ritastva\u7747  may\u257  kasm\u257 t tvayai\u7779 \u257 \u7747  dattam | ki\u7747  mama karu\u7751 ay\u257 \
\
tvameva k\uc0\u257 ru\u7751 ikatara: | sa kathayati | bhagini tavaite ke bhavanti | s\u257  kathayati |\

aya\uc0\u7747  me sv\u257 m\u299  | aya\u7747  me putra: | iya\u7747  me snu\u7779 \u257  | iya\u7747  me d\u257 s\u299  | [sa \u257 ha] |\

tata: pare\uc0\u7751 a pratyanta: | dak\u7779 i\u7751 ena \u347 ar\u257 vat\u299  n\u257 ma nagar\u299  | tasy\u257 : pare\u7751 a \u347 ar\u257 vat\u299  n\u257 ma\

nad\uc0\u299  | so\'92nta: | tata: pare\u7751 a pratyanta: | pa\u347 cimena sth\u363 \u7751 opasth\u363 \u7751 akau br\u257 hma\u7751 agr\u257 makau |\

so\'92nta: | tata: pare\uc0\u7751 a pratyanta: | uttare\u7751 a u\u347 \u299 ragiri: | so\'92nta: | tata: pare\u7751 a\

pratyanta: |\
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 ava: sa\u7747 \u347 ayaj\u257 t\u257 : sarvasa\u7747 \u347 ayacchett\u257 ra\u7747  buddha\u7747  bhagavanta\u7747  p\u7771 cchanti | ki\u7747  bhadanta\
\
\uc0\u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257  \u347 ro\u7751 ena ko\u7789 \u299 kar\u7751 ena karma k\u7771 ta\u7747  yasya karma\u7751 o vip\u257 ken\u257 \u7693 hye mah\u257 dhane mah\u257 bhoge\

kule j\uc0\u257 to ratnapratyuptikay\u257  kar\u7751 e \u257 muktikay\u257  bhagavata: \u347 \u257 sane pravrajya sarvakle\u347 a-\
\
prah\uc0\u257 \u7751 \u257 darhattva\u7747  s\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tk\u7771 tam |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | bh\u363 tap\u363 rva\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo v\u257 r\u257 \u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  nagary\u257 \u7747  k\u257 \u347 yapo n\u257 ma tath\u257 gato\'92rhan\
\
samyaksa\uc0\u7747 buddho bhagav\u257 \'f1ch\u257 st\u257  loka utpanna: | tena khalu samayena v\u257 r\u257 \u7751 asy\u257 \u7747  dvau j\u257 y\u257 -\
\
patikau | t\uc0\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  k\u257 \u347 yapasya samyaksa\u7747 buddhasy\u257 ntike \u347 ara\u7751 agamana\u347 ik\u7779 \u257 pad\u257 nyudg\u7771 h\u299 t\u257 ni |\

yad\uc0\u257  k\u257 \u347 yapa: samyaksa\u7747 buddha: sakala\u7747  buddhak\u257 rya\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  nirupadhi\u347 e\u7779 e nirv\u257 \u7751 adh\u257 tau parinirv\u7771 -\

gaccha | vij\'f1\uc0\u257 tam | sa prakr\u257 nta: | tena gop\u257 lasy\u257 j\'f1\u257  datt\u257  etadvatsaka\u7747  pragh\u257 tya carma \

bhagavanta: | p\uc0\u7771 cchati buddho bhagav\u257 n\u257 yu\u7779 mantam\u257 nandam | kasm\u257 d\u257 nanda iya\u7747  gau:\

jetavanadv\uc0\u257 re ti\u7779 \u7789 hati | \u257 yu\u7779 m\u257 n\u257 nanda: kathayati | bhagavan tasy\u257  vatsaka: carmak\u257 rth\u257 ya\
\
bhadantopanandena pradh\uc0\u257 t\u257 pita: | teneya\u7747  gau: jetavanadv\u257 re ha\u7747 bh\u257 rava\u7747  ravam\u257 n\u257  ti\u7779 \u7789 hati |\
\
bhagav\uc0\u257 n\u257 ha | ya: ka\u347 cid\u257 d\u299 navo bhik\u7779 ava\u347 carma dh\u257 rayanti | tasm\u257 nna bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u257  carma\
\
dh\uc0\u257 rayitavyam | dh\u257 rayanti s\u257 tis\u257 r\u257  bhavanti |\

@173\

ukta\uc0\u7747  bhagavat\u257  | na carma dh\u257 rayitavyam | anyatamena g\u7771 hapatin\u257  buddhapramukho\

bhik\uc0\u7779 usa\u7747 gho nimantrita: | sa carmak\u257 ny\u257 san\u257 ni praj\'f1apayitum\u257 rabdha: | p\u363 rvavattu [na] sarvatra\

nik\uc0\u257 y\u257 \u7747  p\u257 dau prak\u7779 \u257 lya p\u257 n\u299 yen\u257 sya\u7747  p\u363 rayitv\u257  may\u363 ragaty\u257  sa\u7747 prasthita: | \u7779 a\u7693 vargi kaird\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: |\
\
te kathayanti | \uc0\u257 yu\u7779 manto vin\u257  v\u257 ditre\u7751 a bhik\u7779 urn\u7771 tyati | v\u257 ditra\u7747  v\u257 dayateti | te\
\
mukhav\uc0\u257 ditra\u7747  v\u257 dayitum\u257 rabdh\u257 : | te bhik\u7779 ubhirbhatsryante | kimauddhatya\u7747  kuruta | te \
\
kathayanti | kimatrauddhatyam | na pa\uc0\u347 yata y\u363 ya\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7747  vin\u257  v\u257 ditre\u7751 a n\u7771 tyantam | etat\

prakara\uc0\u7751 a\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo bhagavata \u257 rocayanti | j\u257 nak\u257 : p\u7771 cchak\u257  buddh\u257  bhagavanto j\u257 nanta:\

p\uc0\u7771 cchanti | p\u7771 cchati buddho bhagav\u257 \u7747 sta\u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7747  kimabhipr\u257 ye\u7751 a bhik\u7779 o eva\u7747  k\u7771 tam |\

sa\uc0\u7747 ghabhedavastu\
\
[aya\uc0\u7747  mama k\u257 yo r\u363 p\u299  c\u257 turmah\u257 bh\u363 tika: | vi]j\'f1\u257 namatra prati\u7779 \u7789 hitamatra pary\u257 pannam |\
\
yattvahamasm\uc0\u257 t k\u257 y\u257 t m\u257 nasa\u7747  vyutth\u257 py\u257 nya\u7747  k\u257 yamabhinirm\u257 y\u257 \u7747  r\u363 pi\u7751 a\u7747  manomayamavikala-\
\
mah\uc0\u299 nendriyam | sa tasm\u257 t k\u257  [y\u257 t m\u257 nasa\u7747  vyutth\u257 py\u257 nya\u7747  k\u257 yamabhinirmim\u299 te r\u363 pi\u7751 a\u7747 \
\
manomayama] vikalamah\uc0\u299 nendriyam | tadyath\u257  [ma\u7751 ira] \u7779 \u7789 \u257 \u7747 gau vai\u7693 \u363 rya: \u347 ubho j\u257 tim\u257 nnaccho\
\
viprasanno\'92n\uc0\u257 vila: pa\'f1c\u257 \u7749 gara\u7747 gike s\u363 tre\'92rpita: sy\u257 t n\u299 le p\u299 te lohite avad\u257 te ma\u7747 ji\u7779 \u7789 he |\
\
ta\uc0\u7747  cak\u7779 u\u7779 m\u257 n puru\u7779 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  [j\u257 n\u299 y\u257 daya\u7747  ma\u7751 irida\u7747  s\u363 tramiti | evameva] sa tasm\u257 t\
\
k\uc0\u257 y\u257 t m\u257 nasa\u7747  vyutth\u257 py\u257 nya\u7747  k\u257 yamabhinirmim\u299 te r\u363 pi\u7751 a\u7747  manomayamavikalamah\u299 nendriyam |\
\
tadyath\uc0\u257  puru\u7779 o mu\u7747 j\u257 di\u7779 ik\u257 m\u257 v\u7771 hy\u257 t | ta\u7747  cak\u7779 u\u7779 m\u257 n puru\u7779 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  j\u257 n\u299 y\u257 daya\u7747  [mu\u7747 ja\
\
iyami\uc0\u7779 ik\u257  | evameva sa tasm\u257 t k\u257 y\u257 t m\u257 nasa\u7747  vyutth\u257 py\u257 nya\u7747  k\u257 yamabhinirmim\u299 te r\u363 pi\u7751 a\u7747 \
\
manomayamavikalamah\uc0\u299 nedriyam | tadyath\u257  puru\u7779 a: kara\u7751 \u7693 \u257 dahim\u257 v\u7771 hy\u257 t | ta\u7747  cak\u7779 u\u7779 m\u257 n \
\
puru\uc0\u7779 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  j\u257 n\u299 y\u257 daya\u7747  kara\u7751 \u7693 a: [ayamahi: | evameva sa] tasm\u257 t k\u257 y\u257 t m\u257 nasa\u7747  \
\
vyutth\uc0\u257 py\u257 nya\u7747  k\u257 yamabhinirmim\u299 te r\u363 pi\u7751 a\u7747  manomayamavikalamah\u299 nendriyam | tadyath\u257  puru\u7779 a: \
\
ko\uc0\u7779 \u257 dasim\u257 v\u7771 hy\u257 t | ta\u7747  cak\u7779 u\u7779 m\u257 n puru\u7779 o d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  j\u257 n\u299 y\u257 daya\u7747  ko\u347 o\'92yamasi: | [evameva\
\
sa tasm\uc0\u257 t k\u257 y\u257 t m\u257 nasa\u7747 ] vyutth\u257 py\u257 nya\u7747  k\u257 yamabhinimim\u299 te r\u363 pi\u7751 a\u7747  manomayamavikalamah\u299 -\
\
nendriyam |\
\
sa eva\uc0\u7747  sam\u257 hite cite pari\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7747 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e rijubh\u363 te karma\u7751 ye\
\
sthite \uc0\u257 ni\u7747 jyapr\u257 pte \u7771 ddhivi\u7779 ayas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinirnamayya so\'92nekavidha-\
\
m\uc0\u7771 ddhi\u7747 vi\u7779 aya\u7747  pratyanubhavati | tadyath\u257  eko bh\u363 tv\u257  bahudh\u257  bhavati | bahudh\u257  bh\u363 tvaiko\
\
bhavati | \uc0\u257 virbh\u257 va\u7747  tirobh\u257 va\u7747  j\'f1\u257 nadar\u347 anena pratyanubhavati | tira:ku\u7693 ya\u7747  tira:\u347 aila\u7747 \
\
tira:pr\uc0\u257 k\u257 ramasajjam\u257 na\u7747  k\u257 yena gacchati tadyath\u257  \u257 k\u257 \u347 e | p\u7771 thivy\u257 munmajjananimajjana\u7747 \
\
karoti tadyath\uc0\u257  udake | udake abhindasroto gacchati tadyath\u257  p\u7771 thivy\u257 m | \u257 k\u257 \u347 e\
\
parya\uc0\u7749 ken\u257 tikr\u257 mati tadyath\u257  pak\u7779 \u299  \u347 akuni: | imau v\u257  s\u363 ry\u257 candramas\u257 veva\u7747  maharddhik\u257 veva\u7747 \
\
mah\uc0\u257 nubh\u257 vau p\u257 \u7751 in\u257  \u257 m\u257 r\u7779 \u7789 i par\u257 m\u257 r\u7779 \u7789 i y\u257 vad brahmaloka\u7747  k\u257 yena va\u347 e vartayati |\
\
tadyath\uc0\u257  dak\u7779 a: karm\u257 ro v\u257  karm\u257 r\u257 ntev\u257 s\u299  v\u257  suparikarm\u299 k\u7771 ta\u7747  j\u257 tar\u363 pa\u7747  viditv\u257  y\u257 \u7747  y\u257 \u7747 \
\
pilandhanavik\uc0\u7771 ti\u7747  k\u257 \u7749 k\u7779 atyupanayitu\u7747  yadi v\u257  pa\u7789 \u7789 ik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yadi v\u257  kar\u7751 ik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yadi v\u257 \
\
graiveye yadi v\uc0\u257  hast\u257 bhara\u7751 e yadi v\u257  p\u257 d\u257 bhara\u7751 e yadi v\u257  a\u7747 gulimudrik\u257 y\u257 \u7747  yadi v\u257 \

@181\

j\uc0\u257 tar\u363 pam\u257 l\u257 y\u257 \u7747  tatra tatra laghu laghvevopanayati | evameva sa eva\u7747  sam\u257 hite pari\u347 uddhe\
\
paryavad\uc0\u257 te ana\u7747 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e rijubh\u363 te karma\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\u7747 jyapr\u257 pte riddhivi\u7779 ayaj\'f1\u257 na-\
\
s\uc0\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati | so\'92nekavidham\u7771 ddhivi\u7779 aya\u7747  pratyanubhavati |\
\
tadyath\uc0\u257  eko bh\u363 tv\u257  bahudh\u257  bhavati | bahudh\u257  bh\u363 tv\u257  eko bhavati | \u257 virbh\u257 va\u7747  tirobh\u257 va\u7747  \
\
j\'f1\uc0\u257 nadar\u347 anena pratyanubhavati | tira:ku\u7693 ya\u7747  tira:\u347 aila\u7747  tira:pr\u257 k\u257 ramasajjam\u257 na: k\u257 yena\
\
gacchati tadyath\uc0\u257  \u257 k\u257 \u347 e | p\u7771 thivy\u257 munmajjananimajjana\u7747  karoti tadyathodake | udake\
\
abhindasroto gacchati tadyath\uc0\u257  p\u7771 thivy\u257 m | \u257 k\u257 \u347 e parya\u7749 ken\u257 tikr\u257 mati tadyath\u257  pak\u7779 \u299 \

[\uc0\u347 akuni:] | imau v\u257  puna: s\u363 ry\u257 candramas\u257 veva\u7747  maharddhik\u257 veva\u7747  mah\u257 nubh\u257 vau p\u257 \u7751 in\u257 \

\uc0\u257 m\u257 r\u7779 \u7789 i parim\u257 r\u7779 \u7789 i y\u257 vad brahmaloka\u7747  k\u257 yena va\u347 e vartayati | tadyath\u257  dak\u7779 a: kumbhak\u257 ro v\u257 \

@182\

ki\uc0\u7747  manyase mah\u257 r\u257 ja natveva\u7747  sati may\u257  dar\u347 ita\u7747  s\u257 \u7747 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ika\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 yaphalam | tathya\u7747 \
\
bhadanta eva\uc0\u7747  sati bhagavat\u257  dar\u347 ita\u7747  s\u257 \u7747 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ika\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 yaphalam |\
\
sa eva\uc0\u7747  sam\u257 hite citte pari\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7749 ga\u7751 e vikato\u7779 akle\u347 e rijubh\u363 te \
\
karma\uc0\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte divya\u347 rotraj\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati |\
\
sa divyena \uc0\u347 rotre\u7751 a vi\u347 uddhen\u257 tikr\u257 ntam\u257 nu\u7779 ye\u7751 obhay\u257 n \u347 abd\u257 n \u347 \u7771 \u7751 oti m\u257 nu\u7779 y\u257 na\u7779 yam\u257 nu-\
\
\uc0\u7779 y\u257 napi | ye\'92pi d\u363 re ye\'92pyantike | tadyath\u257  \u347 a\u7747 khadh\u257 maka: puru\u7779 o mah\u257 \u347 ailaparvatamabhiruhya\
\
ni\uc0\u347 \u257 rdhe \u347 akham\u257 dhamettasya \u347 abdo\'92vy\u257 hata: p\u7771 thagdi\u347 a: sphuret | evameva sa eva\u7747  sam\u257 hite\
\
citte pari\uc0\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7749 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e \u7771 jubh\u363 te karma\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte\
\
divya\uc0\u347 rotraj\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati | sa divyena \u347 rotre\u7751 a\
\
vi\uc0\u347 uddhen\u257 tikr\u257 ntam\u257 nu\u7779 ye\u7751 obhay\u257 n \u347 abd\u257 n \u347 \u7771 \u7751 oti m\u257 nu\u7779 y\u257 napyam\u257 nu\u7779 y\u257 napi | ye\'92pi\
\
d\uc0\u363 re ye\'92pyantike |\

sa eva\uc0\u7747  sam\u257 hite citte pari\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7749 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e \u7771 jubh\u363 te \
\
karma\uc0\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte ceta: pary\u257 yaj\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 -\
\
mayati | sa parasattv\uc0\u257 n\u257 \u7747  parapudgal\u257 n\u257 \u7747  vitarkita\u7747  vic\u257 rita\u7747  manas\u257  m\u257 nasa\u7747  yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  \
\
praj\uc0\u257 n\u257 ti | sar\u257 ga\u7747  citta\u7747  sar\u257 ga\u7747  cittamiti yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  praj\u257 n\u257 ti | vigatar\u257 ga\u7747  citta\u7747 \
\
vir\uc0\u257 ga\u7747  cittamiti yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  praj\u257 n\u257 ti | sadve\u7779 a\u7747  vigatadve\u7779 a\u7747  samoha\u7747  vigatamoha\u7747  sa\u7747 k\u7779 ipta\u7747 \
\
vik\uc0\u7779 ipta\u7747  l\u299 na\u7747  prag\u7771 h\u299 tamuddhatamanuddhatam | avyupa\u347 \u257 nta\u7747  vyupa\u347 \u257 nta\u7747  sam\u257 hitamasam\u257 hitama-\
\
bh\uc0\u257 vita\u7747  subh\u257 vitam avimukta\u7747  v\u257  citta [mavimukta\u7747  citta] miti yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  praj\u257 n\u257 ti |\
\
vimukta\uc0\u7747  v\u257  citta\u7747  vimukta\u7747  cittamiti yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  praj\u257 n\u257 ti | tadyath\u257  cak\u7779 u\u7779 m\u257 n puru\u7779 a:\
\
supari\uc0\u347 uddham\u257 dar\u347 ama\u7751 \u7693 ala\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 tv\u257  sa\u7747 mukhanimitta\u7747  v\u257  pratyavek\u7779 ate | evameva sa eva\u7747  sam\u257 hite\
\
citte pari\uc0\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7749 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e \u7771 jubh\u363 te karma\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte\

ceta: pary\uc0\u257 yaj\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati | sa parasattv\u257 n\u257 \u7747 \
\
parapudgal\uc0\u257 n\u257 \u7747  vitarkita\u7747  vic\u257 rita\u7747  manas\u257  m\u257 nasa\u7747  yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  praj\u257 n\u257 ti | sar\u257 ga\u7747  citta\u7747 \

\
praj\uc0\u257 n\u257 ti | sadve\u7779 a\u7747  vigatadve\u7779 a\u7747  samoha\u7747  vigatamoha\u7747  sa\u7747 k\u7779 ipta\u7747  vik\u7779 ipta\u7747  l\u299 na\u7747  prag\u7771 h\u299 tamuddhata-\

manuddhatamavyupa\uc0\u347 \u257 nta\u7747  vyupa\u347 \u257 nta\u7747  sam\u257 hitamasam\u257 hita\u7747  subh\u257 vitamabh\u257 vitamavimukta\u7747  v\u257 \

@183\

ki\uc0\u7747  manyase mah\u257 r\u257 ja na tveva\u7747  sati may\u257  dar\u347 ita\u7747  s\u257 \u7747 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ika\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 yaphalam | tathya\u7747 \

bhadanta eva\uc0\u7747  sati bhagavat\u257  dar\u347 ita\u7747  s\u257 \u7747 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ika\u7747  \u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 yaphalam |\

sa eva\uc0\u7747  sam\u257 hite citte pari\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7749 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e \u7771 jubh\u363 te\
\
karma\uc0\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte p\u363 rvaniv\u257 s\u257 nusm\u7771 tij\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati |\
\
so\'92nekavidha\uc0\u7747  p\u363 rvaniv\u257 sa\u7747  samanusmarati | tadyath\u257  ek\u257 mapi dve tistra\u347 catasra: pa\u7747 ca \u7779 a\u7789 \
\
sapt\uc0\u257 \u7779 tau nava da\u347 a vi\u7747 \u347 ata\u7747  tri\u7747 \u347 ata\u7747  catv\u257 ri\u7747 \u347 ata\u7747  pa\u7747 c\u257 \u347 ata\u7747  j\u257 ti\u347 ata\u7747  j\u257 tisahasra\u7747  j\u257 ti\u347 ata-\
\
sahasram anek\uc0\u257 nyapi j\u257 ti\u347 at\u257 ni anek\u257 nyapi j\u257 tisahasr\u257 \u7751 i anek\u257 nyapi j\u257 ti\u347 ata-\
\
sahasr\uc0\u257 \u7751 i sa\u7747 vartakalpamapi vivartakalpamapi sa\u7747 vartavivartakalpamapi anek\u257 napi sa\u7747 varta [kalp\u257 ]-\
\
nanek\uc0\u257 napi vivartakalp\u257 nanek\u257 napi sa\u7747 vartavivartakalp\u257 n samanusmarati | am\u299  n\u257 ma te\
\
bhavanta: sattv\uc0\u257  yatr\u257 ham\u257 sam | eva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  eva\u7747 j\u257 tya eva\u7747 gotra evam\u257 h\u257 ra eva\u7747 sukhadu:khaprati-\
\
sa\uc0\u7747 ved\u299  eva\u7747  d\u299 rgh\u257 yu: eva\u7747 cirasthitika evam\u257 yu\u7779 paryanta: | so\'92ha\u7747  tasm\u257 t sth\u257 n\u257 ccyuto-\
\
\'91mutropapanna: | tasm\uc0\u257 dapi cyuto\'92mutropapanna: | tasm\u257 dapi cyuta: ihopapanna iti |\
\
s\uc0\u257 k\u257 ra\u7747  sodde\u347 amanekavidha\u7747  p\u363 rvaniv\u257 samanusmarati | tadyath\u257  puru\u7779 o gr\u257 m\u257 d gr\u257 ma\u7747  gacchet |\
\
tasm\uc0\u257 dapi gr\u257 m\u257 dapara\u7747  gr\u257 ma\u7747  gacchet | tasm\u257 dapyeh\u257 gacchet | tasyaiva\u7747  sy\u257 t | ahama-\
\
mu\uc0\u7779 m\u257 da gr\u257 m\u257 damu\u7747  gr\u257 mam\u257 gata: | tasm\u257 dapyeh\u257 gata iti | evameva sa eva\u7747  sam\u257 hite \
\
citte pari\uc0\u347 uddhe paryavad\u257 te ana\u7749 ga\u7751 e vigatopakle\u347 e \u7771 jubh\u363 te karma\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte\
\
p\uc0\u363 rvaniv\u257 s\u257 nusm\u7771 tij\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati tadyath\u257  ek\u257 mapi j\u257 ti\u7747  \
\
dve tisra\uc0\u347 catasra: pa\u7747 ca \u7779 a\u7789  sapt\u257 \u7779 \u7789 au nava da\u347 a vi\u7747 \u347 ata\u7747  tri\u7747 \u347 ata\u7747  catv\u257 ri\u7747 \u347 ata\u7747  pa\u7747 c\u257 \u347 ata\u7747  j\u257 ti\u347 ata\u7747 \
\
[j\uc0\u257 tisahasra\u7747 ] j\u257 ti\u347 atasahasramanek\u257 nyapi j\u257 ti\u347 at\u257 ni anek\u257 nyapi j\u257 tisahasr\u257 \u7751 i ane-\
\
k\uc0\u257 nyapi j\u257 ti\u347 atasahasr\u257 \u7751 i sa\u7747 vartakalpamapi vivartakalpamapi sa\u7747 vartavivartakalpamapi anek\u257 napi \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 vartakalp\u257 n [anek\u257 napi vivartakalp\u257 n] anek\u257 napi sa\u7747 vartavivartakalp\u257 n samanusmarati |\

am\uc0\u299  n\u257 ma te bhavanta: sattv\u257  yatr\u257 hameva\u7747 n\u257 m\u257  \u257 sam | eva\u7747 j\u257 tya eva\u7747 gotra evam\u257 h\u257 ra\
\
eva\uc0\u7747 sukhadu:khapratisa\u7747 ved\u299  eva\u7747 d\u299 rgh\u257 yu: eva\u7747 cirasthitika evam\u257 yu\u7779 paryanta: | so\'92ha\u7747  \
\
tasm\uc0\u257 tsth\u257 n\u257 ccyuta: amutropapanna: | tasm\u257 dapi cyuto\'92mutropapanna: | tasm\u257 dapi cyuta:\

karma\uc0\u7751 ye sthite \u257 ni\'f1jyapr\u257 pte cyutyupap\u257 daj\'f1\u257 nas\u257 k\u7779 \u257 tkriy\u257 y\u257 mabhij\'f1\u257 y\u257 \u7747  cittamabhinir\u7751 \u257 mayati \

divyena cak\uc0\u7779 u\u7779 \u257  vi\u347 uddhen\u257 tikr\u257 ntam\u257 nu\u7779 yakena sattv\u257 n pa\u347 yati cyavam\u257 n\u257 nupapannam\u257 n\u257 napi \

suvar\uc0\u7751 \u257 napi durvar\u7751 \u257 napi h\u299 n\u257 napi pra\u7751 \u299 t\u257 napi sugatimapi gacchato durgatimapi yath\u257 karmo-\

payog\uc0\u257 tsattv\u257  [n] yath\u257 bh\u363 ta\u7747  praj\u257 n\u257 ti | am\u299  bhavanta: sattv\u257 : k\u257 yadu\u347 caritena samanv\u257 gat\u257 \

v\uc0\u257 \u7749 manodu\u347 caritena samanv\u257 gat\u257  \u257 ry\u257 \u7751 \u257 mapav\u257 dak\u257  mithy\u257 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ayo mithy\u257 d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 ikarmadharmasam\u257 -\

vimucyate | vimuktasya vimuktameva j\'f1\uc0\u257 nadar\u347 ana\u7747  bhavati | k\u7779 \u299 \u7751 \u257  me j\u257 ti: vyu\u7779 ita\u7747  brahmacarya\u7747 \

bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u299 n\u257 mup\u257 sak\u257 n\u257 mup\u257 sik\u257 n\u257 m | \u257 v\u7771 ta\u7747  tu devadattasya devadatta\u347 r\u257 vak\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747 \
\
devadatta\uc0\u347 r\u257 vik\u257 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  ceti | sa ca dv\u257 re vidh\u257 ritasti\u7779 \u7789 hati | utpalavar\u7751 \u257  ca bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u299 \
\
pi\uc0\u7751 \u7693 ap\u257 tam\u257 d\u257 ya r\u257 jakul\u257 nni\u7779 kr\u257 mati | devadattasyaitadabhavat | asy\u257  mu\u7751 \u7693 ik\u257 y\u257 :\
\
\uc0\u347 r\u257 ma\u7751 ik\u257 y\u257  etat karma | anay\u257  r\u257 j\u257  aj\u257 ta\u347 atru: s\u257 nta:purakum\u257 rebhyo bhinno yena me\
\
samavastheti viditvotpalavar\uc0\u7751 \u257 midamavocat | ki\u7747  may\u257  tav\u257 par\u257 ddha\u7747  yena tvay\u257  mama\

bhaik\uc0\u7779 y\u257 kakula\u7747  d\u363 r\u299 k\u7771 tamiti | sa t\u257 \u7747  pragh\u257 tayitum\u257 rabdha: | s\u257  pragh\u257 tyam\u257 n\u257  karu\u7751 ad\u299 na-\
\
vilapitairak\uc0\u7779 arairuv\u257 ca | \u257 rya \u347 \u257 nta\u7747  kimahameva\u7747  kari\u7779 ye | tva\u7747  t\u257 vadbhagavato bhr\u257 t\u257 \

puna: \uc0\u347 \u257 kyakul\u257 tpravrajita: | n\u257 hameva\u7747  karomi k\u7779 amasveti | tath\u257 pyucyam\u257 nena devadattena\

tasya \uc0\u347 irasi kha\u7789 aprah\u257 ro data: | s\u257  marmavedan\u257 bhy\u257 hat\u257  | j\u299 vitasa\u7747 sk\u257 r\u257 nadhi\u7779 \u7789 h\u257 ya \
\
\uc0\u257 yu:sa\u7747 sk\u257 r\u257  [na]nuts\u7771 jya [v\u299 rya]mavalambya bhik\u7779 u\u7751 \u299 var\u7779 aka\u7747  gat\u257  | bhik\u7779 u\u7751 yast\u257 \u7747  \

tath\uc0\u257 vidh\u257 \u7747  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  kathayanti | aho \u257 rye kimidamiti | s\u257  kathayati | bhaginya:\

sarvasa\uc0\u7747 sk\u257 r\u257  anity\u257 : | sarvadharm\u257  an\u257 tm\u257 na: | \u347 \u257 nta\u7747  nirv\u257 \u7751 am | yu\u7779 m\u257 bhi: ku\u347 ale\u7779 u\

dharme\uc0\u7779 vapram\u257 da: kara\u7751 \u299 ya: | devadattena t\u7771 t\u299 yam\u257 nantarya\u7747  k\u7771 tam | parinirv\u257 sy\u257 m\u299 ti |\

\uc0\u347 \u257 ky\u257 n\u257 \u7747  pa\u7747 \u7693 ita iti | tvamapi m\u363 rkha: | kuta: paraloko yena tvameva\u7747  cint\u257 paro vyavasthita: |\

ka\uc0\u347 cideva puru\u7779 a upapadyeta d\u299 rghar\u257 tramarthak\u257 mo hitak\u257 ma: sukhak\u257 ma: spar\u347 ak\u257 mo yogak\u7779 emak\u257 ma: |\

sa ta\uc0\u7747  g\u363 th\u257 dh\u257 ra\u7747  s\u257 mantaken\u257 nupariv\u257 ry\u257 gacchedapyeva labhey\u257 sya puru\u7779 astha ka\u7747 cideva prade\u347 a\u7747 \

g\uc0\u363 then\u257 mrak\u7779 ita\u7747  yatraina\u7747  g\u7771 h\u299 tvoddhareyamiti | sa tatra s\u257 mantaken\u257 nupariv\u257 ry\u257 gacchanna labhate \

g\uc0\u7771 h\u299 tvoddharet | evameva yata\u347 c\u257 ha\u7747  bhik\u7779 avo devadattasya \u347 ukla\u7747  dharmamadr\u257 k\u7779 a\u7747  na t\u257 vanmay\u257 \

anta:pura\uc0\u7747  pravi\u7779 \u7789 a: | tena sop\u257 namabhiruhat\u257  gopik\u257  d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 \u257  | tasy\u257 : samupah\u257 sama\u7749 gul\u299 kartu-\

\uc0\u347 o\u7751 itam\u257 gatam | tatastay\u257 sau kr\u299 \u7693 \u257 pu\u7779 kari\u7751 y\u257 \u7747  k\u7779 ipta: | tena patat\u257  n\u257 do mukta: |\

[sak\uc0\u257 \u347 a\u7747 ] gardabha: upasa\u7747 kramya kathayati | m\u257 tula tva [y\u257  s\u257 rdha\u7747  car\u257 m\u299 ti]\

upacitatva\uc0\u7749 m\u257 \u7747 sa\u347 o\u7751 ita: | na c\u257 ha\u7747  tv\u257 \u7747  pa\u347 y\u257 mi kad\u257 ciccarantamiti | sa kathayati |\

sa kathayati | m\uc0\u257 tula gacch\u257 mi na kari\u7779 y\u257 m\u299 ti | tau v\u257 \u7789 a\u7747  bha\u7747 ktv\u257  r\u257 jak\u299 ye m\u257 \u7779 ak\u7779 etre\

g\uc0\u257 y\u257 mi t\u257 vat | v\u7771 \u7779 a: kathayati | ti\u7779 \u7789 ha t\u257 vanmuh\u363 rta\u7747  y\u257 vadaha\u7747  nirgacch\u257 m\u299 ti |\

pa\uc0\u347 c\u257 dyathe\u7779 \u7789 a\u7747  kari\u7779 yasi | ityuktv\u257  ni\u7779 pal\u257 yita: | gardabho g\u257 yitum\u257 rabdha: | r\u257 japuru\u7779 ai:\

\uc0\u347 rutv\u257  g\u7771 h\u299 ta: | bhavanta: anena gardabhena sarvamida\u7747  r\u257 jak\u299 ya\u7747  m\u257 \u7779 ak\u7779 etra\u7747  bhak\u7779 itam |\

@195\

nigrahamasya kurma iti | tai: kar\uc0\u7751 au cchittv\u257  ul\u363 khala\u7747  ca gr\u299 v\u257 y\u257 \u7747  baddhv\u257  mukta: | \

vistare\uc0\u7751 a sa tasya j\u257 timaha\u7747  k\u7771 tv\u257  kulasad\u7771 \u347 a\u7747  n\u257 madheya\u7747  vyavasth\u257 pitam | sa unn\u299 to\

@199\
\
yasminneva divase avadhi: k\uc0\u7771 tastasminneva divase karva\u7789 akamanupr\u257 pta: | d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 v\u257  para\u7747 \
\
vismayam\uc0\u257 panna: | tato d\u257 rik\u257 \u7747  pratig\u7771 hya punastadyantram\u257 ruhya svag\u7771 ham\u257 gata: | yantra\u7747 \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 g\u7771 hya m\u257 tu: samarpitam ukta\u7747  ca | aya\u7747  tava putro yantrasya pravartanayoga\u7747  j\u257 n\u299 te no tu\
\
nirvatanam | na tvay\uc0\u257 sya yantra\u7747  deyamiti | bh\u363 yo bh\u363 yo m\u257 tu: kathayati | amba prayaccha\
\
me yantra\uc0\u7747  mah\u257 janak\u257 yamanv\u257 vartay\u257 m\u299 ti | s\u257  kathayati | putra \u257 c\u257 ryaste kathayati |\
\
aya\uc0\u7747  pravartanaprayoga\u7747  j\u257 n\u299 te no tu nivartanam | m\u257  d\u257 syasi m\u257 nayena vyasanam\u257 patsyase\
\
iti | tasm\uc0\u257 daha\u7747  na dad\u257 m\u299 ti | sa kathayati | amba pravartanamapyaha\u7747  j\u257 n\u257 mi\
\
nivartanamapi | ki\uc0\u7747  nvas\u257 v\u257 c\u257 ryo m\u257 tsarye\u7751 a na dad\u257 t\u299 ti | laghucitto m\u257 t\u7771 gr\u257 ma: |\
\
tay\uc0\u257  lobhitay\u257  dattam | sa yantram\u257 mre\u7693 y\u257 bhiruhya sa\u7747 prasthito mah\u257 janak\u257 yo\'92bhiprasanna: |\
\
tato yantrakal\uc0\u257 c\u257 rye\u7751 a d\u7771 \u7779 \u7789 a: | sa kathayati | gato\'92yamapunaran\u257 gaman\u257 yeti | sa yath\u257 \
\
yath\uc0\u257  sa\u7747 bhrama\u7751 \u257 d\u257 mre\u7693 ayati tath\u257  tath\u257  d\u363 ratara\u7747  gacchati y\u257 vanmah\u257 samudra\u7747  gata: | mah\u257 samudre\
\
sad\uc0\u257  var\u7779 adeva: | bandhan\u257 ni klinn\u257 ni | anayena vyasanam\u257 panna: | devat\u257  g\u257 th\u257 \u7747  bh\u257 \u7779 ate | \
\
yo hyarthak\uc0\u257 masya hit\u257 nukampito \

tad\uc0\u257 pye\u7779 a vacanama\u347 \u7771 \u7751 van anayena vyasanam\u257 panna: | etarhyapye\u7779 a may\u257  hitamucyam\u257 no mama\

avyagrasa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1ina: karm\u257 \u7751 i kurvanti | ayamucyate sa\u7747 ghabheda: | yatastu dharma dharmasa\u7747 j\'f1ina:\

yatraiko bhik\uc0\u7779 urna [ta]tra sa\u7747 gho bhidyate | yatra dvau yatra trayo y\u257 vada\u7779 \u7789 au na tatra\

sa\uc0\u7747 gho bhidyate | yatra nava bhik\u7779 ava uttare v\u257  tatra dv\u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  k\u257 ra\u7751 \u257 bhy\u257 \u7747  sa\u7747 gho bhidyate |\

j\'f1aptikarma\uc0\u7751 \u257  \u347 al\u257 k\u257 graha\u7751 ena ca |\

katha\uc0\u7747  j\'f1aptikamar\u7751 \u257  | yath\u257 pi taddevadatto bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 payati sa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \u347 ik\u7779 ayati \

gr\uc0\u257 hayati | pa\u7747 cabhir\u257 yu\u7779 manto vratapadairbhik\u7779 u: \u347 udhyati vimucyate niry\u257 ti | sukhadu:kha\u7747 \

sa\uc0\u7747 ghabhedavastu \
yata\uc0\u347 cod\u257 lin bhik\u7779 uradharme vaimatiko bhede adharmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u299  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 payati sa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghasya bhed\u257 ya par\u257 kr\u257 mati | iyat\u257  ud\u257 lin bhik\u7779 u: samagra\u7747  \u347 r\u257 vakasa\u7747 gha\u7747  \
\
bhittv\uc0\u257  \u257 v\u299 cikamavadya\u7747  pras\u363 te[na tu]sp\u7771 \u347 yate \u257 nantary\u257 vadyena karma\u7751 \u257  | \
\
yata\uc0\u347 co [d\u257 lin bhik\u7779 u]radharme vaimatiko bhede vaimatiko bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 payati \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghasya [bhed\u257 ya] par\u257 kr\u257 mati | iyat\u257  ud\u257 lin bhik\u7779 u: \
\
samagra\uc0\u7747  \u347 r\u257 vakasa\u7747 gha\u7747  bhittv\u257  \u257 v\u299 cikamavadya\u7747  pras\u363 te na tu sp\u7771 \u347 yate \u257 nantary\u257 va [dyena \
\
karma\uc0\u7751 \u257 ] | \
\
yata\uc0\u347 cod\u257 lin bhik\u7779 urdharme vaimatiko bhede [a] dharmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u299  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 payati \
\
sa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghasya bhed\u257 ya par\u257 kr\u257 mati | iyat\u257  ud\u257 lin bhik\u7779 u: \
\
samagra\uc0\u7747  \u347 r\u257 vakasa\u7747 gha\u7747  bhittv\u257  \u257 v\u299 cikamavadya\u7747  pras\u363 te sp\u7771 \u347 yate c\u257 nantary\u257 vadyena karma\u7751 \u257  | \
\
yata\uc0\u347 cod\u257 lin bhik\u7779 urdharme vaimatiko bhede dharmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u299  dharmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u299  bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 payati \
sa\uc0\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \u347 ik\u7779 ayati [gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghasya bhed\u257 ya] par\u257 kr\u257 mati | iyat\u257  ud\u257 lin \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 u: samagra\u7747  \u347 r\u257 vakasa\u7747 gha\u7747  bhittv\u257  \u257 v\u299 cikamavadya\u7747  pras\u363 te na tu sp\u7771 \u347 yate \u257 nantary\u257 vadyena \
\
karma\uc0\u7751 \u257  | \
\
yata\uc0\u347 cod\u257 lin bhik\u7779 urdharme vaimatiko bhede vaimatiko bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  j\'f1\u257 payati sa\u7747 j\'f1\u257 payati \
\
\uc0\u347 ik\u7779 ayati gr\u257 hayati sa\u7747 ghasya bhed\u257 ya par\u257 kr\u257 mati | iyat\u257  [ud\u257 lin bhik\u7779 u:] samagra\u7747  \
\
\uc0\u347 r\u257 vakasa\u7747 gha\u7747  bhittv\u257  \u257 v\u299 cikamavadya\u7747  pras\u363 te na tu sp\u7771 \u347 yate \u257 nantary\u257 vadyena karma\u7751 \u257  | \
\
evamet\uc0\u257 vanti [a\u7779 \u7789 \u257 da\u347 a |] \u257 s\u257 \u7747  \u7779 a\u7789  [na] sp\u7771 \u347 yante \u257 nantary\u257 vadyena \
\
karma\uc0\u7751 \u257  | y\u257 su bhede adharmasa\u7747 j\'f1\u299  ava\u347 i\u7779 \u7789 \u257 : [sp\u7771 \u347 yante] \u257 nantary\u257 vadyena karma\u7751 eti | \
\
vinaye sa\uc0\u7747 ghabhedavastu sam\u257 ptam || \

\
265.948: \uc0\u257 vr\u299 \u7693 ha\u347 alyam | ##from the Tib. rendering of \
\
the word, we find that## p\uc0\u257 l\u299 # abbh\u257 na (=Sans.##  \u257 va- \
\
rha\uc0\u7751 \u257 ) ##means \'93not rehabilitation\'94 or \'93coming back\'94 as \
\
is usually rendered in English but\'94 withdrawal of off- \
\
ences\'94 committed by the monk. The monk was\
already within the sa\uc0\u7747 gha; he was only debarred from \
\
certain privileges. by## \'93abbh\uc0\u257 na ##or## \u257 varha\u7751 a\'94 ##his offences \
\
are excused (lit. banished) by the## sa\uc0\u7747 gha ##and his privi- \
\
leges are restored.##\} \

94 4 \uc0\u347 obhanam\{1 ##A few sentences have been omitted. See Tib. \

become similar to a ship.##\} \

96 14 gacchati\{1 ##See Tib. 116a,1.2. \
In the Divy-## sa tasya karma\uc0\u7751 o vip\u257 kena ud\u363 khal\u257 k\u257 ra: sa\u7747 v\u7771 tta: | y\u257 \u7747 - \
\
stva\uc0\u7747  sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita sattv\u257 nadr\u257 k\u7779 \u299 : sth\u257 ly\u257 k\u257 r\u257 \u7747 ste k\u257 \u347 yapasya samyaksa\u7747 buddhasya kalpik\u257 - \
\
rak\uc0\u257  \u257 san | te bhik\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  bhai\u7779 ajy\u257 ni kv\u257 thayam\u257 n\u257 : sth\u257 lik\u257 \u7747  bha\'f1jate | te\u7779 \u257 \u7747  \
\
bhik\uc0\u7779 \u363 \u7751 \u257 \u7747  vidh\u257 to bhavati | te tasya karma\u7751 o vip\u257 kena sth\u257 ly\u257 k\u257 r\u257 : sa\u7747 v\u7771 tt\u257 : | ya\u7747  \
\
tva\uc0\u7747  sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 ita sattvamadr\u257 k\u7779 \u299 rmadhye chinnastantun\u257  dh\u257 ryam\u257 \u7751 o gacchati, sa k\u257 \u347 yapasya \
\
samyaksa\uc0\u7747 buddhasya pravacane pravrajita \u257 s\u299 ll\u257 bhagr\u257 hika: | tena yadv\u257 r\u7779 ika\u7747  l\u257 bha\u7747  tat haima- \
\
ntika\uc0\u7747  pari\u7751 \u257 mitam, yaddhaimantika\u7747  tadv\u257 r\u7779 ikam | tasya karma\u7751 o vip\u257 kena madhye chinna- \
\
stantun\uc0\u257  dh\u257 ryam\u257 \u7751 o gacchati | ##Divy## p\u7771  ^ 212pa\u7747 ^ 17-23##(MRI) \
\
The## Sam#gharak\uc0\u7779 it\u257 vad\u257 na ##ends here. The editor\
\
of the GM. observes: `the portion of the ms., containuing\
\
the## sa\uc0\u7747 gharak\u7779 it\u257 vad\u257 na, ##was in the possession of prof. \
\
Sylvain Levi, who did not reproduce the same in \
\
the Journal Asiatique (1932), in which appeared the \
\
matter contained in the leaves following those of the## sa\uc0\u7747 ghar- \
\
ak\uc0\u7779 it\u257 vad\u257 na. The sa\u7747 gharak\u7779 it\u257 vad\u257 na ##has been reproduced \
\
from the##,Divy\uc0\u257 vad\u257 na (pp.204.212 (MRI). On collation with \
\
the Tibetan version of the Dul-va, it appears that the compiler \
\
of the## divy\uc0\u257 vad\u257 na ##omitted or separated certain portions here \
\
and there. It will be observed that the story in the## divy\uc0\u257 vad\u257 -\
\
na ##has been opened abruptly with the words:## ki\uc0\u7747  mahallen\u257 bhigatam\}\
\

nti-ki\uc0\u7747  bhadanta \u257 yu\u7779 mat\u257  sagharak\u7779 itena karma k\u7771 tam, yasya karma\u7751 o vip\u257 ke- \
